en: Please ensure to credit the artist in the description or notes section.
it: Per favore, assicurati di accreditare l'artista nella descrizione o nella sezione delle note.
de: Bitte stelle sicher, den Künstler in der Beschreibung oder den Notizen zu nennen.
pl: Please ensure to credit the artist in the description or notes section.
fr: Merci de mentionner le nom de l'artiste dans la description ou dans les notes.
es: Por favor, aseguraos de acreditar al artista en la descripción o en la sección de notas.
pt-BR: Certifique-se de creditar o artista na seção de descrição ou notas.

en: Localized compendium is not available in this language. Defaulting to english.
it: Il compendio non è disponibile in questa lingua. Verrà impostato automaticamente in inglese.
de: Localized compendium is not available in this language. Defaulting to english.
pl: Kompendium nie jest dostępne w tym języku. Automatycznie zostanie ustawiony język angielski.
fr: Le compendium n'est pas disponible dans cette langue. Il sera en Anglais par défaut.
es: El compendio no se encuentra localizado en este idioma. Se mostrará el texto en inglés por defecto.
pt-BR: O compêndio localizado não está disponível neste idioma. Padrão para inglês.

key: Magichant not shown in player sheet
en: Magichant not shown in player sheet
de: Magichant not shown in player sheet
pl: Magichant not shown in player sheet
fr: Le Magichant n'apparaît pas dans la fiche de personnage
es: No mostrar magicanto en la hoja de personaje
pt-BR: Magicanto não mostrado na ficha do jogador

en: When you sing a **verse**, you combine a **volume**, a **key** and a **tone** you learned. These three aspects determine the **verse**’s MP cost, targets and effect.
it: Quando canti un **verso**, combini un tipo di **volume**, una **chiave** e un **tono** tra quelli che hai imparato. Questi aspetti determinano il costo in PM, i bersagli e l’effetto del **verso**.
de: When you sing a **verse**, you combine a **volume**, a **key** and a **tone** you learned. These three aspects determine the **verse**’s MP cost, targets and effect.
pl: When you sing a **verse**, you combine a **volume**, a **key** and a **tone** you learned. These three aspects determine the **verse**’s MP cost, targets and effect.
fr: Quand vous chantez un **couplet**, vous associez un **volume**, une **clef** et un **ton** que vous avez appris. Ces trois aspects déterminent le coût en MP, les cibles et l'effet du **couplet**.
es: When you sing a **verse**, you combine a **volume**, a **key** and a **tone** you learned. These three aspects determine the **verse**’s MP cost, targets and effect.
pt-BR: Quando você canta um **verso**, você combina um **volume**, um **tom** e uma **escala** que você aprendeu. Esses três aspectos determinam o custo de PM, alvos e efeito do **verso**.

en: The **volume** determines the sound intensity of your **verse** (and the creatures you can reach with it).
it: Il **volume** determina l’intensità sonora del tuo **verso** (e le creature raggiungibili).
de: The **volume** determines the sound intensity of your **verse** (and the creatures you can reach with it).
pl: The **volume** determines the sound intensity of your **verse** (and the creatures you can reach with it).
fr: Le **volume** détermine l'intensité sonore du **couplet** (et les créatures qu'il vous permet d'atteindre).
es: The **volume** determines the sound intensity of your **verse** (and the creatures you can reach with it).
pt-BR: O **Volume** determina a intensidade sonora do seu **verso** (e as criaturas que você pode alcançar com ele).

en: Each **tone** determines the general effects of your **verse**.
it: Ciascun **tono** determina l’effetto generale del tuo **verso**.
de: Each **tone** determines the general effects of your **verse**.
pl: Each **tone** determines the general effects of your **verse**.
fr: Chaque **ton** détermine les effets généraux du **couplet**.
es: Each **tone** determines the general effects of your **verse**.
pt-BR: Cada **Tom** determina os efeitos gerais do seu **verso**.

en: Each **key** has an associated **damage type, status effect, Attribute** and **recovery**. These modify the effects determined by the **tone** of your **verse**.
it: Ciascuna **chiave** ha un **tipo** di danno, uno **status**, una **Caratteristica** e una forma di **recupero** associati a essa, modificando così l’effetto determinato dal **tono** del **verso**.
de: Each **key** has an associated **damage type, status effect, Attribute** and **recovery**. These modify the effects determined by the **tone** of your **verse**.
pl: Each **key** has an associated **damage type, status effect, Attribute** and **recovery**. These modify the effects determined by the **tone** of your **verse**.
fr: À chaque **clef** correspondent un **type de dégâts**, un **effet d'état**, un **attribut** et une **récupération**. Tous modifient les effets déterminés par le **ton** du **couplet**.
es: Each **key** has an associated **damage type, status effect, Attribute** and **recovery**. These modify the effects determined by the **tone** of your **verse**.
pt-BR: Cada **Escala** tem um **tipo de dano, efeito de status, Atributo** e **recuperação** associados. Eles modificam os efeitos determinados pelo **tom** do seu **verso**.

en: Yourself or another creature you can see who can hear you.
it: Te stesso oppure un’altra creatura a te visibile in grado di sentirti.
de: Yourself or another creature you can see who can hear you.
pl: Yourself or another creature you can see who can hear you.
fr: Vous **ou** une autre créature que vous voyez et qui vous entend.
es: Yourself or another creature you can see who can hear you.
pt-BR: Você mesmo ou outra criatura que você pode ver e que pode ouvi-lo.

en: Every ally who can hear you.
it: Ciascun alleato in grado di sentirti.
de: Every ally who can hear you.
pl: Every ally who can hear you.
fr: Tous les alliés qui vous entendent
es: Every ally who can hear you.
pt-BR: Todos os aliados que podem ouvir você.

en: Every enemy who can hear you.
it: Ciascun nemico in grado di sentirti.
de: Every enemy who can hear you.
pl: Every enemy who can hear you.
fr: Tous les ennemis qui vous entendent.
es: Every enemy who can hear you.
pt-BR: Todo inimigo que pode ouvir você.

es: Aún no se han añadido tonos

en: Each target recovers【**key recovery**】equal to【**10 + twice your current Willpower die size**】. This amount increases by 10 if you are **level 20 or higher**, or by 20 if you are **level 40 or higher**. If this tone causes MP recovery, it has **no effect** on the character who sings it.
it: Ciascun bersaglio recupera【 **recupero della chiave**】 pari a【 **10 + il doppio della tua taglia di dado attuale di Volontà**】. Questo ammontare aumenta di 10 se sei di **livello 20 o superiore**, oppure di 20 se sei di **livello 40 o superiore**. Se questo tono causa il recupero di PM, **non ha effetto** sul personaggio che lo canta.
de: Each target recovers【**key recovery**】equal to【**10 + twice your current Willpower die size**】. This amount increases by 10 if you are **level 20 or higher**, or by 20 if you are **level 40 or higher**. If this tone causes MP recovery, it has **no effect** on the character who sings it.
pl: Each target recovers【**key recovery**】equal to【**10 + twice your current Willpower die size**】. This amount increases by 10 if you are **level 20 or higher**, or by 20 if you are **level 40 or higher**. If this tone causes MP recovery, it has **no effect** on the character who sings it.
fr: Chaque cible récupère un nombre de【**récupération de la clef**】égal à【**10 + le double de votre taille de dé de Volonté actuelle**】. Ce total augmente de 10 si vous êtes de **niveau 20 ou plus**, ou de 20 si vous êtes de **niveau 40 ou plus**. Si ce ton entraîne une récupération de PM, il n'a **aucun effet** sur le personnage qui chante.
es: Each target recovers【**key recovery**】equal to【**10 + twice your current Willpower die size**】. This amount increases by 10 if you are **level 20 or higher**, or by 20 if you are **level 40 or higher**. If this tone causes MP recovery, it has **no effect** on the character who sings it.
pt-BR: Cada alvo recupera【**recuperação de tom**】igual a【**10 + duas vezes o tamanho atual do seu dado de Vontade**】. Essa quantidade aumenta em 10 se você for **nível 20 ou superior**, ou em 20 se você for **nível 40 ou superior**. Se esse tom causar recuperação de PM, ele **não tem efeito** no personagem que o canta.

en: Until the start of your next turn, when a target succeeds on a Check that includes【**key Attribute**】and that Check allows them to advance or turn back a Clock, they may fill or erase an additional section of that Clock.
it: Fino all’inizio del tuo prossimo turno, quando un bersaglio ha successo su un Test per riempire o svuotare un Orologio, se quel Test includeva【 **Caratteristica della chiave**】, quell’alleato può riempire o svuotare una sezione aggiuntiva di quell’Orologio.
de: Until the start of your next turn, when a target succeeds on a Check that includes【**key Attribute**】and that Check allows them to advance or turn back a Clock, they may fill or erase an additional section of that Clock.
pl: Until the start of your next turn, when a target succeeds on a Check that includes【**key Attribute**】and that Check allows them to advance or turn back a Clock, they may fill or erase an additional section of that Clock.
fr: Jusqu'au début de votre prochain tour, lorsqu'une cible réussit un test qui comprend【**attribut de la clef**】et que celui-ci permet de faire avancer ou reculer un Cadran, elle peut en remplir ou en effacer une section supplémentaire.
es: Until the start of your next turn, when a target succeeds on a Check that includes【**key Attribute**】and that Check allows them to advance or turn back a Clock, they may fill or erase an additional section of that Clock.
pt-BR: Até o início do seu próximo turno, quando um alvo for bem-sucedido em um Teste que inclui【**Atributo-chave**】e esse Teste permitir que ele avance ou volte um Relógio, ele poderá preencher ou apagar uma seção adicional desse Relógio.

en: Each target suffers【**key type**】damage equal to **twice** your current **Willpower** die size. This tone deals 10 extra damage if you are **level 20 or higher**, or 20 extra damage if you are **level 40 or higher**.
it: Ciascun bersaglio subisce danni da【 **tipo della chiave**】 pari al **doppio** della tua taglia di dado attuale di **Volontà**. Questo tono infligge 10 danni extra se sei di **livello 20 o superiore**, oppure 20 danni extra se sei di **livello 40 o superiore**.
de: Each target suffers【**key type**】damage equal to **twice** your current **Willpower** die size. This tone deals 10 extra damage if you are **level 20 or higher**, or 20 extra damage if you are **level 40 or higher**.
pl: Each target suffers【**key type**】damage equal to **twice** your current **Willpower** die size. This tone deals 10 extra damage if you are **level 20 or higher**, or 20 extra damage if you are **level 40 or higher**.
fr: Chaque cible subit un nombre de dégâts de【**type de la clef**】égal au **double** de votre taille de dé de **Volonté** actuelle. Ce total augmente de 10 si vous êtes de **niveau 20 ou plus**, ou de 20 si vous êtes de **niveau 40 ou plus**.
es: Each target suffers【**key type**】damage equal to **twice** your current **Willpower** die size. This tone deals 10 extra damage if you are **level 20 or higher**, or 20 extra damage if you are **level 40 or higher**.
pt-BR: Cada alvo sofre【**tipo de tom**】dano igual a **duas vezes** o tamanho atual do seu dado de **Vontade**. Este tom causa 10 de dano extra se você for **nível 20 ou superior**, ou 20 de dano extra se você for **nível 40 ou superior**.

en: Each target suffers【**key status effect**】. Each target also loses Resistance to【**key type**】damage (if they have it) until the start of your next turn.
it: Ciascun bersaglio subisce lo status【 **status della chiave**】. Inoltre, ciascun bersaglio perde la Resistenza al danno da【 **tipo della chiave**】 (se la possedeva) fino all’inizio del tuo prossimo turno.
de: Each target suffers【**key status effect**】. Each target also loses Resistance to【**key type**】damage (if they have it) until the start of your next turn.
pl: Each target suffers【**key status effect**】. Each target also loses Resistance to【**key type**】damage (if they have it) until the start of your next turn.
fr: Chaque cible subit l'état【**état de la clef**】. Chaque cible perd également sa résistance aux dégâts de【**type de la clef**】(si elle en a une) jusqu'au début de votre prochain tour.
es: Each target suffers【**key status effect**】. Each target also loses Resistance to【**key type**】damage (if they have it) until the start of your next turn.
pt-BR: Cada alvo sofre【**efeito de status de tom**】. Cada alvo também perde Resistência a dano de【**tipo de tom**】(se tiver) até o início do seu próximo turno.

en: Each target treats their【**key Attribute**】as being one die size higher (up to a maximum of **d12**) until the start of your next turn.
it: Ciascun bersaglio considera la propria taglia di dado di 【**Caratteristica della chiave**】incrementata di una taglia (fino a un massimo di **d12**) fino all’inizio del tuo prossimo turno.
de: Each target treats their【**key Attribute**】as being one die size higher (up to a maximum of **d12**) until the start of your next turn.
pl: Each target treats their【**key Attribute**】as being one die size higher (up to a maximum of **d12**) until the start of your next turn.
fr: Chaque cible fait comme si le dé de son【**attribut de la clef**】était supérieur d'un cran (jusqu'à un maximum de **d12**) jusqu'au début de votre prochain tour.
es: Each target treats their【**key Attribute**】as being one die size higher (up to a maximum of **d12**) until the start of your next turn.
pt-BR: Cada alvo trata seu 【**Atributo-chave**】como se tivesse um tamanho de dado maior (até um máximo de **d12**) até o início do seu próximo turno.

en: The first time each target suffers damage before the start of your next turn, that damage becomes【**key type**】. This can trigger once for each target of the verse, separately.
it: La prima volta che ciascun bersaglio subisce danno prima dell’inizio del tuo prossimo turno, quel danno diventa da【 **tipo della chiave**】. Questo effetto si innesca separatamente solo una volta per ciascun bersaglio del verso.
de: The first time each target suffers damage before the start of your next turn, that damage becomes【**key type**】. This can trigger once for each target of the verse, separately.
pl: The first time each target suffers damage before the start of your next turn, that damage becomes【**key type**】. This can trigger once for each target of the verse, separately.
fr: La première fois que chaque cible subit des dégâts avant le début de votre prochain tour, ceux-ci deviennent du type【**type de la clef**】. Cet effet peut se déclencher une fois pour chaque cible du couplet, séparément.
es: The first time each target suffers damage before the start of your next turn, that damage becomes【**key type**】. This can trigger once for each target of the verse, separately.
pt-BR: A primeira vez que cada alvo sofre dano antes do início do seu próximo turno, esse dano se torna 【**tipo de tom**】. Isso pode ser acionado uma vez para cada alvo do verso, separadamente.

en: Each target recovers from【**key status effect**】. Each target also gains Resistance to【**key type**】damage until the start of your next turn.
it: Ciascun bersaglio guarisce dallo status【 **status della chiave**】. Inoltre, ciascun bersaglio ottiene Resistenza al danno da【 **tipo della chiave**】 fino all’inizio del tuo prossimo turno.
de: Each target recovers from【**key status effect**】. Each target also gains Resistance to【**key type**】damage until the start of your next turn.
pl: Each target recovers from【**key status effect**】. Each target also gains Resistance to【**key type**】damage until the start of your next turn.
fr: Chaque cible se remet de l'état【**état de la clef**】. Chaque cible reçoit en outre une résistance aux dégâts de【**type de la clef**】jusqu'au début de votre prochain tour.
es: Each target recovers from【**key status effect**】. Each target also gains Resistance to【**key type**】damage until the start of your next turn.
pt-BR: Cada alvo se recupera do【**efeito de status de tom**】. Cada alvo também ganha Resistência a danos do【**tipo de tom**】até o início do seu próximo turno.

en: You may perform the **Inventory** action and spend 2 Inventory Points to create a **symbol** you have learned and choose one option: apply that **symbol** to yourself; or apply that **symbol** to an ally you can see; **or** perform a **free attack** with a weapon you have equipped. This attack deals no damage, but you apply a copy of the chosen **symbol** to each enemy hit by the attack.
it: Puoi eseguire l’azione di **Inventario** e spendere 2 Punti Inventario per creare un **simbolo** tra quelli che conosci e scegliere un’opzione: imprimi il **simbolo** su te stesso; **oppure** imprimi il **simbolo** su un alleato a te visibile; **oppure** esegui un **attacco gratuito** con un’arma equipaggiata. L’attacco non infligge danno, ma imprimi una copia del **simbolo** su ciascun nemico colpito.
de: You may perform the **Inventory** action and spend 2 Inventory Points to create a **symbol** you have learned and choose one option: apply that **symbol** to yourself; or apply that **symbol** to an ally you can see; **or** perform a **free attack** with a weapon you have equipped. This attack deals no damage, but you apply a copy of the chosen **symbol** to each enemy hit by the attack.
pl: You may perform the **Inventory** action and spend 2 Inventory Points to create a **symbol** you have learned and choose one option: apply that **symbol** to yourself; or apply that **symbol** to an ally you can see; **or** perform a **free attack** with a weapon you have equipped. This attack deals no damage, but you apply a copy of the chosen **symbol** to each enemy hit by the attack.
fr: Vous pouvez réaliser l'action **Inventaire** et dépenser 2 Points d'Inventaire pour créer un **symole** que vous avez appris et choisir une option : **soit** appliquer à vous-même ce **symbole**, **soit** l'appliquer sur un allié que vous voyez, **soit** effectuer une **attaque gratuite** avec une arme dont vous êtes équipé. Cette attaque n'inflige aucun dégât, mais vous appliquez une copie du **symbole** choisi à chque ennemi touché.
es: You may perform the **Inventory** action and spend 2 Inventory Points to create a **symbol** you have learned and choose one option: apply that **symbol** to yourself; or apply that **symbol** to an ally you can see; **or** perform a **free attack** with a weapon you have equipped. This attack deals no damage, but you apply a copy of the chosen **symbol** to each enemy hit by the attack.
pt-BR: Você pode executar a ação **Inventário** e gastar 2 Pontos de Inventário para criar um **símbolo** que você aprendeu e escolher uma opção: aplicar esse **símbolo** a si mesmo; ou aplicar esse **símbolo** a um aliado que você pode ver; **ou** executar um **ataque livre** com uma arma que você equipou. Este ataque não causa dano, mas você aplica uma cópia do **símbolo** escolhido a cada inimigo atingido pelo ataque.

key: Symbols not shown in player sheet
en: Symbols not shown in player sheet
de: Symbols not shown in player sheet
pl: Symbols not shown in player sheet
fr: Les Symboles n'apparaissent pas dans la fiche de personnage
es: No mostrar símbolos en la ficha de personaje
pt-BR: Símbolos não mostrados na ficha do jogador

es: No se han añadido símbolos aún

en: The **current** Attribute die sizes of the creature bearing this **symbol** can **never** be **higher** than that creature’s corresponding **base** Attribute die sizes (this does **not** end any spells or effects, but it will negate their influence over the creature’s Attributes).
it: Le taglie di dado **attuali** delle Caratteristiche della creatura su cui è impresso questo **simbolo** non possono **mai** essere **superiori** alle rispettive taglie di dado **base** (ciò **non** termina eventuali incantesimi o effetti, ma nega il loro impatto sulle Caratteristiche).
de: The **current** Attribute die sizes of the creature bearing this **symbol** can **never** be **higher** than that creature’s corresponding **base** Attribute die sizes (this does **not** end any spells or effects, but it will negate their influence over the creature’s Attributes).
pl: The **current** Attribute die sizes of the creature bearing this **symbol** can **never** be **higher** than that creature’s corresponding **base** Attribute die sizes (this does **not** end any spells or effects, but it will negate their influence over the creature’s Attributes).
fr: Les tailles de dés **actuelles** des attributs de la créature qui porte ce **symbole** ne peuvent **jamais dépasser** leur valeur de **base** (ceci n'**interrompt** pas les sorts et les effets, mais annule leur influence sur les attriuts de la créature).
es: The **current** Attribute die sizes of the creature bearing this **symbol** can **never** be **higher** than that creature’s corresponding **base** Attribute die sizes (this does **not** end any spells or effects, but it will negate their influence over the creature’s Attributes).
pt-BR: Os tamanhos **atuais** dos dados de Atributo da criatura que carrega este **símbolo** nunca podem ser **maiores** que os tamanhos dos dados de Atributo **base** correspondentes daquela criatura (isso **não** encerra nenhuma magia ou efeito, mas anulará sua influência sobre os Atributos da criatura).

en: When the creature bearing this **symbol** needs to spend Inventory Points during a conflict, they may instead destroy this **symbol** to spend no Inventory Points.
it: Quando la creatura su cui è impresso questo **simbolo** deve spendere Punti Inventario durante un conflitto, essa può distruggere questo **simbolo** per non spendere alcun Punto Inventario.
de: When the creature bearing this **symbol** needs to spend Inventory Points during a conflict, they may instead destroy this **symbol** to spend no Inventory Points.
pl: When the creature bearing this **symbol** needs to spend Inventory Points during a conflict, they may instead destroy this **symbol** to spend no Inventory Points.
fr: Quand la créature qui porte ce **symbole** doit dépenser des Points d'Inventaire pendant un conflit, elle peut détruire ce **symbole** pour s'en abstenir.
es: When the creature bearing this **symbol** needs to spend Inventory Points during a conflict, they may instead destroy this **symbol** to spend no Inventory Points.
pt-BR: Quando a criatura que carrega este **símbolo** precisa gastar Pontos de Inventário durante um conflito, ela pode destruir este **símbolo** para não gastar Pontos de Inventário.

en: When the creature bearing this **symbol** recovers Hit Points and/or Mind Points during conflicts, instead they only recover **half** the normal amount of Hit Points and/or Mind Points, respectively.
it: Quando la creatura su cui è impresso questo **simbolo** recupera Punti Vita o Punti Mente durante un conflitto, essa recupera **metà** del normale ammontare di Punti Vita o Punti Mente.
de: When the creature bearing this **symbol** recovers Hit Points and/or Mind Points during conflicts, instead they only recover **half** the normal amount of Hit Points and/or Mind Points, respectively.
pl: When the creature bearing this **symbol** recovers Hit Points and/or Mind Points during conflicts, instead they only recover **half** the normal amount of Hit Points and/or Mind Points, respectively.
fr: Quand la créature qui porte ce **symbole** récupère des Points de Vie et/ou des Points de Magie pendant les conflits, elle ne reçoit que **la moitié** des points prévus.
es: When the creature bearing this **symbol** recovers Hit Points and/or Mind Points during conflicts, instead they only recover **half** the normal amount of Hit Points and/or Mind Points, respectively.
pt-BR: Quando a criatura que carrega este **símbolo** recupera Pontos de Vida e/ou Pontos Mentais durante conflitos, ela recupera apenas **metade** da quantidade normal de Pontos de Vida e/ou Pontos Mentais, respectivamente.

en: After the creature bearing this **symbol** makes a Check, if you are able to see them, you may spend 1 Fabula Point to force that creature to reroll both dice. You may only do so once per Check, and only if the Result was not a **critical success** or **fumble**.
it: Dopo che la creatura su cui è impresso questo **simbolo** effettua un Test, se sei in grado di vederla, puoi spendere 1 Punto Fabula per farle ritirare entrambi i dadi. Puoi farlo soltanto una volta per Test, e soltanto se il Risultato non era un **successo critico** o **fallimento critico**.
de: After the creature bearing this **symbol** makes a Check, if you are able to see them, you may spend 1 Fabula Point to force that creature to reroll both dice. You may only do so once per Check, and only if the Result was not a **critical success** or **fumble**.
pl: After the creature bearing this **symbol** makes a Check, if you are able to see them, you may spend 1 Fabula Point to force that creature to reroll both dice. You may only do so once per Check, and only if the Result was not a **critical success** or **fumble**.
fr: Après que la créature qui porte ce **symbole** a effectué un test, si vous pouvez la voir, vous pouvez dépenser 1 Point Faula pour la forcer à relancer les deux dés. Vous ne pouvez recourir à cette méthode qu'une fois par test et uniquement si le résultat n'était **ni réussite critique ni échec critique**.
es: After the creature bearing this **symbol** makes a Check, if you are able to see them, you may spend 1 Fabula Point to force that creature to reroll both dice. You may only do so once per Check, and only if the Result was not a **critical success** or **fumble**.
pt-BR: Após a criatura que carrega este **símbolo** fazer um Teste, se você for capaz de vê-la, você pode gastar 1 Ponto de Fabula para forçar aquela criatura a rolar novamente ambos os dados. Você só pode fazer isso uma vez por Teste, e somente se o Resultado não for um **sucesso crítico** ou **falha crítica**.

en: When you create this **symbol**, choose a damage type: **air, bolt, dark, earth, fire, ice, light**, or **poison**. When the creature bearing this **symbol** deals damage to one or more creatures, if you can see the creature bearing this **symbol**, you may spend an amount of Mind Points equal to **one third of the total damage being inflicted to those creatures**. (including any sources of extra damage). If you do, all damage dealt this way changes type to the type chosen when you created this **symbol**.
it: Quando crei questo **simbolo**, scegli un tipo di danno tra: **aria, fulmine, fuoco, ghiaccio, luce, ombra, terra** e **veleno**. Quando la creatura su cui è impresso questo **simbolo** infligge danno a una o più creature, se sei in grado di vederla, puoi spendere un ammontare di Punti Mente pari **a un terzo del danno totale che sta infliggendo a quelle creature** (incluse eventuali fonti di danno extra). Se lo fai, tutto il danno inflitto in questo modo diventa del tipo scelto quando hai creato questo **simbolo**.
de: When you create this **symbol**, choose a damage type: **air, bolt, dark, earth, fire, ice, light**, or **poison**. When the creature bearing this **symbol** deals damage to one or more creatures, if you can see the creature bearing this **symbol**, you may spend an amount of Mind Points equal to **one third of the total damage being inflicted to those creatures**. (including any sources of extra damage). If you do, all damage dealt this way changes type to the type chosen when you created this **symbol**.
pl: When you create this **symbol**, choose a damage type: **air, bolt, dark, earth, fire, ice, light**, or **poison**. When the creature bearing this **symbol** deals damage to one or more creatures, if you can see the creature bearing this **symbol**, you may spend an amount of Mind Points equal to **one third of the total damage being inflicted to those creatures**. (including any sources of extra damage). If you do, all damage dealt this way changes type to the type chosen when you created this **symbol**.
fr: Quand vous créez ce **symbole**, choisissez un type de dégâts : **air, foudre, ténèbres, terre, feu, glace, lumière** ou **poison**. Quand la créature qui porte ce **symbole** inflige des dégâts à une ou plusieurs créatures et que vous pouvez la voir, vous pouvez dépenser un nombre de Points de Magie égal à **un tiers des dégâts totaux infligés** (y compris toutes les sources de dégâts supplémentaires). Dans ce cas, les dégâts adoptent le type choisi lorsque vous avez créé le **symbole**.
es: When you create this **symbol**, choose a damage type: **air, bolt, dark, earth, fire, ice, light**, or **poison**. When the creature bearing this **symbol** deals damage to one or more creatures, if you can see the creature bearing this **symbol**, you may spend an amount of Mind Points equal to **one third of the total damage being inflicted to those creatures**. (including any sources of extra damage). If you do, all damage dealt this way changes type to the type chosen when you created this **symbol**.
pt-BR: Ao criar este **símbolo**, escolha um tipo de dano: **ar, raio, escuridão, terra, fogo, gelo, luz** ou **veneno**. Quando a criatura que carrega este **símbolo** causa dano a uma ou mais criaturas, se você puder ver a criatura que carrega este **símbolo**, você pode gastar uma quantidade de Pontos Mentais igual a **um terço do dano total sendo infligido a essas criaturas**. (incluindo quaisquer fontes de dano extra). Se você fizer isso, todo o dano causado dessa forma muda de tipo para o tipo escolhido quando você criou este **símbolo**.

en: As long as the creature bearing this **symbol** is in **Crisis**, any of that creature’s enemies who are able to see them must include them among the targets of their attacks and offensive spells (⚡), if possible.
it: Finché la creatura su cui è impresso questo **simbolo è in Crisi**, i suoi nemici in grado di vederla devono **sempre** includerla tra i bersagli dei propri attacchi e incantesimi offensivi (⚡), se possibile.
de: As long as the creature bearing this **symbol** is in **Crisis**, any of that creature’s enemies who are able to see them must include them among the targets of their attacks and offensive spells (⚡), if possible.
pl: As long as the creature bearing this **symbol** is in **Crisis**, any of that creature’s enemies who are able to see them must include them among the targets of their attacks and offensive spells (⚡), if possible.
fr: Tant que la créature qui porte ce **symbole** est en **Crise**, tous ses ennemis capables de la voir doivent l'inclure parmi les cibles de leurs attaques et sorts offensifs (⚡) si c'est possible.
es: As long as the creature bearing this **symbol** is in **Crisis**, any of that creature’s enemies who are able to see them must include them among the targets of their attacks and offensive spells (⚡), if possible.
pt-BR: Enquanto a criatura que carrega este **símbolo** estiver em **Crise**, qualquer inimigo daquela criatura que for capaz de vê-la deve incluí-la entre os alvos de seus ataques e magias ofensivas (⚡), se possível.

en: When you create this **symbol**, choose a status effect: **dazed, shaken, slow**, or **weak**. Then, choose one option: the creature bearing this **symbol** gains immunity to the chosen status effect; or the creature bearing this **symbol** loses immunity to the chosen status effect and cannot gain it.
it: Quando crei questo **simbolo**, scegli uno tra status: **confuso, debole, lento** e **scosso**; poi, scegli un’opzione: la creatura su cui è impresso questo **simbolo** ottiene immunità allo status scelto; **oppure** la creatura su cui è impresso questo **simbolo** perde immunità allo status scelto e non può ottenerla.
de: When you create this **symbol**, choose a status effect: **dazed, shaken, slow**, or **weak**. Then, choose one option: the creature bearing this **symbol** gains immunity to the chosen status effect; or the creature bearing this **symbol** loses immunity to the chosen status effect and cannot gain it.
pl: When you create this **symbol**, choose a status effect: **dazed, shaken, slow**, or **weak**. Then, choose one option: the creature bearing this **symbol** gains immunity to the chosen status effect; or the creature bearing this **symbol** loses immunity to the chosen status effect and cannot gain it.
fr: Quand vous créez ce **symbole**, choisissez un état : **étourdi, traumatisé, ralenti** ou **affaibli**. Ensuite, choisissez une option : la créature qui porte ce **symbole** reçoit l'immunité contre l'état choisi **ou** la perd et ne peut pas la récupérer.
es: When you create this **symbol**, choose a status effect: **dazed, shaken, slow**, or **weak**. Then, choose one option: the creature bearing this **symbol** gains immunity to the chosen status effect; or the creature bearing this **symbol** loses immunity to the chosen status effect and cannot gain it.
pt-BR: Quando você cria este **símbolo**, escolha um efeito de status: **atordoado, abalado, lento** ou **fraco**. Então, escolha uma opção: a criatura que carrega este **símbolo** ganha imunidade ao efeito de status escolhido; ou a criatura que carrega este **símbolo** perde imunidade ao efeito de status escolhido e não pode ganhá-lo.

en: When you create this symbol, choose an action type: **Attack, Guard, Objective, Spell**, or **Skill**. When the creature bearing this **symbol** performs the chosen action, they lose 5 Hit Points and 5 Mind Points (**before** performing that action). Both amounts increase to 10 if you are **level 20 or higher**, or to 20 if you are **level 40 or higher**.
it: Quando crei questo **simbolo**, scegli un tipo di azione tra: **Attacco, Guardia, Incantesimo, Obiettivo** e **Abilità**. Quando la creatura su cui è impresso questo **simbolo** esegue l’azione scelta, essa perde 5 Punti Vita e 5 Punti Mente (**prima** di eseguire l’azione). Ciascun ammontare aumenta a 10 se sei di **livello 20 o superiore**, oppure a 15 se sei di **livello 40 o superiore**.
de: When you create this symbol, choose an action type: **Attack, Guard, Objective, Spell**, or **Skill**. When the creature bearing this **symbol** performs the chosen action, they lose 5 Hit Points and 5 Mind Points (**before** performing that action). Both amounts increase to 10 if you are **level 20 or higher**, or to 20 if you are **level 40 or higher**.
pl: When you create this symbol, choose an action type: **Attack, Guard, Objective, Spell**, or **Skill**. When the creature bearing this **symbol** performs the chosen action, they lose 5 Hit Points and 5 Mind Points (**before** performing that action). Both amounts increase to 10 if you are **level 20 or higher**, or to 20 if you are **level 40 or higher**.
fr: Quand vous créez ce symbole, choisissez un type d'ction : **Attaque, Garde, Objectif, Sort** ou **Compétence**. Quand la créature qui porte ce **symbole** effectue l'action choisie, elle perd 5 Points de Vie et 5 Points de Magie (**avant** de réaliser l'action). Les deux pertes augmentent à 10 Points si vous êtes de **niveau 20 ou supérieur**, ou à 20 si vous êtes de **niveau 40 ou supérieur**.
es: When you create this symbol, choose an action type: **Attack, Guard, Objective, Spell**, or **Skill**. When the creature bearing this **symbol** performs the chosen action, they lose 5 Hit Points and 5 Mind Points (**before** performing that action). Both amounts increase to 10 if you are **level 20 or higher**, or to 20 if you are **level 40 or higher**.
pt-BR: Ao criar este símbolo, escolha um tipo de ação: **Ataque, Guarda, Objetivo, Feitiço** ou **Poder**. Quando a criatura que carrega este **símbolo** realiza a ação escolhida, ela perde 5 Pontos de Vida e 5 Pontos Mentais (**antes** de realizar essa ação). Ambas as quantidades aumentam para 10 se você for **nível 20 ou superior**, ou para 20 se você for **nível 40 ou superior**.

en: Spells with a **target** of "Up to three creatures" cast by the creature bearing this **symbol** have a **target** of "Up to four creatures" instead. The creature still needs to spend additional Mind Points for a fourth target.
it: Gli incantesimi con un **bersaglio** di “Fino a tre creature” lanciati dalla creatura su cui è impresso questo **simbolo** hanno invece un **bersaglio** di “Fino a quattro creature” (la creatura deve comunque spendere i Punti Mente addizionali per il quarto bersaglio).
de: Spells with a **target** of "Up to three creatures" cast by the creature bearing this **symbol** have a **target** of "Up to four creatures" instead. The creature still needs to spend additional Mind Points for a fourth target.
pl: Spells with a **target** of "Up to three creatures" cast by the creature bearing this **symbol** have a **target** of "Up to four creatures" instead. The creature still needs to spend additional Mind Points for a fourth target.
fr: Les sorts dont la **cible** est ♠ jusqu'à trois créatures » et lancés par la créature qui porte ce **symbole** peuvent prendre jusqu'à quatre **créatures** pour cible. La créature doit toutefois dépenser les Points de Magie nécessaires pour affecter la quatrième cible.
es: Spells with a **target** of "Up to three creatures" cast by the creature bearing this **symbol** have a **target** of "Up to four creatures" instead. The creature still needs to spend additional Mind Points for a fourth target.
pt-BR: Magias com um **alvo** de "Até três criaturas" lançadas pela criatura que carrega este **símbolo** têm um **alvo** de "Até quatro criaturas" em vez disso. A criatura ainda precisa gastar Pontos Mentais adicionais para um quarto alvo.

en: When you create this **symbol**, choose a Species: **beast, construct, demon, elemental, monster, plant**, or **undead**. The creature bearing this **symbol** is treated as belonging to the chosen Species for the sake of Skills and effects, instead of their normal Species (this does **not** otherwise alter any of the creature’s profile, such as their Affinities or any special rules they may have). This **symbol cannot** be applied to Player Characters.
it: Quando crei questo **simbolo**, scegli una Specie tra: **bestia, costrutto, demone, elementale, mostro, non morto** e **pianta**. La creatura su cui è impresso questo **simbolo** è considerata appartenente alla Specie scelta ai fini di Abilità ed effetti, invece che alla sua normale Specie (ciò **non** modifica nessun altro parametro della creatura, come ad esempio Affinità o regole speciali). Questo **simbolo non può** essere impresso su un Personaggio Giocante.
de: When you create this **symbol**, choose a Species: **beast, construct, demon, elemental, monster, plant**, or **undead**. The creature bearing this **symbol** is treated as belonging to the chosen Species for the sake of Skills and effects, instead of their normal Species (this does **not** otherwise alter any of the creature’s profile, such as their Affinities or any special rules they may have). This **symbol cannot** be applied to Player Characters.
pl: When you create this **symbol**, choose a Species: **beast, construct, demon, elemental, monster, plant**, or **undead**. The creature bearing this **symbol** is treated as belonging to the chosen Species for the sake of Skills and effects, instead of their normal Species (this does **not** otherwise alter any of the creature’s profile, such as their Affinities or any special rules they may have). This **symbol cannot** be applied to Player Characters.
fr: Quand vous créez ce symbole, choisissez une espèce : **bête, créature artificielle, démon, élémentaire, monstre, mort-vivant** ou **plante**. La créature qui porte ce **symbole** est traitée comme si elle appartenait à l'espèce en question au lieu de la sienne lorsqu'il s'agit de lui appliquer des compétences et des effets. Ceci n'altère **pas** le reste de son profil, comme ses affinités ou les règles spéciales dont elle dispose. Ce **symbole** ne peut **pas** s'appliquer à des personnages joueurs.
es: When you create this **symbol**, choose a Species: **beast, construct, demon, elemental, monster, plant**, or **undead**. The creature bearing this **symbol** is treated as belonging to the chosen Species for the sake of Skills and effects, instead of their normal Species (this does **not** otherwise alter any of the creature’s profile, such as their Affinities or any special rules they may have). This **symbol cannot** be applied to Player Characters.
pt-BR: Ao criar este **símbolo**, escolha uma Espécie: **fera, constructo, demônio, elemental, monstro, planta** ou **morto-vivo**. A criatura que carrega este **símbolo** é tratada como pertencente à Espécie escolhida para fins de Poderes e efeitos, em vez de sua Espécie normal (isso **não** altera de outra forma nenhum perfil da criatura, como suas Afinidades ou quaisquer regras especiais que ela possa ter). Este **símbolo não pode** ser aplicado a Personagens Jogadores.

en: When the creature bearing this **symbol** spends 1 Fabula Point to **invoke a Trait or Bond**, they also receive 100 zenit.
it: Quando la creatura su cui è impresso questo **simbolo** spende 1 Punto Fabula per **invocare un Tratto o Legame**, essa ottiene inoltre 100 zenit.

pt-BR: Quando a criatura portadora deste **símbolo** gasta 1 Ponto de Fabula para **invocar uma Característica ou Vínculo**, ela também recebe 100 zenit.

en: When you create this **symbol**, choose a damage type: **air, bolt, dark, earth, fire, ice, light**, or **poison**. The creature bearing this **symbol** gains Resistance to the chosen damage type.
it: Quando crei questo **simbolo**, scegli un tipo di danno tra: **aria, fulmine, fuoco, ghiaccio, luce, ombra, terra** e **veleno**. La creatura su cui è impresso questo **simbolo** ottiene Resistenza al tipo di danno scelto.
de: When you create this **symbol**, choose a damage type: **air, bolt, dark, earth, fire, ice, light**, or **poison**. The creature bearing this **symbol** gains Resistance to the chosen damage type.
pl: When you create this **symbol**, choose a damage type: **air, bolt, dark, earth, fire, ice, light**, or **poison**. The creature bearing this **symbol** gains Resistance to the chosen damage type.
fr: Quand vous créez ce **symbole**, choisissez un type de dégâts : **air, foudre, ténèbres, terre, feu, glace, lumière** ou **poison**. La créature qui porte ce **symbole** gagne une résistance au type de dégâts choisi.
es: When you create this **symbol**, choose a damage type: **air, bolt, dark, earth, fire, ice, light**, or **poison**. The creature bearing this **symbol** gains Resistance to the chosen damage type.

en: If a **Villain** is present on the scene, any Opposed Checks made by the creature bearing this **symbol** trigger a **critical success** when both dice show the same number (as long as the Check is not a **fumble**).
it: Se un **Cattivo** è presente nella scena, qualsiasi Test Contrapposto effettuato dalla creatura su cui è impresso questo **simbolo** genera un **successo critico** se i due dadi mostrano lo stesso numero (e non è un **fallimento critico**).
de: If a **Villain** is present on the scene, any Opposed Checks made by the creature bearing this **symbol** trigger a **critical success** when both dice show the same number (as long as the Check is not a **fumble**).
pl: If a **Villain** is present on the scene, any Opposed Checks made by the creature bearing this **symbol** trigger a **critical success** when both dice show the same number (as long as the Check is not a **fumble**).
fr: Si un **Méchant** est présent lors de cette scène, tous les tests opposés qu'effectue la créature portant ce **symbole** déclenchent une **réussite critique** lorsque les deux dés affichent le même nombre (à condition qu'il ne s'agisse pas d'un **échec critique**).
es: If a **Villain** is present on the scene, any Opposed Checks made by the creature bearing this **symbol** trigger a **critical success** when both dice show the same number (as long as the Check is not a **fumble**).
pt-BR: Se um **Vilão** estiver presente na cena, qualquer Teste Oposto feito pela criatura com este **símbolo** desencadeia um **sucesso crítico** quando ambos os dados mostram o mesmo número (desde que o Teste não seja uma **falha crítica**).

en: If the creature bearing this **symbol** is about to be reduced to 0 Hit Points, they may destroy this **symbol**: if they do, they are instead reduced to exactly 1 Hit Point.
it: Se la creatura su cui è impresso questo **simbolo** sta per essere ridotta a 0 Punti Vita, essa può distruggerlo: se lo fa, rimane invece con esattamente 1 Punto Vita.
de: If the creature bearing this **symbol** is about to be reduced to 0 Hit Points, they may destroy this **symbol**: if they do, they are instead reduced to exactly 1 Hit Point.
pl: If the creature bearing this **symbol** is about to be reduced to 0 Hit Points, they may destroy this **symbol**: if they do, they are instead reduced to exactly 1 Hit Point.
fr: Si la créature qui porte ce **symbole** est sur le point de tomber à 0 Point de Vie, elle peut détruire ce **symbole** : dans ce cas, elle tombe exactement à 1 Point de Vie à la place.
es: If the creature bearing this **symbol** is about to be reduced to 0 Hit Points, they may destroy this **symbol**: if they do, they are instead reduced to exactly 1 Hit Point.
pt-BR: Se a criatura que carrega este **símbolo** estiver prestes a ser reduzida a 0 Pontos de Vida, ela pode destruir este **símbolo**: se o fizer, ela será reduzida a exatamente 1 Ponto de Vida.

en: When a creature in **Crisis** hits the creature bearing this **symbol** with an attack or offensive spell (⚡), the creature in **Crisis** recovers 5 Hit Points and 5 Mind Points.
it: Quando una creatura in **Crisi** colpisce la creatura su cui è impresso questo **simbolo** con un attacco o incantesimo offensivo (⚡), la creatura in **Crisi** recupera 5 Punti Vita e 5 Punti Mente.
de: When a creature in **Crisis** hits the creature bearing this **symbol** with an attack or offensive spell (⚡), the creature in **Crisis** recovers 5 Hit Points and 5 Mind Points.
pl: When a creature in **Crisis** hits the creature bearing this **symbol** with an attack or offensive spell (⚡), the creature in **Crisis** recovers 5 Hit Points and 5 Mind Points.
fr: Quand une créature en **Crise** touche celle qui porte ce **symbole** avec une attaque ou un sort offensif (⚡), la créature en **Crise** récupère 5 Points de Vie et 5 Points de Magie.
es: When a creature in **Crisis** hits the creature bearing this **symbol** with an attack or offensive spell (⚡), the creature in **Crisis** recovers 5 Hit Points and 5 Mind Points.
pt-BR: Quando uma criatura em **Crise** atinge a criatura que possui este **símbolo** com um ataque ou magia ofensiva (⚡), a criatura em **Crise** recupera 5 Pontos de Vida e 5 Pontos Mentais.

en: When the creature bearing this **symbol** suffers damage, if you are able to see them, you may destroy this **symbol**: if you do, you suffer the same amount of damage instead of that creature.
it: Quando la creatura su cui è impresso questo **simbolo** subisce danno, se sei in grado di vederla, puoi decidere di distruggere questo **simbolo**: se lo fai, subisci il medesimo ammontare di danno al posto di quella creatura.
de: When the creature bearing this **symbol** suffers damage, if you are able to see them, you may destroy this **symbol**: if you do, you suffer the same amount of damage instead of that creature.
pl: When the creature bearing this **symbol** suffers damage, if you are able to see them, you may destroy this **symbol**: if you do, you suffer the same amount of damage instead of that creature.
fr: Quand une créature qui porte ce **symbole** subit des dégâts et si vous la voyez, vous pouvez détruire ce **symbole** : dans ce cas, c'est vous qui les subissez à sa place.
es: When the creature bearing this **symbol** suffers damage, if you are able to see them, you may destroy this **symbol**: if you do, you suffer the same amount of damage instead of that creature.
pt-BR: Quando a criatura que carrega este **símbolo** sofre dano, se você puder vê-la, você pode destruir este **símbolo**: se fizer isso, você sofre a mesma quantidade de dano em vez daquela criatura.

en: The total Mind Point cost of spells that target the creature bearing this **symbol** is reduced by 5 MP (to a minimum total cost of 5 MP). If a spell targets multiple creatures bearing this **symbol**, the effect will be **cumulative**.
it: Il costo totale in Punti Mente degli incantesimi che bersagliano la creatura su cui è impresso questo **simbolo** è ridotto di 5 (fino a un costo totale minimo di 5 PM). Se un incantesimo bersaglia molteplici creature con questo **simbolo**, l’effetto è **cumulativo**.
de: The total Mind Point cost of spells that target the creature bearing this **symbol** is reduced by 5 MP (to a minimum total cost of 5 MP). If a spell targets multiple creatures bearing this **symbol**, the effect will be **cumulative**.
pl: The total Mind Point cost of spells that target the creature bearing this **symbol** is reduced by 5 MP (to a minimum total cost of 5 MP). If a spell targets multiple creatures bearing this **symbol**, the effect will be **cumulative**.
fr: Le coût total en Points de Magie des sorts prenant pour cible la créature qui porte ce **symbole** diminue de 5 PM (pour un coût minimum de 5 PM). Si un sort vise plusieurs créatures portant ce **symbole**, l'effet est **cumulatif**.
es: The total Mind Point cost of spells that target the creature bearing this **symbol** is reduced by 5 MP (to a minimum total cost of 5 MP). If a spell targets multiple creatures bearing this **symbol**, the effect will be **cumulative**.
pt-BR: O custo total de Mind Points de magias que têm como alvo a criatura que carrega este **símbolo** é reduzido em 5 PM (para um custo total mínimo de 5 PM). Se uma magia tem como alvo múltiplas criaturas que carregam este **símbolo**, o efeito será **cumulativo**.

en: Checks performed to examine or locate the creature bearing this **symbol**, as well as Accuracy Checks and Magic Checks for attacks and offensive spells (⚡) that include the creature bearing this **symbol** among their targets, gain a +2 bonus. If an attack or spell targets multiple creatures bearing this **symbol**, the effect will be **cumulative**.
it: I Test effettuati per esaminare la creatura su cui è impresso questo **simbolo**, nonché i Test di Precisione e i Test di Magia per incantesimi offensivi (⚡) contro di essa, ricevono un bonus di +2.
de: Checks performed to examine or locate the creature bearing this **symbol**, as well as Accuracy Checks and Magic Checks for attacks and offensive spells (⚡) that include the creature bearing this **symbol** among their targets, gain a +2 bonus. If an attack or spell targets multiple creatures bearing this **symbol**, the effect will be **cumulative**.
pl: Checks performed to examine or locate the creature bearing this **symbol**, as well as Accuracy Checks and Magic Checks for attacks and offensive spells (⚡) that include the creature bearing this **symbol** among their targets, gain a +2 bonus. If an attack or spell targets multiple creatures bearing this **symbol**, the effect will be **cumulative**.
fr: Les tests effectués pour examiner ou localiser la créature qui porte ce **symbole**, ainsi que les tests de précision et de magie des attaques et sorts offensifs (⚡) qui l'incluent parmi les cibles bénéficient d'un bonus de +2. Si une attaque ou un sort vise plusieurs créatures portant ce **symbole**, l'effet est **cumulatif**.
es: Checks performed to examine or locate the creature bearing this **symbol**, as well as Accuracy Checks and Magic Checks for attacks and offensive spells (⚡) that include the creature bearing this **symbol** among their targets, gain a +2 bonus. If an attack or spell targets multiple creatures bearing this **symbol**, the effect will be **cumulative**.
pt-BR: Testes realizados para examinar ou localizar a criatura que carrega este **símbolo**, bem como Testes de Precisão e Testes de Magia para ataques e magias ofensivas (⚡) que incluem a criatura que carrega este **símbolo** entre seus alvos, ganham um bônus de +2. Se um ataque ou magia tiver como alvo múltiplas criaturas que carregam este **símbolo**, o efeito será **cumulativo**.

en: When you create this **symbol**, choose a damage type: **air, bolt, dark, earth, fire, ice, light**, or **poison**. The creature bearing this **symbol** suffers 5 extra damage from sources dealing damage of the chosen type.
it: Quando crei questo **simbolo**, scegli un tipo di danno tra: **aria, fulmine, fuoco, ghiaccio, luce, ombra, terra** e **veleno**. La creatura su cui è impresso questo **simbolo** subisce 5 danni extra da tutte le fonti che infliggono danni del tipo scelto.

es: When you create this **symbol**, choose a damage type: **air, bolt, dark, earth, fire, ice, light**, or **poison**. The creature bearing this **symbol** suffers 5 extra damage from sources dealing damage of the chosen type.

en: On your turn during a conflict scene, if you have no **martial armor** equipped, you may spend 10 Mind Points to **perform a dance** you have learned. This doesn’t require an action, but it can only be done **before or after** an action, and only **once per turn**. If you already performed a **different dance** during your previous turn in this scene, the cost of the new **dance** is reduced to 5 Mind Points.
it: Nel tuo turno durante un conflitto, se non hai un’**armatura marziale** equipaggiata, puoi spendere 10 Punti Mente per **eseguire una danza** tra quelle che hai imparato; ciò non richiede un’azione, ma puoi farlo solo **prima o dopo** un’azione, e solo **una volta per turno**. Se hai già eseguito una danza **differente** nel tuo turno precedente di questa scena, il costo della nuova **danza** è ridotto a 5 Punti Mente.
de: On your turn during a conflict scene, if you have no **martial armor** equipped, you may spend 10 Mind Points to **perform a dance** you have learned. This doesn’t require an action, but it can only be done **before or after** an action, and only **once per turn**. If you already performed a **different dance** during your previous turn in this scene, the cost of the new **dance** is reduced to 5 Mind Points.
pl: On your turn during a conflict scene, if you have no **martial armor** equipped, you may spend 10 Mind Points to **perform a dance** you have learned. This doesn’t require an action, but it can only be done **before or after** an action, and only **once per turn**. If you already performed a **different dance** during your previous turn in this scene, the cost of the new **dance** is reduced to 5 Mind Points.
fr: À votre tour pendant une scène de conflit, si vous n'êtes équipé d'aucune **armure martiale**, vous pouvez dépenser 10 Points de Magie pour **réaliser une danse** que vous avez apprise. Vous n'avez pas besoin d'utiliser une action pour le faire, mais vous ne pouvez danser de la sorte qu'**avant ou après** une action et seulement **une fois par tour**. Si vous avez déjà exécuté une **danse différente** pendant votre tour précédent lors de cette scène, le coût de la nouvelle **danse** diminue de 5 Points de Magie.
es: On your turn during a conflict scene, if you have no **martial armor** equipped, you may spend 10 Mind Points to **perform a dance** you have learned. This doesn’t require an action, but it can only be done **before or after** an action, and only **once per turn**. If you already performed a **different dance** during your previous turn in this scene, the cost of the new **dance** is reduced to 5 Mind Points.
pt-BR: No seu turno durante uma cena de conflito, se você não tiver nenhuma **armadura marcial** equipada, você pode gastar 10 Pontos Mentais para **executar uma dança** que você aprendeu. Isso não requer uma ação, mas só pode ser feito **antes ou depois** de uma ação, e apenas **uma vez por turno**. Se você já executou uma **dança diferente** durante seu turno anterior nesta cena, o custo da nova **dança** é reduzido para 5 Pontos Mentais.

fr: Modifier les paramètres de la Danse

de: Choose one option: you gain Resistance to **earth** damage; **or** all damage dealt by your attacks and spells becomes **earth**.
pl: Choose one option: you gain Resistance to **earth** damage; **or** all damage dealt by your attacks and spells becomes **earth**.
fr: Choisissez une option : vous obtenez une résistance aux dégâts de **terre ou** tous les dégâts infligés par vos sorts et attaques deviennent de type **terre**.
es: Choose one option: you gain Resistance to **earth** damage; **or** all damage dealt by your attacks and spells becomes **earth**.
pt-BR: Escolha uma opção: você ganha Resistência a dano de **terra**; **ou** todo o dano causado por seus ataques e magias se torna **terra**.

en: Choose another creature that is able to see you. If that creature is already **shaken**, they immediately suffer **weak**.
it: Scegli un’altra creatura in grado di vederti: se quella creatura è già afflitta dallo status **scosso**, subisce immediatamente lo status **debole**.
de: Choose another creature that is able to see you. If that creature is already **shaken**, they immediately suffer **weak**.
pl: Choose another creature that is able to see you. If that creature is already **shaken**, they immediately suffer **weak**.
fr: Choisissez une autre créature capable de vous voir. Si elle est déjà **traumatisée**, elle subit immédiatement l'état **affaibli**.
es: Choose another creature that is able to see you. If that creature is already **shaken**, they immediately suffer **weak**.
pt-BR: Escolha outra criatura que seja capaz de ver você. Se essa criatura já estiver **abalada**, ela imediatamente sofre **fraco**.

en: Choose one ally you can see who has yet to take a turn during this round. That ally may take their turn immediately after yours during this round.
it: Scegli un alleato a te visibile che deve ancora svolgere il suo turno in questo round: quell’alleato può svolgere il suo turno immediatamente dopo il tuo.
de: Choose one ally you can see who has yet to take a turn during this round. That ally may take their turn immediately after yours during this round.
pl: Choose one ally you can see who has yet to take a turn during this round. That ally may take their turn immediately after yours during this round.
fr: Choisissez un allié que vous voyez et qui n'a pas encore joué son tour durant ce round. Cet allié peut jouer son tour immédiatement après le vôtre pendant ce round.
es: Choose one ally you can see who has yet to take a turn during this round. That ally may take their turn immediately after yours during this round.
pt-BR: Escolha um aliado que você possa ver que ainda não tenha jogado durante esta rodada. Esse aliado pode jogar seu turno imediatamente após o seu durante esta rodada.

en: Choose another creature that is able to see you. The next time that creature performs an attack or casts an offensive spell (⚡) during this scene, that attack or spell must include you among its targets if possible.
it: Scegli un’altra creatura in grado di vederti: la prossima volta che quella creatura esegue un attacco o lancia un incantesimo offensivo (⚡) durante questa scena, quell’attacco o incantesimo deve includerti tra i bersagli, se possibile.
de: Choose another creature that is able to see you. The next time that creature performs an attack or casts an offensive spell (⚡) during this scene, that attack or spell must include you among its targets if possible.
pl: Choose another creature that is able to see you. The next time that creature performs an attack or casts an offensive spell (⚡) during this scene, that attack or spell must include you among its targets if possible.
fr: Choisissez une autre créature capable de vous voir. La prochaine fois qu'elle effectue une attaque ou lance un sort offensif (⚡) pendant cette scène, l'attaque ou le sort doit vous inclure dans les cibles si possible.
es: Choose another creature that is able to see you. The next time that creature performs an attack or casts an offensive spell (⚡) during this scene, that attack or spell must include you among its targets if possible.
pt-BR: Escolha outra criatura que seja capaz de ver você. Na próxima vez que essa criatura realizar um ataque ou conjurar uma magia ofensiva (⚡) durante essa cena, esse ataque ou magia deve incluir você entre seus alvos, se possível.

en: Choose one option: you gain Resistance to **fire** damage; **or** all damage dealt by your attacks and spells becomes **fire**.
it: Scegli un’opzione: ottieni Resistenza ai danni da **fuoco**; **oppure** tutto il danno causato dai tuoi attacchi e dai tuoi incantesimi diventa da **fuoco**.
de: Choose one option: you gain Resistance to **fire** damage; **or** all damage dealt by your attacks and spells becomes **fire**.
pl: Choose one option: you gain Resistance to **fire** damage; **or** all damage dealt by your attacks and spells becomes **fire**.
fr: Choisissez une option : vous obtenez une résistance aux dégâts de **feu ou** tous les dégâts infligés par vos sorts et attaques deviennent de type **feu**.
es: Choose one option: you gain Resistance to **fire** damage; **or** all damage dealt by your attacks and spells becomes **fire**.
pt-BR: Escolha uma opção: você ganha Resistência a dano de **fogo**; **ou** todo o dano causado por seus ataques e magias se torna **fogo**.

en: Choose another creature that is able to see you. If that creature is already **weak**, they immediately suffer **dazed**.
it: Scegli un’altra creatura in grado di vederti: se quella creatura è già afflitta dallo status **debole**, subisce immediatamente lo status **confuso**.
de: Choose another creature that is able to see you. If that creature is already **weak**, they immediately suffer **dazed**.
pl: Choose another creature that is able to see you. If that creature is already **weak**, they immediately suffer **dazed**.
fr: Choisissez une autre créature capable de vous voir. Si elle est déjà **affaiblie**, elle subit immédiatement l'état **étourdi**.
es: Choose another creature that is able to see you. If that creature is already **weak**, they immediately suffer **dazed**.
pt-BR: Escolha outra criatura que seja capaz de ver você. Se essa criatura já estiver **fraca**, ela imediatamente sofre **atordoamento**.

en: Choose an ally that is able to see you and has a Bond towards you: you and that ally both recover an amount of Hit Points equal to your current **Dexterity** die size. The restored amount increases by 5 Hit Points if you are **level 20 or higher**, or by 10 Hit Points if you are **level 40 or higher**.
it: Scegli un alleato in grado di vederti che abbia un Legame verso di te: tu e quell’alleato recuperate un ammontare di Punti Vita pari alla tua taglia di dado attuale di **Destrezza**. L’ammontare recuperato aumenta di 5 Punti Vita se sei di **livello 20 o superiore**, oppure di 10 Punti Vita se sei di **livello 40 o superiore**.
de: Choose an ally that is able to see you and has a Bond towards you: you and that ally both recover an amount of Hit Points equal to your current **Dexterity** die size. The restored amount increases by 5 Hit Points if you are **level 20 or higher**, or by 10 Hit Points if you are **level 40 or higher**.
pl: Choose an ally that is able to see you and has a Bond towards you: you and that ally both recover an amount of Hit Points equal to your current **Dexterity** die size. The restored amount increases by 5 Hit Points if you are **level 20 or higher**, or by 10 Hit Points if you are **level 40 or higher**.
fr: Choisissez un allié capable de vous voir et qui a un lien avec vous : cet allié et vous récupérez un nombre de Points de Vie égal à la taille actuelle de votre dé de **Dextérité**. La quantité de points récupérés augmente de 5 Points de Vie si vous êtes de **niveau 20 ou plus**, ou de 10 Points de Vie si vous êtes de **niveau 40 ou plus**.
es: Choose an ally that is able to see you and has a Bond towards you: you and that ally both recover an amount of Hit Points equal to your current **Dexterity** die size. The restored amount increases by 5 Hit Points if you are **level 20 or higher**, or by 10 Hit Points if you are **level 40 or higher**.
pt-BR: Escolha um aliado que seja capaz de ver você e tenha um Vínculo com você: você e esse aliado recuperam uma quantidade de Pontos de Vida igual ao tamanho atual do seu dado de **Destreza**. A quantidade restaurada aumenta em 5 Pontos de Vida se você for **nível 20 ou superior**, ou em 10 Pontos de Vida se você for **nível 40 ou superior**.

en: Choose one option: you gain Resistance to **ice** damage; **or** all damage dealt by your attacks and spells becomes **ice**.
it: Scegli un’opzione: ottieni Resistenza ai danni da **ghiaccio**; **oppure** tutto il danno causato dai tuoi attacchi e dai tuoi incantesimi diventa da **ghiaccio**.
de: Choose one option: you gain Resistance to **ice** damage; **or** all damage dealt by your attacks and spells becomes **ice**.
pl: Choose one option: you gain Resistance to **ice** damage; **or** all damage dealt by your attacks and spells becomes **ice**.
fr: Choisissez une option : vous obtenez une résistance aux dégâts de **glace ou** tous les dégâts infligés par vos sorts et attaques deviennent de type **glace**.
es: Choose one option: you gain Resistance to **ice** damage; **or** all damage dealt by your attacks and spells becomes **ice**.
pt-BR: Escolha uma opção: você ganha Resistência a dano de **gelo**; **ou** todo o dano causado por seus ataques e magias se torna **gelo**.

en: Choose any number of creatures you can see: each of them suffers **(choose one: dazed, shaken, slow, weak)**.
it: Il PNG sceglie un qualsiasi numero di creature a lui visibili: ciascuna di esse subisce lo status (**scegliere uno tra: confuso, debole, lento** e **scosso**).
de: Choose any number of creatures you can see: each of them suffers **(choose one: dazed, shaken, slow, weak)**.
pl: Choose any number of creatures you can see: each of them suffers **(choose one: dazed, shaken, slow, weak)**.
fr: Choisissez autant de créatures que vous voulez parmi celles que vous voyez ; chacune subit l'état **(choisissez un état : étourdi, traumatisé, ralenti ou affaibli)**.
es: Choose any number of creatures you can see: each of them suffers **(choose one: dazed, shaken, slow, weak)**.
pt-BR: Escolha qualquer número de criaturas que você possa ver: cada uma delas sofre **(escolha uma: atordoada, abalada, lenta, fraca)**.

it: Il bersaglio subisce **【 TM + 10】** danni da **(scegliere il tipo)**.
fr: La cible subit **【VH + 10】dégâts de **(choisissez un type)**.
pt-BR: O alvo sofre dano de **【RA + 10】 (escolha o tipo)**.

en: The target suffers **【HR + 15】 (choose type)** damage and suffers **(choose one: dazed, shaken, slow, weak).**
it: Il bersaglio subisce **【TM + 15】** danni da **(scegliere il tipo)** e lo status **(scegliere uno tra: confuso, debole, lento e scosso).**
de: The target suffers **【HR + 15】 (choose type)** damage and suffers **(choose one: dazed, shaken, slow, weak).**
pl:
The target suffers **【HR + 15】 (choose type)** damage and suffers **(choose one: dazed,
shaken, slow, weak).**
fr: La cible subit **【VH + 15】dégâts de **(choisissez un type)** ainsi que l'état **(choisissez un état : étourdi, traumatisé, ralenti ou affaibli)**.
es:
The target suffers **【HR + 15】 (choose type)** damage and suffers **(choose one: dazed,
shaken, slow, weak).**
pt-BR: O alvo sofre **【RA + 15】 (escolha o tipo)** de dano e sofre **(escolha um: atordoado, abalado, lento, fraco).**

en: The target suffers **(choose one: dazed, shaken, slow, weak).**
it: Il bersaglio subisce lo status (**scegliere uno tra: confuso, debole, lento** e **scosso**).
de: The target suffers **(choose one: Benommen, Erschüttert, Verlangsamt, Geschwächt)**.
pl: The target suffers **(choose one: dazed, shaken, slow, weak)**.
fr: La cible subit l'état **(choisissez un état : étourdi, traumatisé, ralenti ou affaibli)**.
es: The target suffers **(choose one: dazed, shaken, slow, weak)**.
pt-BR: O alvo sofre **(escolha um: atordoado, abalado, lento, fraco)**.

en: The target suffers **(choose two: dazed, shaken, slow, weak)**.
it: Il bersaglio subisce gli status (**scegliere due tra: confuso, debole, lento** e **scosso**).
de: The target suffers **(choose two: dazed, shaken, slow, weak)**.
pl: The target suffers **(choose two: dazed, shaken, slow, weak)**.
fr: La cible subit l'état **(choisissez deux états parmi les suivants : étourdi, traumatisé, ralenti ou affaibli)**.
es: The target suffers **(choose two: dazed, shaken, slow, weak)**.
pt-BR: O alvo sofre **(escolha dois: atordoado, abalado, lento, fraco)**.

en: Choose any number of creatures you can see: each of them suffers 30 **(choose type)** damage. You may only cast this spell **once per turn**.\nThis spell should only be given to **champion** and **elite** creatures **level 30 or higher**, and said creatures can only cast this spell during their **last turn in the round**.
it: Il PNG sceglie un qualsiasi numero di creature a lui visibili: ciascuna subisce 30 danni da **(scegliere il tipo)**. Questo incantesimo può essere lanciato solo **una volta per turno**. Questo incantesimo dovrebbe essere scelto solo per PNG di rango **élite** e **campione** di **livello 30 o più**. Inoltre, tali creature dovrebbero poterlo lanciare solo **nel loro ultimo turno del round**.
de: Choose any number of creatures you can see: each of them suffers 30 **(choose type)** damage. You may only cast this spell **once per turn**.\nThis spell should only be given to **champion** and **elite** creatures **level 30 or higher**, and said creatures can only cast this spell during their **last turn in the round**.
pl: Choose any number of creatures you can see: each of them suffers 30 **(choose type)** damage. You may only cast this spell **once per turn**.\nThis spell should only be given to **champion** and **elite** creatures **level 30 or higher**, and said creatures can only cast this spell during their **last turn in the round**.
fr: Choisissez autant de créatures que vous voulez parmi celles que vous voyez : chacune subit 30 dégâts de **(choisissez un type)**. Vous ne pouvez lancer ce sort qu'**une fois par tour**. Ce sort ne devrait être confié qu'à des PNJ de type **champion** ou **élite** de **niveau 30 ou plus**, et ceux-ci ne peuvent le lancer que lors de leur **dernier tour du round**.
es: Choose any number of creatures you can see: each of them suffers 30 **(choose type)** damage. You may only cast this spell **once per turn**.\nThis spell should only be given to **champion** and **elite** creatures **level 30 or higher**, and said creatures can only cast this spell during their **last turn in the round**.
pt-BR: Escolha qualquer número de criaturas que você possa ver: cada uma delas sofre 30 **(escolha o tipo)** de dano. Você só pode lançar este feitiço **uma vez por turno**.\nEste feitiço só deve ser dado a criaturas **campeãs** e de **elite** de **nível 30 ou superior**, e essas criaturas só podem lançar este feitiço feitiço durante seu **último turno na rodada**.

en: You recover 20 Hit Points. This amount increases to 30 Hit Points if you are **level 20 or higher**, to 40 Hit Points if you are **level 40 or higher**, or to 50 Hit Points if you are **level 60** or higher.
it: Il PNG recupera 20 Punti Vita. Questo ammontare sale a 30 Punti Vita se il PNG è di **livello 20 o superiore**, 40 Punti Vita se il PNG è di **livello 40 o superiore** o 50 Punti Vita se il PNG è di **livello 60**.
de: You recover 20 Hit Points. This amount increases to 30 Hit Points if you are **level 20 or higher**, to 40 Hit Points if you are **level 40 or higher**, or to 50 Hit Points if you are **level 60** or higher.
pl: You recover 20 Hit Points. This amount increases to 30 Hit Points if you are **level 20 or higher**, to 40 Hit Points if you are **level 40 or higher**, or to 50 Hit Points if you are **level 60** or higher.
fr: Vous récupérez 20 Points de Vie. Ce nombre passe à 30 Points de Vie si vous êtes de **niveau 20 ou plus**, à 40 Points de Vie si vous êtes de **niveau 40 ou plus**, ou à 50 Points de Vie si vous êtes de **niveau 60 ou plus**.
es: You recover 20 Hit Points. This amount increases to 30 Hit Points if you are **level 20 or higher**, to 40 Hit Points if you are **level 40 or higher**, or to 50 Hit Points if you are **level 60** or higher.
pt-BR: Você recupera 20 pontos de vida. Este valor aumenta para 30 Pontos de Vida se você estiver no **nível 20 ou superior**, para 40 Pontos de Vida se você estiver no **nível 40 ou superior**, ou para 50 Pontos de Vida se você estiver no **nível 60** ou mais alto.

en: The target suffers **【HR + 15】 (choose type)** damage. Then, you recover an amount of Hit Points equal to half the Hit Point loss they suffered.
it: Il bersaglio subisce **【 TM + 15】** danni da **(scegliere il tipo)** e il PNG recupera un ammontare di Punti Vita pari a metà dei Punti Vita persi dal bersaglio.
de: The target suffers **【HR + 15】 (choose type)** damage. Then, you recover an amount of Hit Points equal to half the Hit Point loss they suffered.
pl: The target suffers **【HR + 15】 (choose type)** damage. Then, you recover an amount of Hit Points equal to half the Hit Point loss they suffered.
fr: La cible subit **【VH + 15】dégâts de **(choisissez un type)**. Ensuite, vous regagnez un nombre de Points de Vie égal à la moitié des PV perdus par la cible.
es: The target suffers **【HR + 15】 (choose type)** damage. Then, you recover an amount of Hit Points equal to half the Hit Point loss they suffered.
pt-BR: O alvo sofre dano de **【RA + 15】 (escolha o tipo)**. Então, você recupera uma quantidade de Pontos de Vida igual à metade da perda de Pontos de Vida que sofreu.

en: The target suffers **【HR + 15】 (choose type)** damage. Then, you recover an amount of Mind Points equal to half the Hit Point loss they suffered.
it: Il bersaglio subisce **【 TM + 15】** danni da **(scegliere il tipo)** e il PNG recupera un ammontare di Punti Mente pari a metà dei Punti Vita persi dal bersaglio.
de: The target suffers **【HR + 15】 (choose type)** damage. Then, you recover an amount of Mind Points equal to half the Hit Point loss they suffered.
pl: The target suffers **【HR + 15】 (choose type)** damage. Then, you recover an amount of Mind Points equal to half the Hit Point loss they suffered.
fr: La cible subit **【VH + 15】dégâts de **(choisissez un type)**. Ensuite, vous regagnez un nombre de Points de Magie égal à la moitié des PV perdus par la cible.
es: The target suffers **【HR + 15】 (choose type)** damage. Then, you recover an amount of Mind Points equal to half the Hit Point loss they suffered.
pt-BR: O alvo sofre dano de **【RA + 15】 (escolha o tipo)**. Então, você recupera uma quantidade de Pontos Mentais igual à metade da perda de Pontos de Vida que sofreu.

en: Each target hit by this spell suffers **poisoned**.
it: Ciascun bersaglio colpito subisce lo status **avvelenato**.
de: Each target hit by this spell suffers **poisoned**.
pl: Each target hit by this spell suffers **poisoned**.
fr: Chaque cible touchée par ce sort subit l'état **empoisonné**.
es: Each target hit by this spell suffers **poisoned**.
pt-BR: Cada alvo atingido por este feitiço sofre **envenenamento**.

en: The target may immediately perform a **free attack** with a weapon they have equipped (or with a basic **attack**, if the target is an NPC).
it: Il bersaglio può eseguire immediatamente un **attacco gratuito** con un’arma equipaggiata (o con un **attacco base**, se è un PNG).
de: The target may immediately perform a **free attack** with a weapon they have equipped (or with a basic **attack**, if the target is an NPC).
pl: The target may immediately perform a **free attack** with a weapon they have equipped (or with a basic **attack**, if the target is an NPC).
fr: La cible peut immédiatement effectuer une **attaque gratuite** avec une arme dont elle est équipée (ou avec une **attaque de base** s'il s'agit d'un PNJ).
es: The target may immediately perform a **free attack** with a weapon they have equipped (or with a basic **attack**, if the target is an NPC).
pt-BR: O alvo pode realizar imediatamente um **ataque livre** com uma arma que tenha equipado (ou com um **ataque** básico, se o alvo for um PNJ).

en: Each target hit by this spell suffers **enraged**.
it: Ciascun bersaglio colpito subisce lo status **furente**.
de: Each target hit by this spell suffers **enraged**.
pl: Each target hit by this spell suffers **enraged**.
fr: Chaque cible touchée par ce sort subit l'état **enragé**.
es: Each target hit by this spell suffers **enraged**.
pt-BR: Cada alvo atingido por este feitiço fica **enfurecido**.

en: Until this spell ends, you gain Resistance to **physical** damage.
it: Fino al termine di questo incantesimo, il PNG diventa Resistente al danno **fisico**.
de: Until this spell ends, you gain Resistance to **physical** damage.
pl: Until this spell ends, you gain Resistance to **physical** damage.
fr: Jusqu'à ce que l'effet de ce sort s'achève, vous recevez une résistance aux dégâts **physiques**.
es: Until this spell ends, you gain Resistance to **physical** damage.
pt-BR: Até que este feitiço termine, você ganha Resistência a dano **físico**.

en: Until this spell ends, each target gains a +1 bonus to Accuracy Checks.
it: Fino al termine di questo incantesimo, ciascun bersaglio ottiene un bonus di +1 ai Test di Precisione.
de: Until this spell ends, each target gains a +1 bonus to Accuracy Checks.
pl: Until this spell ends, each target gains a +1 bonus to Accuracy Checks.
fr: Jusqu'à ce que l'effet de ce sort s'achève, vous recevez un bonus de +1 aux tests de précision.
es: Until this spell ends, each target gains a +1 bonus to Accuracy Checks.
pt-BR: Até que esta magia termine, cada alvo ganha +1 de bônus em testes de precisão.

en: Until this spell ends, the target suffers 5 extra damage from all sources that deal **(choose type)** damage.
it: Fino al termine di questo incantesimo, il bersaglio subisce 5 danni extra da tutte le fonti che infliggono danni da **(scegli il tipo)**.
de: Until this spell ends, the target suffers 5 extra damage from all sources that deal **(choose type)** damage.
pl: Until this spell ends, the target suffers 5 extra damage from all sources that deal **(choose type)** damage.
fr: Jusqu'à ce que l'effet de ce sort s'achève, la cible subit 5 dégâts supplémentaires de la part de toutes les sources infligeant des dégâts de **(choisissez un type)**.
es: Until this spell ends, the target suffers 5 extra damage from all sources that deal **(choose type)** damage.
pt-BR: Até que este feitiço termine, o alvo sofre 5 de dano extra de todas as fontes que causam **(escolha o tipo)** dano.

en: After you willingly **dismiss** an Arcanum on your turn during a conflict (see next page), if that Arcanum had not been **summoned** during this same turn and you have an **arcane** weapon equipped, you may immediately perform the **Spell** action for free. The spell you cast this way must have a **total Mind Point cost of**【**SL × 5**】**or lower** (you must still pay the spell's MP cost).
it: Dopo aver **congedato** volontariamente un Arcanum nel tuo turno durante un conflitto (vedi prossima pagina), se quell’Arcanum non era stato **evocato** durante il medesimo turno e hai un’arma della Categoria **arcana** equipaggiata, puoi eseguire gratuitamente l’azione di **Incantesimo**.
