Se o ataque for bem sucedido, ele não causa dano e você escolhe uma opção: você destrói um escudo equipado pelo alvo; OU você destrói a armadura equipada do alvo; OU sempre que o alvo sofrer dano de uma fonte antes do início do seu próximo turno, essa fonte causa 【NH × 2】 de dano extra a ele.

en: After an enemy **hits or misses you with a melee attack**, if the Result of their Accuracy Check was an **even number**, you may perform a **free attack** against that enemy (after their attack has been fully resolved). This attack must be a **melee attack** and must have that enemy as its **only** target; treat your **High Roll (HR)** as 0 when calculating damage dealt by this attack.
it: Dopo che un nemico **ti colpisce o ti manca con un attacco in mischia**, se il Risultato del suo Test di Precisione è un **numero pari**, puoi eseguire un **attacco gratuito** con un’arma da **mischia** equipaggiata contro quel nemico (dopo che il suo attacco è stato risolto). Questo attacco può bersagliare **solamente** quel nemico; considera il tuo **Tiro Maggiore (TM)** pari a 0 quando calcoli il danno inflitto da questo attacco.
de: After an enemy hits or misses you with a melee attack, if the Result of their Accuracy Check was an even number, you may perform a free attack against that enemy (after their attack has been fully resolved). This attack must be a melee attack and must have that enemy as its only target; treat your High Roll (HR) as 0 when calculating damage dealt by this attack.
pl: After an enemy hits or misses you with a melee attack, if the Result of their Accuracy Check was an even number, you may perform a free attack against that enemy (after their attack has been fully resolved). This attack must be a melee attack and must have that enemy as its only target; treat your High Roll (HR) as 0 when calculating damage dealt by this attack.
fr: Après qu’un **ennemi vous touche ou vous rate avec une attaque de corps à corps**, si le résultat de son test de précision était un **nombre pair**, vous pouvez réaliser une **attaque gratuite** contre lui (après la résolution de la sienne). Il doit s’agit d’une attaque de **corps à corps**, qui prend **uniquement** pour cible l’ennemi ; traitez votre **valeur haute 【VH】** comme s’il s’agissait de 0 lorsque vous en calculez les dégâts.
es: After an enemy hits or misses you with a melee attack, if the Result of their Accuracy Check was an even number, you may perform a free attack against that enemy (after their attack has been fully resolved). This attack must be a melee attack and must have that enemy as its only target; treat your High Roll (HR) as 0 when calculating damage dealt by this attack.
pt-BR: Depois que um inimigo acertar ou errar você em um ataque corpo a corpo, se o resultado da verificação de precisão for um número par, você poderá realizar um ataque livre contra esse inimigo (depois que o ataque dele tiver sido totalmente resolvido). Este ataque deve ser um ataque corpo a corpo e deve ter aquele inimigo como único alvo; trate sua Rolagem Alta (RA) como 0 ao calcular o dano causado por este ataque.

fr: Maîtrise des Armes de Corps À Corps
es: Maestría con armas cuerpo a cuerpo

en: You gain a bonus equal to【**SL**】to all Accuracy Checks with **melee** weapons.
it: Ottieni un bonus pari a 【**LA**】 a tutti i Test di Precisione con armi da **mischia**.
de: You gain a bonus equal to 【SL】 to all Accuracy Checks with melee weapons.
pl: You gain a bonus equal to 【SL】 to all Accuracy Checks with melee weapons.
fr: Vous bénéficiez d’un bonus de **【NC】** à tous les tests de précision effectués avec des armes de **corps à corps**.
es: You gain a bonus equal to 【SL】 to all Accuracy Checks with melee weapons.
pt-BR: Você ganha um bônus igual a 【NH】 em todas as verificações de precisão com armas brancas.

en: Before you perform an Accuracy Check, a Magic Check for an offensive spell (⚡), or a Check to advance or turn back a Clock, you may declare **double or nothing**. If you do and the Check triggers a **critical success**, **double** the damage dealt by that attack or spell or the filled or erased sections of that Clock, respectively; however, any other kind of success becomes a **failure** instead.
it: Prima di effettuare un Test di Precisione, un Test di Magia per un incantesimo offensivo (⚡) o un Test per riempire o svuotare sezioni di Orologio, puoi dichiarare **lascia o raddoppia**. Se lo fai e il Test genera un **successo critico**, **raddoppia** il danno inflitto dall'attacco o incantesimo o le sezioni riempite o svuotate dal Test, rispettivamente; tuttavia, qualsiasi altro tipo di successo diventa invece un **fallimento**.
de: Before you perform an Accuracy Check, a Magic Check for an offensive spell (⚡), or a Check to advance or turn back a Clock, you may declare double or nothing. If you do and the Check triggers a critical success, double the damage dealt by that attack or spell or the filled or erased sections of that Clock, respectively; however, any other Result is considered a critical failure.
pl: Before you perform an Accuracy Check, a Magic Check for an offensive spell (⚡), or a Check to advance or turn back a Clock, you may declare double or nothing. If you do and the Check triggers a critical success, double the damage dealt by that attack or spell or the filled or erased sections of that Clock, respectively; however, any other Result is considered a critical failure.
fr: Avant d'effectuer un test de précision, un test de magie pour un sort offensif (⚡) ou un test pour avancer ou reculer un Cadran, vous pouvez déclarer **quitte ou double**. Si vous le faites et que vous obtenez une **réussite critique** au test, **doublez** les dégâts infligés par l'attaque ou le sort, ou les sections remplies ou effacées du Cadran, respectivement ; cependant, tout autre succès est considéré comme un **échec**.
es: Before you perform an Accuracy Check, a Magic Check for an offensive spell (⚡), or a Check to advance or turn back a Clock, you may declare double or nothing. If you do and the Check triggers a critical success, double the damage dealt by that attack or spell or the filled or erased sections of that Clock, respectively; however, any other Result is considered a critical failure.
pt-BR: Antes de realizar uma Verificação de Precisão, uma Verificação de Magia para um feitiço ofensivo (⚡) ou uma Verificação para avançar ou retroceder um Relógio, você pode declarar o dobro ou nada. Se você fizer isso e o Teste desencadear um sucesso crítico, dobre o dano causado por aquele ataque ou feitiço ou pelas seções preenchidas ou apagadas daquele Relógio, respectivamente; entretanto, qualquer outro Resultado é considerado uma falha crítica.

en: When you generate a **critical success** or a **fumble**, you may draw 1 card from your **deck**. If you do, discard 1 card from your **hand**.
it: Quando ottieni un **successo critico** oppure un **fallimento critico**, puoi pescare 1 carta dal tuo **mazzo**. Se lo fai, scarta 1 carta dalla tua **mano**.
de: When you generate a critical success or a critical failure, you may draw 1 card from your deck. If you do, discard 1 card from your hand.
pl: When you generate a critical success or a critical failure, you may draw 1 card from your deck. If you do, discard 1 card from your hand.
fr: Lorsque vous obtenez une **réussite critique** ou un **échec critique**, vous pouvez piocher 1 carte de votre **paquet**. Si vous le faites, défaussez 1 carte de votre **main**.
es: When you generate a critical success or a critical failure, you may draw 1 card from your deck. If you do, discard 1 card from your hand.
pt-BR: Quando você gera um sucesso crítico ou uma falha crítica, você pode comprar 1 carta do seu baralho. Se fizer isso, descarte 1 carta da sua mão.

en: You gain a **deck**, a **hand** and a **discard pile**. During a conflict, you may use an action and spend up to【**10 + (SL × 5)**】Mind Points (minimum 10). If you do, **resolve 1 card** from your **hand** for every 5 MP spent this way (to a maximum of 5 cards; these cards form a **set**). After you resolve the effect of the **set** (if any), **discard** these cards and draw that many cards from your **deck**.
it: Ottieni un **mazzo**, una **mano** e una **pila degli scarti**. Durante un conflitto, puoi usare un'azione e spendere fino a 【**10 + (LA × 5)**】 Punti Mente (minimo 10). Se lo fai, **risolvi 1 carta** dalla tua **mano** per ogni 5 PM spesi in questo modo (massimo 5 carte; queste carte formano un **set**). Dopo aver risolto l'effetto del **set** (se presente), **scarta** queste carte e pescane altrettante dal tuo **mazzo**.
de: You gain a deck, a hand and a discard pile (see next page). During a conflict, you may use an action and spend up to【10 + (SL × 5)】Mind Points (minimum 10). If you do, resolve 1 card from your hand for every 5 MP spent this way (to a maximum of 5 cards; these cards form a set). After you resolve the effect of the set (if any), discard these cards and draw that many cards from your deck.
pl: You gain a deck, a hand and a discard pile (see next page). During a conflict, you may use an action and spend up to【10 + (SL × 5)】Mind Points (minimum 10). If you do, resolve 1 card from your hand for every 5 MP spent this way (to a maximum of 5 cards; these cards form a set). After you resolve the effect of the set (if any), discard these cards and draw that many cards from your deck.
fr: Vous obtenez un **paquet** et une **main** de cartes, ainsi qu'une **pile de défausse**. Au cours d'un conflit, ces cartes vous permettent d'obtenir des effets magiques grâce à des **séries** jouées à partir de votre main. Pour ce faire, vous **posez** des cartes (au moins 2 et au maximum 5) depuis votre main et payez 5 PM par carte. Vous ne pouvez dépenser au maximum de cette manière que 【10 + (NC × 5)】Points de Magie. Après avoir résolu l'effet de cette **série** (s'il y en a), **défaussez** ces cartes et piochez autant de cartes de votre **paquet**.
es: You gain a deck, a hand and a discard pile (see next page). During a conflict, you may use an action and spend up to【10 + (SL × 5)】Mind Points (minimum 10). If you do, resolve 1 card from your hand for every 5 MP spent this way (to a maximum of 5 cards; these cards form a set). After you resolve the effect of the set (if any), discard these cards and draw that many cards from your deck.
pt-BR: Você ganha um baralho, uma mão e uma pilha de descarte (veja a próxima página). Durante um conflito, você pode usar uma ação e gastar até 【10 + (NH × 5)】Pontos Mentais (mínimo 10). Se fizer isso, resolva 1 carta da sua mão para cada 5 PM gastos dessa forma (até um máximo de 5 cartas; essas cartas formam um conjunto). Depois de resolver o efeito da coleção (se houver), descarte essas cartas e compre aquela quantidade de cartas do seu baralho.

en: At the end of your turn during a conflict, you may discard up to【**SL**】cards from your **hand**. If you do, draw that many cards from your **deck**.
it: Al termine del tuo turno durante un conflitto, puoi scartare fino a 【**LA**】 carte dalla tua **mano**. Se lo fai, pesca altrettante carte dal tuo **mazzo**.
de: At the end of your turn during a conflict, you may discard up to【SL】cards from your hand. If you do, draw that many cards from your deck.
pl: At the end of your turn during a conflict, you may discard up to【SL】cards from your hand. If you do, draw that many cards from your deck.
fr: À la fin de votre tour lors d'un conflit, vous pouvez défausser jusqu'à【SL】cartes de votre **main**. Si vous les faites, piochez autant de cartes de votre **paquet**.
es: At the end of your turn during a conflict, you may discard up to【SL】cards from your hand. If you do, draw that many cards from your deck.
pt-BR: No final do seu turno durante um conflito, você pode descartar até 【NH】 cartas da sua mão. Se fizer isso, compre essa mesma quantidade de cartas do seu baralho.

en: After an enemy you can see performs an action during a conflict, you may declare one of your **deck**'s **suits** (after the action has been resolved) and put the first card on the bottom of your **deck** in your **discard pile**, face up. If that card is a **joker** or its **suit** matches the one you declared, you may immediately perform the **Spell** action for free, casting a spell with a **total Mind Point cost equal to or lower than**【**SL × 5**】(you must still pay its MP cost).
it: Dopo che un nemico a te visibile esegue un'azione durante un conflitto, puoi dichiarare uno dei **segni** del tuo **mazzo** (dopo che l'azione è stata risolta) e mettere nella tua **pila degli scarti** la prima carta dal fondo del tuo **mazzo**, scoperta. Se quella carta è un **jolly** o il suo **segno** è quello che avevi dichiarato, puoi eseguire immediatamente e gratuitamente l'azione di **Incantesimo**, lanciando un incantesimo con un **costo totale in Punti Mente pari o inferiore a** 【**LA × 5**】 (devi pagarne il costo in PM).
de: After an enemy you can see performs an action during a conflict, you may declare one of your deck's suits (after the action has been resolved) and put the first card on the bottom of your deck in your discard pile, face up. If that card is a joker or its suit matches the one you declared, you may immediately perform the Spell action for free, casting a spell with a total Mind Point cost equal to or lower than【SL × 5】(you must still pay its MP cost).
pl: After an enemy you can see performs an action during a conflict, you may declare one of your deck's suits (after the action has been resolved) and put the first card on the bottom of your deck in your discard pile, face up. If that card is a joker or its suit matches the one you declared, you may immediately perform the Spell action for free, casting a spell with a total Mind Point cost equal to or lower than【SL × 5】(you must still pay its MP cost).
fr: Après qu'un ennemi que vous pouvez voir a effectué une action au cours du conflit, vous pouvez annoncer une des **couleurs** de votre **paquet** (après la résolution de l'action) et placer la première carte du dessous de votre **paquet** sur la **pile de défausse**, face visible. Si cette carte est un **joker** ou si sa **couleur correspond à celle que vous avez annoncée, vous pouvez immédiatement effectuer gratuitement l'action **Sort**, pour lancer un sort avec un **total de Points de Magie égal ou inférieur à【NC × 5**】(vous devez tout de même payer son prix en PM).
es: After an enemy you can see performs an action during a conflict, you may declare one of your deck's suits (after the action has been resolved) and put the first card on the bottom of your deck in your discard pile, face up. If that card is a joker or its suit matches the one you declared, you may immediately perform the Spell action for free, casting a spell with a total Mind Point cost equal to or lower than【SL × 5】(you must still pay its MP cost).
pt-BR: Depois que um inimigo que você pode ver realiza uma ação durante um conflito, você pode declarar um dos naipes do seu baralho (depois que a ação for resolvida) e colocar a primeira carta no fundo do seu baralho na sua pilha de descarte, virada para cima. Se aquela carta for um curinga ou seu naipe corresponder ao que você declarou, você pode realizar imediatamente a ação de Feitiço de graça, conjurando uma mágica com um custo total de Pontos Mentais igual ou inferior a 【NH × 5】 (você ainda deve pagar seu Custo de PM).

en: When another creature you can see loses Hit Points while in **Crisis**, if they are not **undead**, you gain **1 Grave Point**. You may never have more than【**SL + 1**】Grave Points. When you are reduced to 0 Hit Points, you **lose all Grave Points**; then, if you lost at least 1 Grave Point this way and this is the **first time** you are reduced to 0 HP during this scene, you do not **Surrender** nor **Sacrifice** yourself: instead, you recover an amount of HP equal to 【**SL, multiplied by the amount of Grave Points you lost this way**】 .
it: Quando un'altra creatura a te visibile perde PV mentre è in **Crisi**, se non è un **non morto**, guadagni **1 Punto Sepolcro**. Non puoi mai avere più di 【**LA + 1**】 Punti Sepolcro. Quando vieni ridotto a 0 Punti Vita, **perdi tutti i Punti Sepolcro**; poi, se hai perso almeno 1 Punto Sepolcro in questo modo e questa è la **prima** volta che vieni ridotto a 0 PV in questa scena, non ti **Arrendi** né **Sacrifichi**: invece, recuperi un ammontare di PV pari a 【**LA, moltiplicato per il numero di Punti Sepolcro persi in questo modo**】.
de: When another creature you can see loses Hit Points while in Crisis, if they are not undead, you gain 1 Grave Point. You may never have more than 【SL + 1】 Grave Points. When you are reduced to 0 Hit Points, you lose all Grave Points; then, if you lost at least 1 Grave Point this way and this is the first time you are reduced to 0 HP during this scene, you do not Surrender nor Sacrifice yourself: instead, you recover an amount of HP equal to 【SL, multiplied by the amount of Grave Points you lost this way】 .
pl: When another creature you can see loses Hit Points while in Crisis, if they are not undead, you gain 1 Grave Point. You may never have more than 【SL + 1】 Grave Points. When you are reduced to 0 Hit Points, you lose all Grave Points; then, if you lost at least 1 Grave Point this way and this is the first time you are reduced to 0 HP during this scene, you do not Surrender nor Sacrifice yourself: instead, you recover an amount of HP equal to 【SL, multiplied by the amount of Grave Points you lost this way】 .
fr: Lorsqu'une autre créature que vous pouvez voir perd des PV alors qu'elle est en **Crise**, si ce n'est pas un **mort-vivant**, vous gagnez **1 Point de Sépulture**. Vous ne pouvez jamais en avoir plus de 【**SL + 1**】 Lorsque vous atteignez 0 PV, vous **perdez tous les Points de Sépulture** ; puis, si vous perdez au moins 1 Point de Sépulture de cette manière et que c'est la **première fois** que vous tombez à 0 PV au cours de cette scène, vous ne **vous Rendez** ni ne vous **Sacrifiez** pas. À la place, vous récupérez un nombre de PV égal à【**NC, multiplié par le nombre de Points de Sépulture que vous venez de perdre**】.
es: When another creature you can see loses Hit Points while in Crisis, if they are not undead, you gain 1 Grave Point. You may never have more than 【SL + 1】 Grave Points. When you are reduced to 0 Hit Points, you lose all Grave Points; then, if you lost at least 1 Grave Point this way and this is the first time you are reduced to 0 HP during this scene, you do not Surrender nor Sacrifice yourself: instead, you recover an amount of HP equal to 【SL, multiplied by the amount of Grave Points you lost this way】 .
pt-BR: Quando outra criatura que você pode ver perde Pontos de Vida durante uma Crise, se ela não for morta-viva, você ganha 1 Ponto de Túmulo. Você nunca pode ter mais do que 【NH + 1】 Pontos de Túmulo. Quando você é reduzido a 0 Pontos de Vida, você perde todos os Pontos de Túmulo; então, se você perdeu pelo menos 1 Ponto de Túmulo desta forma e esta é a primeira vez que você é reduzido a 0 PV durante esta cena, você não se rende nem se sacrifica: em vez disso, você recupera uma quantidade de PV igual a 【NH, multiplicado pela quantidade de Pontos de Túmulo que você perdeu dessa maneira.

en: You can always communicate verbally with **undead** creatures. Once per scene, you may ask an **undead** a single question; they are compelled to answer truthfully.
it: Puoi comunicare verbalmente con qualsiasi **non morto**. Una volta per scena, puoi porre a un **non morto** una singola domanda; è costretto a rispondere dicendo la verità.
de: You can always communicate verbally with undead creatures. Once per scene, you may ask an undead a single question; they are compelled to answer truthfully.
pl: You can always communicate verbally with undead creatures. Once per scene, you may ask an undead a single question; they are compelled to answer truthfully.
fr: Vous pouvez toujours communiquer verbalement avec les **morts-vivants**. Une fois par scène, vous pouvez poser à un **mort-vivant** une unique question ; ils doivent vous répondre honnêtement.
es: You can always communicate verbally with undead creatures. Once per scene, you may ask an undead a single question; they are compelled to answer truthfully.
pt-BR: Você sempre pode se comunicar verbalmente com criaturas mortas-vivas. Uma vez por cena, você pode fazer uma única pergunta a um morto-vivo; eles são obrigados a responder com sinceridade.

en: After you cause one or more enemies to lose Hit Points, if you have acquired the **Beyond the Realms of Death** Skill and at least one of them is suffering from **shaken** and/or **weak**, you gain 1 Grave Point and recover 【**SL × 2**】 Hit Points and Mind Points.
it: Dopo che fai sì che uno o più nemici perdano Punti Vita, se hai acquisito l'Abilità **Oltre i Reami della Morte** e almeno uno di essi è afflitto dallo status **debole** e/o **scosso**, guadagni 1 Punto Sepolcro e recuperi 【**LA × 2**】 Punti Vita e Punti Mente.
de: After you cause one or more enemies to lose Hit Points, if you have acquired the Beyond the Realms of Death Skill and at least one of them is suffering from shaken and/or weak, you gain 1 Grave Point and recover 【SL × 2】 Hit Points and Mind Points.
pl: After you cause one or more enemies to lose Hit Points, if you have acquired the Beyond the Realms of Death Skill and at least one of them is suffering from shaken and/or weak, you gain 1 Grave Point and recover 【SL × 2】 Hit Points and Mind Points.
fr: Après avoir provoqué une perte de Points de Vie chez un ou plusieurs ennemis, si vous avez obtenu la Compétence **Au-delà du royaume des morts** et qu'au moins l'un d'entre eux subits un état **affaibli** et/ou **traumatisé,** vous gagnez 1 Point de Sépulture et récupérez【**NC × 2**】Points de Vie et Points de Magie.
es: After you cause one or more enemies to lose Hit Points, if you have acquired the Beyond the Realms of Death Skill and at least one of them is suffering from shaken and/or weak, you gain 1 Grave Point and recover 【SL × 2】 Hit Points and Mind Points.
pt-BR: Depois de fazer com que um ou mais inimigos percam Pontos de Vida, se você adquiriu o Poder Além dos Reinos da Morte e pelo menos um deles está abalado e/ou fraco, você ganha 1 Ponto de Túmulo e recupera 【NH × 2】 Pontos de vida e Pontos Mentais.

en: When you **deal damage to a creature with a spell**, if that spell **only deals damage to that creature**, you may spend 1 Grave Point. If you do, choose one option: if that creature is suffering from one or more status effects, the spell deals extra damage equal to【**(SL × 2) + the number of status effects on that creature**】; **or** if that creature is suffering from no status effects, they suffer **shaken**.
it: Quando **infliggi danno a una creatura con un incantesimo**, se quell'incantesimo **infligge danno solo a quella creatura**, puoi spendere 1 Punto Sepolcro. Se lo fai, scegli un'opzione: se quella creatura è afflitta da uno o più status, l'incantesimo infligge danni extra pari a 【**(LA × 2) + il numero di status presenti sulla creatura**】; **oppure** se quella creatura non è afflitta da status, subisce lo status **scosso**.
de: When you deal damage to a creature with a spell, if that spell only deals damage to that creature, you may spend 1 Grave Point. If you do, choose one option: if that creature is suffering from one or more status effects, the spell deals extra damage equal to 【(SL × 2) + the number of status effects on that creature】; or if that creature is suffering from no status effects, they suffer shaken.
pl: When you deal damage to a creature with a spell, if that spell only deals damage to that creature, you may spend 1 Grave Point. If you do, choose one option: if that creature is suffering from one or more status effects, the spell deals extra damage equal to 【(SL × 2) + the number of status effects on that creature】; or if that creature is suffering from no status effects, they suffer shaken.
fr: Lorsque vous **infligez des dégâts à une unique créature avec un sort**, vous pouvez dépenser 1 Point de Sépulture. Choisissez alors une option : si cette créature subit un ou plusieurs états, le sort inflige【**(NC × 2) + le nombre d'états sur cette créature**】dégâts supplémentaires ; **ou** si cette créature ne subit aucun effet, elle devient **traumatisée**.
es: When you deal damage to a creature with a spell, if that spell only deals damage to that creature, you may spend 1 Grave Point. If you do, choose one option: if that creature is suffering from one or more status effects, the spell deals extra damage equal to 【(SL × 2) + the number of status effects on that creature】; or if that creature is suffering from no status effects, they suffer shaken.
pt-BR: Quando você causar dano a uma criatura com um feitiço, se esse feitiço causar dano apenas àquela criatura, você poderá gastar 1 Ponto de Túmulo. Se fizer isso, escolha uma opção: se aquela criatura estiver sofrendo um ou mais efeitos de status, a magia causa dano extra igual a 【(NH × 2) + o número de efeitos de status naquela criatura】; ou se aquela criatura não estiver sofrendo nenhum efeito de status, ela ficará abalada.

en: When you cast an offensive spell (⚡) with a **target** of “One creature”, you may spend 2 Grave Points to have it target **all** creatures you can see that are present on the scene (perform a single Magic Check and confront it with the Magic Defense of each target). If you do, all damage dealt by the spell becomes **dark** and its type cannot change.
it: Quando lanci un incantesimo offensivo (⚡) con **bersaglio** "Una creatura", puoi spendere 2 Punti Sepolcro per fargli bersagliare **tutte** le creature a te visibili nella scena (effettui un singolo Test di Magia e lo confronti con la Difesa Magica di ciascun bersaglio). Se lo fai, tutto il danno inflitto dall'incantesimo diventa **ombra** e non può cambiare tipo.
de: When you cast an offensive spell (⚡) with a target of “One creature”, you may spend 2 Grave Points to have it target all creatures you can see that are present on the scene (perform a single Magic Check and confront it with the Magic Defense of each target). If you do, all damage dealt by the spell becomes dark and its type cannot change.
pl: When you cast an offensive spell (⚡) with a target of “One creature”, you may spend 2 Grave Points to have it target all creatures you can see that are present on the scene (perform a single Magic Check and confront it with the Magic Defense of each target). If you do, all damage dealt by the spell becomes dark and its type cannot change.
fr: Lorsque vous lancez un sort offensif (⚡) dont la **cible** est ♠ une créature », vous pouvez dépenser 2 Points de Sépulture pour cibler **toutes** les créatures que vous voyez et qui sont présentes dans la scène (effectuez un simple Test de magie et confrontez-le à la Défense magique de chaque cible). Si vous le faites, tous les dégâts infligés par le sort deviennent des dégâts de **ténèbres** et leur type ne peut pas changer.
es: When you cast an offensive spell (⚡) with a target of “One creature”, you may spend 2 Grave Points to have it target all creatures you can see that are present on the scene (perform a single Magic Check and confront it with the Magic Defense of each target). If you do, all damage dealt by the spell becomes dark and its type cannot change.
pt-BR: Quando você lança um feitiço ofensivo (⚡) com o alvo de “Uma criatura”, você pode gastar 2 Pontos de Túmulo para que ele atinja todas as criaturas que você puder ver e que estejam presentes na cena (realize um único Teste Mágico e confronte-o com o Defesa Mágica de cada alvo). Se você fizer isso, todo o dano causado pelo feitiço se tornará trevas e seu tipo não poderá mudar.

en: On your turn during a conflict scene, you may use an action and spend a variable amount of MP to weave voice and music into a magical effect known as a **verse**. You may only sing **one verse** per turn, even if you have access to multiple actions. When you first acquire this Skill, you learn all **three volumes**, plus **one key** and **one tone**. Whenever you acquire this Skill again, you may learn **one key or one tone** (your choice).
it: Nel tuo turno durante un conflitto, puoi usare un’azione e spendere un ammontare variabile di Punti Mente per combinare musica e voce in un effetto magico, chiamato **verso**. Puoi cantare **un solo verso** per turno, anche se hai accesso a più di un’azione. Quando acquisisci questa Abilità per la prima volta, impari **tutti i tipi di volume, una chiave** e **un tono**; ogni volta che acquisisci nuovamente questa Abilità, impari **una chiave o un tono** (a tua scelta).
de: On your turn during a conflict scene, you may use an action and spend a variable amount of MP to weave voice and music into a magical effect known as a verse. You may only sing one verse per turn, even if you have access to multiple actions. When you first acquire this Skill, you learn all three volumes, plus one key and one tone. Whenever you acquire this Skill again, you may learn one key or one tone (your choice).
pl: On your turn during a conflict scene, you may use an action and spend a variable amount of MP to weave voice and music into a magical effect known as a verse. You may only sing one verse per turn, even if you have access to multiple actions. When you first acquire this Skill, you learn all three volumes, plus one key and one tone. Whenever you acquire this Skill again, you may learn one key or one tone (your choice).
fr: À votre tour, pendant une scène de conflit, vous pouvez utiliser une action et dépenser un nombre variable de PM pour entremêler votre voix et votre musique afin de créer un effet magique baptisé **couplet**. Vous ne pouvez chanter qu’**un couplet** par tour, même si vous disposez de plusieurs actions ; les règles complètes des **couplets** commencent page suivante. Quand vous obtenez cette compétence pour la première fois, vous apprenez **les trois volumes**, plus **une clef** et **un ton**. Dès que vous apprenez de nouveau la compétence, vous pouvez prendre **une clef ou un ton** de plus (à vous de choisir).
es: On your turn during a conflict scene, you may use an action and spend a variable amount of MP to weave voice and music into a magical effect known as a verse. You may only sing one verse per turn, even if you have access to multiple actions. When you first acquire this Skill, you learn all three volumes, plus one key and one tone. Whenever you acquire this Skill again, you may learn one key or one tone (your choice).
pt-BR: No seu turno, durante uma cena de conflito, você pode usar uma ação e gastar uma quantidade variável de PM para transformar voz e música em um efeito mágico conhecido como verso. Você só pode cantar um verso por turno, mesmo que tenha acesso a múltiplas ações. Ao adquirir esse Poder pela primeira vez, você aprende todos os três volumes, mais uma tonalidade e um tom. Sempre que você adquirir esse Poder novamente, você poderá aprender uma tonalidade ou um tom (sua escolha).

en: After you affect one or more enemies with a **verse**, if you have an **arcane** weapon equipped, you may choose one option: until the start of your next turn, your allies deal【**SL**】extra damage to those enemies; **or** until the start of your next turn, you recover【**SL**】Mind Points **every time** one of those enemies suffers damage (if the same source deals damage to two or more of those enemies at the same time, you recover【**SL**】MP for each damaged enemy).
it: Dopo che uno o più nemici subiscono gli effetti di un tuo **verso**, se hai un’arma della Categoria **arcana** equipaggiata, puoi scegliere un’opzione: fino all’inizio del tuo prossimo turno, i tuoi alleati infliggono 【**LA**】 danni extra a quei nemici; **oppure** fino all’inizio del tuo prossimo turno, recuperi 【**LA**】 Punti Mente **ogni volta** che uno di quei nemici subisce danno (se la medesima fonte danneggia due o più di quei nemici contemporaneamente, recuperi 【**LA**】 Punti Mente per ciascun nemico danneggiato).
de: After you affect one or more enemies with a verse, if you have an arcane weapon equipped, you may choose one option: until the start of your next turn, your allies deal【SL】extra damage to those enemies; OR until the start of your next turn, you recover【SL】Mind Points every time one of those enemies suffers damage (if the same source deals damage to two or more of those enemies at the same time, you recover【SL】MP for each damaged enemy).
pl: After you affect one or more enemies with a verse, if you have an arcane weapon equipped, you may choose one option: until the start of your next turn, your allies deal【SL】extra damage to those enemies; OR until the start of your next turn, you recover【SL】Mind Points every time one of those enemies suffers damage (if the same source deals damage to two or more of those enemies at the same time, you recover【SL】MP for each damaged enemy).
fr: Après avoir affecté un ou plusieurs ennemis avec un **couplet**, si vous êtes équipé d’une arme **arcanique**, vous pouvez choisir une option : jusqu’au début de votre prochain tour, vos alliés infligent **【NC】** dégâts supplémentaires à ces ennemis ; **ou** jusqu’au début de votre prochain tour, vous récupérez **【NC】** Points de Magie **chaque fois** qu’un de ces ennemis subit des dégâts (si la même source inflige des dégâts à deux de ces ennemis ou plus en même temps, vous récupérez **【NC】** PM pour chaque ennemi endommagé).
es: After you affect one or more enemies with a verse, if you have an arcane weapon equipped, you may choose one option: until the start of your next turn, your allies deal【SL】extra damage to those enemies; OR until the start of your next turn, you recover【SL】Mind Points every time one of those enemies suffers damage (if the same source deals damage to two or more of those enemies at the same time, you recover【SL】MP for each damaged enemy).
pt-BR: Depois de afetar um ou mais inimigos com um verso, se você tiver uma arma arcana equipada, você pode escolher uma opção: até o início do seu próximo turno, seus aliados causam 【NH】 dano extra a esses inimigos; OU até o início do seu próximo turno, você recupera【NH】Pontos Mentais toda vez que um desses inimigos sofre dano (se a mesma fonte causa dano a dois ou mais desses inimigos ao mesmo tempo, você recupera【NH】PM por cada inimigo danificado).

en: You gain the ability to perform Rituals of the **Ritualism** discipline; additionally, you may use **Ritualism** to create **hearing-based illusions**.
it: Puoi eseguire Rituali i cui effetti rientrino nella disciplina di **Ritualismo**; in più, puoi usare il **Ritualismo** per creare **illusioni basate sull’udito**.
de: You gain the ability to perform Rituals of the Ritualism discipline; additionally, you may use Ritualism to create hearing-based illusions.
pl: You gain the ability to perform Rituals of the Ritualism discipline; additionally, you may use Ritualism to create hearing-based illusions.
fr: Vous êtes capable de réaliser des rituels de la discipline **Ritualisme** ; **de plus**, vous pouvez utiliser **Ritualisme** pour créer **des illusions auditives**.
es: You gain the ability to perform Rituals of the Ritualism discipline; additionally, you may use Ritualism to create hearing-based illusions.
pt-BR: Você ganha o Poder de realizar Rituais da disciplina Ritualismo; além disso, você pode usar o Ritualismo para criar ilusões baseadas na audição.

en: After you sing a **verse** with **medium** or **high volume**, all **physical** damage you suffer until the start of your next turn is reduced by【**SL**】(applied **before** Affinities).
it: Dopo che canti un **verso** con volume **medio** o **alto**, tutto il danno **fisico** che subisci fino all’inizio del tuo prossimo turno viene ridotto di 【**LA**】 (**prima** di applicare Affinità).
de: After you sing a verse with medium or high volume, all physical damage you suffer until the start of your next turn is reduced by【SL】(applied before Affinities).
pl: After you sing a verse with medium or high volume, all physical damage you suffer until the start of your next turn is reduced by【SL】(applied before Affinities).
fr: Après avoir chanté un **couplet** à **volume intermédiaire** ou **élevé**, tous les dégâts **physiques** que vous subissez jusqu’au début de votre prochain tour sont réduits de **【NC】** (**avant** d’appliquer les affinités).
es: After you sing a verse with medium or high volume, all physical damage you suffer until the start of your next turn is reduced by【SL】(applied before Affinities).
pt-BR: Depois de cantar um verso com volume médio ou alto, todo dano físico que você sofrer até o início do seu próximo turno será reduzido em 【NH】 (aplicado antes das Afinidades).

en: After you sing a verse with **low** or **medium volume**, you may perform a **free attack** with a weapon you have equipped; treat your **High Roll (HR)** as 0 when calculating damage dealt by this attack.
it: Dopo che canti un **verso** con volume **basso** o **medio**, puoi eseguire un **attacco gratuito** con un’arma equipaggiata; considera il tuo **Tiro Maggiore** pari a 0 quando calcoli il danno inflitto da questo attacco.
de: After you sing a verse with low or medium volume, you may perform a free attack with a weapon you have equipped; treat your High Roll (HR) as 0 when calculating damage dealt by this attack.
pl: After you sing a verse with low or medium volume, you may perform a free attack with a weapon you have equipped; treat your High Roll (HR) as 0 when calculating damage dealt by this attack.
fr: Après avoir chanté un **couplet** à **volume bas ou intermédiaire**, vous pouvez effectuer une **attaque gratuite** avec une arme dont vous êtes équipé ; faites comme si votre **valeur haute** était 0 quand vous calculez les dégâts infligés par cette attaque.
es: After you sing a verse with low or medium volume, you may perform a free attack with a weapon you have equipped; treat your High Roll (HR) as 0 when calculating damage dealt by this attack.
pt-BR: Após cantar um verso com volume baixo ou médio, você poderá realizar um ataque livre com uma arma que tenha equipado; trate sua Rolagem Alta (RA) como 0 ao calcular o dano causado por este ataque.

en: During a conflict, you may use an action and spend 10 Mind Points to choose one option: all MP costs are doubled; **or** all sources of damage deal【**SL × 3**】extra damage. The chosen effect lasts until the start of your next turn.
it: Durante un conflitto, puoi usare un’azione e spendere 10 PM per scegliere un’opzione: tutti i costi in Punti Mente sono raddoppiati; **oppure** tutte le fonti di danno infliggono 【**LA × 3**】 danni extra. L’effetto scelto termina all’inizio del tuo prossimo turno.
de: During a conflict, you may use an action and spend 10 mp to choose one option: all MP costs are doubled; OR all sources of damage deal 【SL × 3】extra damage. The chosen effect lasts until the start of your next turn.
pl: During a conflict, you may use an action and spend 10 mp to choose one option: all MP costs are doubled; OR all sources of damage deal 【SL × 3】extra damage. The chosen effect lasts until the start of your next turn.
fr: Pendant un conflit, vous pouvez utiliser une action et dépenser 10 Points de Magie pour choisir une option : tous les coûts en PM sont doublés **ou** toutes les sources de dégâts infligent **【NC × 3】** dégâts supplémentaires. L’effet choisi dure jusqu’au début de votre prochain tour.
es: During a conflict, you may use an action and spend 10 mp to choose one option: all MP costs are doubled; OR all sources of damage deal 【SL × 3】extra damage. The chosen effect lasts until the start of your next turn.
pt-BR: Durante um conflito, você pode usar uma ação e gastar 10 PM para escolher uma opção: todos os custos de PM são dobrados; OU todas as fontes de dano causam 【NH × 3】dano extra. O efeito escolhido dura até o início do seu próximo turno.

en: During a conflict, you may use an action and spend 10 mp to choose one ally that can hear you. That ally may immediately perform a **free attack** with a weapon they have equipped (or with a **basic attack** if they are an NPC). They gain a bonus equal to【**SL**】to the Accuracy Check, but treat their **High Roll (HR)** as 0 when calculating damage.
it: Durante un conflitto, puoi usare un’azione e spendere 10 PM per scegliere un alleato in grado di sentirti. Quell’alleato può immediatamente eseguire un **attacco gratuito** con un’arma equipaggiata (o con un **attacco base** se è un PNG); ottiene un bonus pari a 【**LA**】 al Test di Precisione, ma considera il suo **TM** pari a 0 quando calcola il danno.
de: During a conflict, you may use an action and spend 10 mp to choose one ally that can hear you. That ally may immediately perform a free attack with a weapon they have equipped (or with a basic attack if they are an NPC). They gain a bonus equal to 【SL】 to the Accuracy Check, but treat their High Roll (HR) as 0 when calculating damage.
pl: During a conflict, you may use an action and spend 10 mp to choose one ally that can hear you. That ally may immediately perform a free attack with a weapon they have equipped (or with a basic attack if they are an NPC). They gain a bonus equal to 【SL】 to the Accuracy Check, but treat their High Roll (HR) as 0 when calculating damage.
fr: Pendant un conflit, vous pouvez utiliser une action et dépenser 10 PM pour choisir un allié qui vous entend. Celui‑ci peut immédiatement effectuer une **attaque gratuite** avec une arme dont il est équipé (ou avec une **attaque de base** s’il s’agit d’un PNJ). Il bénéficie alors d’un bonus égal à votre **【NC】** à son test de précision, mais on considère sa **valeur haute** comme égale à 0 lorsqu’on calcule les dégâts.
es: During a conflict, you may use an action and spend 10 mp to choose one ally that can hear you. That ally may immediately perform a free attack with a weapon they have equipped (or with a basic attack if they are an NPC). They gain a bonus equal to 【SL】 to the Accuracy Check, but treat their High Roll (HR) as 0 when calculating damage.
pt-BR: Durante um conflito, você pode usar uma ação e gastar 10 PM para escolher um aliado que possa ouvi-lo. Esse aliado pode realizar imediatamente um ataque livre com uma arma que tenha equipado (ou com um ataque básico se for um PNJ). Eles ganham um bônus igual a 【NH】 na Verificação de Precisão, mas tratam sua Rolagem Alta (RA) como 0 ao calcular o dano.

en: After you use **Bishop's Edict**, **Charging Cavalry**, or **King's Castle**, you may choose another Player Character that can hear you who has yet to take a turn during this round. That character may take their turn immediately after yours during this round.
it: Dopo che usi **Castello del Re**, **Cavallo in Carica** o **Editto dell’Alfiere**, puoi scegliere un altro Personaggio Giocante in grado di sentirti che deve ancora svolgere il suo turno in questo round: quel PG può svolgere il suo turno immediatamente dopo il tuo.
de: After you use Bishop's Edict, Charging Cavalry, or King's Castle, you may choose another Player Character that can hear you who has yet to take a turn during this round. That character may take their turn immediately after yours during this round.
pl: After you use Bishop's Edict, Charging Cavalry, or King's Castle, you may choose another Player Character that can hear you who has yet to take a turn during this round. That character may take their turn immediately after yours during this round.
fr: Après avoir utilisé **Décret du fou**, **Charge de cavalerie** ou **Roque du roi**, vous pouvez choisir un autre personnage joueur capable de vous entendre et qui n’a pas encore joué son tour durant ce round. Ce personnage peut jouer son tour immédiatement après vous durant ce round.
es: After you use Bishop's Edict, Charging Cavalry, or King's Castle, you may choose another Player Character that can hear you who has yet to take a turn during this round. That character may take their turn immediately after yours during this round.
pt-BR: Depois de usar o Édito do Bispo, a Cavalaria de Ataque ou o Castelo do Rei, você pode escolher outro Personagem de Jogador que possa ouvi-lo e que ainda não tenha jogado durante esta rodada. Esse personagem pode jogar seu turno imediatamente após o seu durante esta rodada.

en: During a conflict, you may use an action and spend 10 mp to choose one option: no creature can recover Hit Points or Mind Points; **or** all effects that restore Mind Points restore【**SL × 5**】additional Mind Points. The chosen effect lasts until the start of your next turn.
it: Durante un conflitto, puoi usare un’azione e spendere 10 PM per scegliere un’opzione: tutte le creature non possono recuperare PV o PM; **oppure** gli effetti che causano il recupero di PV e/o PM causano rispettivamente il recupero di 【**LA × 10**】 PV e/o PM addizionali. L’effetto scelto termina all’inizio del tuo prossimo turno.
de: During a conflict, you may use an action and spend 10 mp to choose one option: no creature can recover Hit Points or Mind Points; OR all effects that restore Mind Points restore【SL × 5】additional Mind Points. The chosen effect lasts until the start of your next turn.
pl: During a conflict, you may use an action and spend 10 mp to choose one option: no creature can recover Hit Points or Mind Points; OR all effects that restore Mind Points restore【SL × 5】additional Mind Points. The chosen effect lasts until the start of your next turn.
fr: Pendant un conflit, vous pouvez utiliser une action et dépenser 10 PM pour choisir une option : aucune créature ne peut récupérer de Points de Vie ou de Points de Magie, **ou bien** tous les effets qui restaurent des Points de Magie en redonnent **【NC × 5】** de plus. L’effet choisi dure jusqu’au début de votre prochain tour.
es: During a conflict, you may use an action and spend 10 mp to choose one option: no creature can recover Hit Points or Mind Points; OR all effects that restore Mind Points restore【SL × 5】additional Mind Points. The chosen effect lasts until the start of your next turn.
pt-BR: Durante um conflito, você pode usar uma ação e gastar 10 PM para escolher uma opção: nenhuma criatura pode recuperar Pontos de Vida ou Pontos Mentais; OU todos os efeitos que restauram Pontos Mentais restauram【NH × 5】Pontos Mentais adicionais. O efeito escolhido dura até o início do seu próximo turno.

en: During a conflict, you may use an action to perform a **free attack** with a weapon you have equipped, treating your **High Roll (HR)** as 0 when calculating damage. After the attack is resolved, choose one option: one ally who is able to hear you recovers【**5 + (SL × 5)**】Hit Points; **or** you may immediately use a Skill you acquired among **Bishop's Edict**, **Charging Cavalry**, or **King's Castle** for free (spending the appropriate MP).
it: Puoi usare un’azione per eseguire un **attacco gratuito** con un’arma equipaggiata; considera il tuo **TM** pari a 0 quando calcoli il danno. Dopo che l’attacco è risolto, scegli un’opzione: un alleato in grado di sentirti recupera 【**5 + (LA × 5)**】 Punti Vita; **oppure** usi immediatamente e **gratuitamente** un’Abilità che hai acquisito tra **Castello del Re**, **Cavallo in Carica** e **Editto dell’Alfiere** (spendendo i Punti Mente appropriati).
de: During a conflict, you may use an action to perform a free attack with a weapon you have equipped, treating your High Roll (HR) as 0 when calculating damage. After the attack is resolved, choose one option: one ally who is able to hear you recovers 【5 + (SL × 5)】 Hit Points; OR you may immediately use a Skill you acquired among Bishop's Edict, Charging Cavalry, or King's Castle for free (spending the appropriate MP).
pl: During a conflict, you may use an action to perform a free attack with a weapon you have equipped, treating your High Roll (HR) as 0 when calculating damage. After the attack is resolved, choose one option: one ally who is able to hear you recovers 【5 + (SL × 5)】 Hit Points; OR you may immediately use a Skill you acquired among Bishop's Edict, Charging Cavalry, or King's Castle for free (spending the appropriate MP).
fr: Pendant un conflit, vous pouvez utiliser une action pour effectuer une **attaque gratuite** avec une arme dont vous êtes équipé, en considérant votre **valeur haute** comme 0 quand vous calculez les dégâts. Une fois cette attaque résolue, vous pouvez choisir une option : un allié capable de vous entendre récupère **【5 + (NC × 5)】** PV **ou** vous utilisez gratuitement une compétence que vous possédez, à choisir parmi **Décret du fou**, **Charge de cavalerie** et **Roque du roi** (en dépensant les PM nécessaires).
es: During a conflict, you may use an action to perform a free attack with a weapon you have equipped, treating your High Roll (HR) as 0 when calculating damage. After the attack is resolved, choose one option: one ally who is able to hear you recovers 【5 + (SL × 5)】 Hit Points; OR you may immediately use a Skill you acquired among Bishop's Edict, Charging Cavalry, or King's Castle for free (spending the appropriate MP).
pt-BR: Durante um conflito, você pode usar uma ação para realizar um ataque livre com uma arma que você tenha equipado, tratando sua Rolagem Alta (RA) como 0 ao calcular o dano. Após o ataque ser resolvido, escolha uma opção: um aliado que seja capaz de ouvi-lo recupera 【5 + (NP × 5)】 Pontos de Vida; OU você pode usar imediatamente um Poder adquirido entre o Édito do Bispo, a Cavalaria de Ataque ou o Castelo do Rei gratuitamente (gastando o PM apropriado).

en: Each time you take this Skill, you learn a **dance**. On your turn during a conflict scene, if you have no **martial armor** equipped, you may spend 10 Mind Points to **perform a dance** you have learned. This doesn't require an action, but it can only be done **before or after** an action, and only **once per turn**. If you already performed a **different dance** during your previous turn in this scene, the cost of the new dance is reduced to 5 mp. Some **dances** are **instantaneous** and resolve immediately, while others have effects that last **until the start of your next turn**.
it: Ogni volta che acquisisci questa Abilità, impari una **danza**. Nel tuo turno durante un conflitto, se non hai un’**armatura marziale** equipaggiata, puoi spendere 10 Punti Mente per **eseguire una danza** tra quelle che hai imparato; ciò non richiede un’azione, ma puoi farlo solo **prima o dopo** un’azione, e solo **una volta per turno**. Se hai già eseguito una danza **differente** nel tuo turno precedente di questa scena, il costo della nuova **danza** è ridotto a 5 Punti Mente. Alcune danze hanno **durata** “Istantanea” e si risolvono immediatamente, altre hanno effetti che durano “Fino all’inizio del tuo prossimo turno”.
de: Each time you take this Skill, you learn a dance. On your turn during a conflict scene, if you have no martial armor equipped, you may spend 10 mp to perform a dance you have learned. This doesn't require an action, but it can only be done before or after an action, and only once per turn. If you already performed a different dance during your previous turn in this scene, the cost of the new dance is reduced to 5 mp. Some dances are instantaneous and resolve immediately, while others have effects that last until the start of your next turn.
pl: Each time you take this Skill, you learn a dance. On your turn during a conflict scene, if you have no martial armor equipped, you may spend 10 mp to perform a dance you have learned. This doesn't require an action, but it can only be done before or after an action, and only once per turn. If you already performed a different dance during your previous turn in this scene, the cost of the new dance is reduced to 5 mp. Some dances are instantaneous and resolve immediately, while others have effects that last until the start of your next turn.
fr: Chaque fois que vous prenez cette compétence, vous apprenez une **danse**. À votre tour pendant une scène de conflit, si vous n’êtes équipé d’aucune **armure martiale**, vous pouvez dépenser 10 Points de Magie pour **réaliser une danse** que vous avez apprise. Vous n’avez pas besoin d’utiliser une action pour le faire, mais ne pouvez danser de la sorte qu’**avant ou après** une action et seulement **une fois par tour**. Si vous avez déjà exécuté une **danse différente** pendant votre tour précédent lors de cette scène, le coût de la nouvelle **danse** diminue de 5 Points de Magie. Certaines **danses instantanées** se résolvent immédiatement, tandis que l’effet de certaines autres dure **jusqu’au début de votre prochain tour**.
es: Each time you take this Skill, you learn a dance. On your turn during a conflict scene, if you have no martial armor equipped, you may spend 10 mp to perform a dance you have learned. This doesn't require an action, but it can only be done before or after an action, and only once per turn. If you already performed a different dance during your previous turn in this scene, the cost of the new dance is reduced to 5 mp. Some dances are instantaneous and resolve immediately, while others have effects that last until the start of your next turn.
pt-BR: Cada vez que você adquire esse Poder, você aprende uma dança. No seu turno, durante uma cena de conflito, se você não tiver nenhuma armadura marcial equipada, você poderá gastar 10 PM para executar uma dança que aprendeu. Isso não requer uma ação, mas só pode ser feito antes ou depois de uma ação e apenas uma vez por turno. Se você já executou uma dança diferente no turno anterior nesta cena, o custo da nova dança é reduzido para 5 PM. Algumas danças são instantâneas e resolvem imediatamente, enquanto outras têm efeitos que duram até o início do seu próximo turno.

en: When you perform a **dance** with a **duration** of “Until the start of your next turn”, you may spend 10 Mind Points. If you do, choose one ally you can see towards whom you have a **Bond** of **affection**: apply the benefits of the **dance** to that ally as well as yourself (the benefits still last until the start of **your** next turn).
it: Quando esegui una **danza** con **durata** “Fino all’inizio del tuo prossimo turno”, puoi spendere 10 Punti Mente addizionali. Se lo fai, scegli un alleato a te visibile verso cui hai un Legame di **affetto**: applichi i benefici della tua **danza** anche a quell’alleato (tali benefici terminano comunque all’inizio del **tuo** prossimo turno).
de: When you perform a dance with a duration of “Until the start of your next turn”, you may spend 10 mp. If you do, choose one ally you can see towards whom you have a Bond of affection: apply the benefits of the dance to that ally as well as yourself (the benefits still last until the start of your next turn).
pl: When you perform a dance with a duration of “Until the start of your next turn”, you may spend 10 mp. If you do, choose one ally you can see towards whom you have a Bond of affection: apply the benefits of the dance to that ally as well as yourself (the benefits still last until the start of your next turn).
fr: Quand vous réalisez une **danse** dont la **durée** est « jusqu’au début de votre prochain tour », vous pouvez dépenser 10 Points de Magie supplémentaires. Dans ce cas, choisissez un allié que vous voyez et avec lequel vous avez un lien d’**affection** : les bénéfices de la **danse** s’appliquent également à lui (et durent toujours jusqu’au début de **votre** prochain tour).
es: When you perform a dance with a duration of “Until the start of your next turn”, you may spend 10 mp. If you do, choose one ally you can see towards whom you have a Bond of affection: apply the benefits of the dance to that ally as well as yourself (the benefits still last until the start of your next turn).
pt-BR: Ao realizar uma dança com duração de “Até o início do seu próximo turno”, você pode gastar 10 PM. Se o fizer, escolha um aliado que você possa ver e com quem você tenha um Laço de afeição: aplique os benefícios da dança a esse aliado e também a você mesmo (os benefícios ainda duram até o início do seu próximo turno).

en: After you perform a **dance** with a **duration** of “Until the start of your next turn”, you gain a bonus equal to【**SL × 2**】to all Opposed Checks that rely on **acrobatics**, **coordination**, or **speed** until the start of your next turn.
it: Dopo che esegui una **danza** con **durata** “Fino all’inizio del tuo prossimo turno”, ottieni un bonus pari a 【**LA × 2**】 a tutti i Test Contrapposti basati su **acrobazie, coordinazione** o **rapidità** fino all’inizio del tuo prossimo turno.
de: After you perform a dance with a duration of “Until the start of your next turn”, you gain a bonus equal to 【SL × 2】 to all Opposed Checks that rely on acrobatics, coordination, or speed until the start of your next turn.
pl: After you perform a dance with a duration of “Until the start of your next turn”, you gain a bonus equal to 【SL × 2】 to all Opposed Checks that rely on acrobatics, coordination, or speed until the start of your next turn.
fr: Après avoir réalisé une **danse** dont la **durée** est « jusqu’au début de votre prochain tour », vous recevez un bonus égal à **【NC × 2】** à tous les tests opposés qui s’appuient sur les **acrobaties**, la **coordination** ou la **vitesse** jusqu’au début de votre prochain tour.
es: After you perform a dance with a duration of “Until the start of your next turn”, you gain a bonus equal to 【SL × 2】 to all Opposed Checks that rely on acrobatics, coordination, or speed until the start of your next turn.
pt-BR: Depois de realizar uma dança com duração de “Até o início do seu próximo turno”, você ganha um bônus igual a 【NH × 2】 para todos os Testes Opostos que dependem de acrobacia, coordenação ou velocidade até o início do seu próximo turno .

en: After you perform a **dance**, you may perform the **Equipment** action for free.
it: Dopo che esegui una **danza**, puoi eseguire **gratuitamente** l’azione di **Equipaggiamento**.
de: After you perform a dance, you may perform the Equipment action for free.
pl: After you perform a dance, you may perform the Equipment action for free.
fr: Après avoir effectué une **danse**, vous pouvez réaliser gratuitement l’action **Équipement**.
es: After you perform a dance, you may perform the Equipment action for free.
pt-BR: Depois de executar uma dança, você poderá realizar a ação de Equipamento gratuitamente.

en: After you perform a **dance**, your attacks with **brawling**, **dagger**, **flail**, and **thrown** weapons deal【**SL**】extra damage until the start of your next turn. If you have an **arcane** weapon equipped, offensive spells (⚡) you cast also deal【**SL**】extra damage until the start of your next turn.
it: Dopo che esegui una danza, i tuoi attacchi con armi della Categoria **flagello, da lancio, pugnale** e **da rissa** infliggono 【**LA**】 danni extra fino all’inizio del tuo prossimo turno; inoltre, se hai un’arma **arcana** equipaggiata, gli incantesimi offensivi (⚡) da te lanciati infliggono 【**LA**】 danni extra fino all’inizio del tuo prossimo turno.
de: After you perform a dance, your attacks with brawling, dagger, flail, and thrown weapons deal 【SL】 extra damage until the start of your next turn. If you have an arcane weapon equipped, offensive spells (⚡) you cast also deal 【SL】 extra damage until the start of your next turn.
pl: After you perform a dance, your attacks with brawling, dagger, flail, and thrown weapons deal 【SL】 extra damage until the start of your next turn. If you have an arcane weapon equipped, offensive spells (⚡) you cast also deal 【SL】 extra damage until the start of your next turn.
fr: Après avoir effectué une **danse**, vos attaques réalisées avec des armes de **lutte**, des **dagues**, des armes **articulées** et des armes de **jet** infligent **【NC】** dégâts supplémentaires jusqu’au début de votre prochain tour. Si vous êtes équipé d’une arme **arcanique**, les sorts offensifs (⚡) que vous lancez infligent eux aussi **【NC】** dégâts en plus jusqu’au début de votre prochain tour.
es: After you perform a dance, your attacks with brawling, dagger, flail, and thrown weapons deal 【SL】 extra damage until the start of your next turn. If you have an arcane weapon equipped, offensive spells (⚡) you cast also deal 【SL】 extra damage until the start of your next turn.
pt-BR: Depois de executar uma dança, seus ataques com armas de briga, adaga, mangual e arremesso causam 【NH】 dano extra até o início do seu próximo turno. Se você tiver uma arma arcana equipada, os feitiços ofensivos (⚡) que você lançar também causarão 【NH】 dano extra até o início do seu próximo turno.

en: If an ally bears one of your **symbols**, that ally may perform the **Spell** action and destroy that symbol to cast a single spell among those **you** know, as long as it has a **total Mind Point cost equal to or lower than**【**SL × 10**】(that ally must still pay the MP cost).
it: Se un alleato ha un tuo **simbolo** impresso su di sé, quell’alleato può eseguire l’azione di **Incantesimo** e distruggere quel **simbolo** per lanciare un qualsiasi incantesimo che tu conosci, a patto che abbia un **costo totale in Punti Mente pari o inferiore a** 【**LA × 10**】 (quell’alleato deve comunque pagarne il costo con i propri Punti Mente).
de: If an ally bears one of your symbols, that ally may perform the Spell action and destroy that symbol to cast a single spell among those you know, as long as it has a total Mind Point cost equal to or lower than 【SL × 10】 (that ally must still pay the MP cost).
pl: If an ally bears one of your symbols, that ally may perform the Spell action and destroy that symbol to cast a single spell among those you know, as long as it has a total Mind Point cost equal to or lower than 【SL × 10】 (that ally must still pay the MP cost).
fr: Si un allié porte un de vos **symboles**, il peut effectuer l’action **Sort** et détruire le symbole en question pour lancer un unique sort parmi ceux que **vous** connaissez, tant que son **coût en Points de Magie est inférieur ou égal à 【NC × 10】** (l’allié doit naturellement acquitter ce coût).
es: If an ally bears one of your symbols, that ally may perform the Spell action and destroy that symbol to cast a single spell among those you know, as long as it has a total Mind Point cost equal to or lower than 【SL × 10】 (that ally must still pay the MP cost).
pt-BR: Se um aliado possuir um de seus símbolos, esse aliado pode realizar a ação de Feitiço e destruir esse símbolo para lançar um único feitiço entre aqueles que você conhece, desde que tenha um custo total de Pontos Mentais igual ou inferior a 【NH × 10】 (esse aliado ainda deve pagar o custo de PM).

en: You gain the ability to perform Rituals of the **Ritualism** discipline; additionally, you may use **Ritualism** to create **sight-based illusions**.
it: Puoi eseguire Rituali i cui effetti rientrino nella disciplina di **Ritualismo**; in più, puoi usare il **Ritualismo** per creare **illusioni basate sulla vista**.
de: You gain the ability to perform Rituals of the Ritualism discipline; additionally, you may use Ritualism to create sight-based illusions.
pl: You gain the ability to perform Rituals of the Ritualism discipline; additionally, you may use Ritualism to create sight-based illusions.
fr: Vous recevez le pouvoir d’effectuer des rituels de la discipline **Ritualisme** ; **en outre**, vous pouvez utiliser **Ritualisme** pour créer des **illusions visuelles**.
es: You gain the ability to perform Rituals of the Ritualism discipline; additionally, you may use Ritualism to create sight-based illusions.
pt-BR: Você ganha o Poder de realizar Rituais da disciplina Ritualismo; além disso, você pode usar Ritualismo para criar ilusões baseadas na visão.

en: When a creature you can see that is bearing one of your **symbols** suffers damage or recovers Hit Points and/or Mind Points, you may have that creature suffer【**SL**】extra damage or recover【**SL**】additional Hit Points and/or Mind Points, respectively).
it: Quando una creatura a te visibile su cui è impresso un tuo **simbolo** subisce danno o recupera Punti Vita e/o Punti Mente, puoi far sì che quella creatura subisca 【**LA**】 danni extra o recuperi rispettivamente 【**LA**】 Punti Vita e/o Punti Mente addizionali.
de: When a creature you can see that is bearing one of your symbols suffers damage or recovers Hit Points and/or Mind Points, you may have that creature suffer 【SL】 extra damage or recover 【SL】 additional Hit Points and/or Mind Points, respectively).
pl: When a creature you can see that is bearing one of your symbols suffers damage or recovers Hit Points and/or Mind Points, you may have that creature suffer 【SL】 extra damage or recover 【SL】 additional Hit Points and/or Mind Points, respectively).
fr: Quand une créature que vous voyez et qui porte un de vos **symboles** subit des dégâts ou récupère des Points de Vie et/ou des Points de Magie, vous pouvez lui infliger **【NC】** dégâts supplémentaires ou lui faire récupérer **【NC】** Points de Vie ou Points de Magie supplémentaires, respectivement.
es: When a creature you can see that is bearing one of your symbols suffers damage or recovers Hit Points and/or Mind Points, you may have that creature suffer 【SL】 extra damage or recover 【SL】 additional Hit Points and/or Mind Points, respectively).
pt-BR: Quando uma criatura que você pode ver que carrega um de seus símbolos sofre dano ou recupera Pontos de Vida e/ou Pontos Mentais, você pode fazer com que essa criatura sofra 【NH】 dano extra ou recupere 【NH】 Pontos de Vida e/ou Pontos Mentais adicionais, respectivamente).

en: You always know the exact direction in which to find any creature bearing one of your **symbols**, as long as that creature is within **2 travel days** of your position.
it: Conosci l’esatta direzione in cui si trova qualsiasi creatura su cui sia impresso uno dei tuoi **simboli**, a patto che essa si trovi entro **2 giorni di viaggio** da te.
de: You always know the exact direction in which to find any creature bearing one of your symbols, as long as that creature is within 2 travel days of your position.
pl: You always know the exact direction in which to find any creature bearing one of your symbols, as long as that creature is within 2 travel days of your position.
fr: Vous savez toujours dans quelle direction exacte trouver n’importe quelle créature portant l’un de vos **symboles** tant qu’elle se trouve à un maximum de **2 jours de voyage** de votre position.
es: You always know the exact direction in which to find any creature bearing one of your symbols, as long as that creature is within 2 travel days of your position.
pt-BR: Você sempre sabe a direção exata em que encontrará qualquer criatura com um de seus símbolos, desde que essa criatura esteja a 2 dias de viagem de sua posição.

en: Each time you acquire this Skill, you learn **two symbols**. You may have **up to**【**SL + 1**】**symbols active at the same time**; if you create more while at your limit, you must first choose and destroy some of your previous **symbols**. You may perform the **Inventory** action and spend 2 Inventory Points to create a **symbol** you have learned and choose one option: apply that **symbol** to yourself; **or** apply that **symbol** to an ally you can see; **or** perform a **free attack** with a weapon you have equipped. This attack deals no damage, but you apply a copy of the chosen **symbol** to each enemy hit by the attack (each copy counts as a separate **symbol** towards your limit of【**SL + 1**】active **symbols**).
it: Ogni volta che acquisisci questa Abilità, impari **due simboli**. Puoi avere **fino a** 【**LA + 1**】 **simboli attivi allo stesso tempo**; se crei **simboli** in eccesso, devi prima scegliere e distruggere altrettanti **simboli** da te creati in precedenza. Puoi eseguire l’azione di **Inventario** e spendere 2 Punti Inventario per creare un **simbolo** tra quelli che conosci e scegliere un’opzione: imprimi il **simbolo** su te stesso; **oppure** imprimi il **simbolo** su un alleato a te visibile; **oppure** esegui un **attacco gratuito** con un’arma equipaggiata. L’attacco non infligge danno, ma imprimi una copia del **simbolo** su ciascun nemico colpito (ogni copia conta come un **simbolo** separato ai fini del limite).
de: Each time you acquire this Skill, you learn two symbols. You may have up to 【SL + 1】 symbols active at the same time; if you create more while at your limit, you must first choose and destroy some of your previous symbols. You may perform the Inventory action and spend 2 ip to create a symbol you have learned and choose one option: apply that symbol to yourself; OR apply that symbol to an ally you can see; OR perform a free attack with a weapon you have equipped. This attack deals no damage, but you apply a copy of the chosen symbol to each enemy hit by the attack (each copy counts as a separate symbol towards your limit or 【 SL + 1】 active symbols).
pl: Each time you acquire this Skill, you learn two symbols. You may have up to 【SL + 1】 symbols active at the same time; if you create more while at your limit, you must first choose and destroy some of your previous symbols. You may perform the Inventory action and spend 2 ip to create a symbol you have learned and choose one option: apply that symbol to yourself; OR apply that symbol to an ally you can see; OR perform a free attack with a weapon you have equipped. This attack deals no damage, but you apply a copy of the chosen symbol to each enemy hit by the attack (each copy counts as a separate symbol towards your limit or 【 SL + 1】 active symbols).
fr: Chaque fois que vous prenez cette compétence,vous apprenez **deux symboles**. Vous pouvez maintenir **jusqu’à 【NC + 1】 symboles actifs simultanément** ; si vous en créez davantage que votre limite, vous devez d’abord choisir et détruire l’un des précédents. Vous pouvez réaliser l’action **Inventaire** et dépenser 2 Points d’Inventaire pour créer un **symbole** que vous avez appris et choisir une option : **soit** appliquer à vous‑même ce **symbole**, **soit** l’appliquer sur un allié que vous voyez, **soit** effectuer une **attaque gratuite** avec une arme dont vous êtes équipé. Cette attaque n’inflige aucun dégât, mais vous appliquez une copie du **symbole** choisi à chaque ennemi touché (chaque copie compte comme un **symbole** séparé dans le maximum de **【NC + 1】 symboles** actifs que vous pouvez maintenir).
es: Each time you acquire this Skill, you learn two symbols. You may have up to 【SL + 1】 symbols active at the same time; if you create more while at your limit, you must first choose and destroy some of your previous symbols. You may perform the Inventory action and spend 2 ip to create a symbol you have learned and choose one option: apply that symbol to yourself; OR apply that symbol to an ally you can see; OR perform a free attack with a weapon you have equipped. This attack deals no damage, but you apply a copy of the chosen symbol to each enemy hit by the attack (each copy counts as a separate symbol towards your limit or 【 SL + 1】 active symbols).
pt-BR: Cada vez que você adquire esse Poder, você aprende dois símbolos. Você pode ter até símbolos 【NH + 1】 ativos ao mesmo tempo; se você criar mais enquanto estiver no seu limite, primeiro você deve escolher e destruir alguns de seus símbolos anteriores. Você pode realizar a ação de Inventário e gastar 2 ip para criar um símbolo que aprendeu e escolher uma opção: aplicar esse símbolo a você mesmo; OU aplique esse símbolo a um aliado que você possa ver; OU execute um ataque livre com uma arma que você equipou. Este ataque não causa dano, mas você aplica uma cópia do símbolo escolhido a cada inimigo atingido pelo ataque (cada cópia conta como um símbolo separado para o seu limite ou 【NH + 1】 símbolos ativos).

en: At the start of your turn during a conflict, you may choose one ally who is able to hear you **or** one enemy you can see that is suffering from **dazed**, **enraged**, and/or **shaken**. Until the start of your next turn, the chosen creature becomes your **focus**. You gain a bonus equal to【**SL**】to Checks you perform to examine your **focus**, as well as to your Accuracy Checks and Magic Checks for attacks and offensive spells (⚡) that include your **focus** among the targets. When you cause your focus to recover Hit Points and/or Mind Points, they recover【**SL × 2**】additional HP and/or MP, respectively.
it: All’inizio del tuo turno durante un conflitto, puoi scegliere un alleato in grado di sentirti **oppure** un nemico a te visibile che sia afflitto dallo status **confuso, furente** e/o **scosso**. Fino all’inizio del tuo prossimo turno, la creatura scelta diventa il tuo **focus**. Ottieni un bonus pari a 【**LA**】 ai Test che effettui per esaminare il tuo **focus**, nonché ai tuoi Test di Precisione e Test di Magia per attacchi e incantesimi offensivi (⚡) che includono il tuo **focus** tra i bersagli. Quando fai recuperare Punti Vita e/o Punti Mente al tuo **focus**, gli fai recuperare rispettivamente 【**LA × 2**】 PV e/o PM addizionali.
de: At the start of your turn during a conflict, you may choose one ally who is able to hear you or one enemy you can see that is suffering from dazed, enraged, and/or shaken. Until the start of your next turn, the chosen creature becomes your focus. You gain a bonus equal to 【SL】 to Checks you perform to examine your focus, as well as to your Accuracy Checks and Magic Checks for attacks and offensive spells (⚡) that include your focus among the targets. When you cause your focus to recover Hit Points and/or Mind Points, they recover 【SL × 2】 additional HP and/or MP, respectively.
pl: At the start of your turn during a conflict, you may choose one ally who is able to hear you or one enemy you can see that is suffering from dazed, enraged, and/or shaken. Until the start of your next turn, the chosen creature becomes your focus. You gain a bonus equal to 【SL】 to Checks you perform to examine your focus, as well as to your Accuracy Checks and Magic Checks for attacks and offensive spells (⚡) that include your focus among the targets. When you cause your focus to recover Hit Points and/or Mind Points, they recover 【SL × 2】 additional HP and/or MP, respectively.
fr: Au début de votre tour pendant un conflit, vous pouvez choisir un allié capable de vous entendre **ou** un ennemi que vous pouvez voir et qui souffre de l’état **étourdi**, **enragé** et/ou **traumatisé**. Jusqu’au début de votre prochain tour, la créature choisie devient votre **sujet**. Vous gagnez un bonus égal à votre **【NC】** lors de vos tests effectués pour examiner votre **sujet**, ainsi qu’à vos tests de précision et de magie liés aux attaques et aux sorts offensifs (⚡) qui comprennent votre **sujet** parmi leurs cibles. Quand vous faites récupérer des Points de Vie et/ou de Magie à votre **sujet**, il en regagne **【NC × 2】** de plus.
es: At the start of your turn during a conflict, you may choose one ally who is able to hear you or one enemy you can see that is suffering from dazed, enraged, and/or shaken. Until the start of your next turn, the chosen creature becomes your focus. You gain a bonus equal to 【SL】 to Checks you perform to examine your focus, as well as to your Accuracy Checks and Magic Checks for attacks and offensive spells (⚡) that include your focus among the targets. When you cause your focus to recover Hit Points and/or Mind Points, they recover 【SL × 2】 additional HP and/or MP, respectively.
pt-BR: No início do seu turno durante um conflito, você pode escolher um aliado que seja capaz de ouvi-lo ou um inimigo que você possa ver que esteja atordoado, enfurecido e/ou abalado. Até o início do seu próximo turno, a criatura escolhida se torna o seu foco. Você ganha um bônus igual a 【NH】 aos testes que você realiza para examinar seu foco, bem como aos seus testes de precisão e testes mágicos para ataques e feitiços ofensivos (⚡) que incluem seu foco entre os alvos. Quando você faz com que seu foco recupere Pontos de Vida e/ou Pontos Mentais, eles recuperam 【NH × 2】 PV e/ou PM adicionais, respectivamente.

en: The total MP cost of your **spells** and **verses** (see **High Fantasy**, page **138**) that include your **focus** among their targets is reduced by【**SL**】, or by【**SL × 2**】if your **focus** is the only target (up to a minimum cost of 0 Mind Points).
it: Il costo totale in Punti Mente dei tuoi **incantesimi** e **versi** che includono il tuo **focus** tra i bersagli è ridotto di 【**LA**】, oppure di 【**LA × 2**】 se il tuo **focus** è l’**unico** bersaglio (fino a un costo minimo di 0 Punti Mente).
de: The total MP cost of your spells and verses (High Fantasy, page 138) that include your focus among their targets is reduced by 【SL】, or by 【SL × 2】 if your focus is the only target (up to a minimum cost of 0 Mind Points).
pl: The total MP cost of your spells and verses (High Fantasy, page 138) that include your focus among their targets is reduced by 【SL】, or by 【SL × 2】 if your focus is the only target (up to a minimum cost of 0 Mind Points).
fr: Le coût total en PM de vos **sorts** et de vos **couplets** (cf. **Atlas de high fantasy** page **138**) comprenant votre **sujet** parmi leurs cibles est réduit de **【NC】** ou de **【NC × 2】** si votre **sujet** en est la seule cible (pour un coût minimal de 0 Point de Magie).
es: The total MP cost of your spells and verses (High Fantasy, page 138) that include your focus among their targets is reduced by 【SL】, or by 【SL × 2】 if your focus is the only target (up to a minimum cost of 0 Mind Points).
pt-BR: O custo total de PM de seus feitiços e versos (Alta Fantasia, página 138) que incluem seu foco entre seus alvos é reduzido em 【NH】, ou em 【NH × 2】 se seu foco for o único alvo (até um custo mínimo de 0 Pontos Mentais).

en: You can communicate telepathically with any conscious ally **within 1 travel day** of you; you are **able to hear each other** for the sake of Skills and effects. You gain the ability to perform Rituals of the **Ritualism** discipline. **Additionally**, you may use **Ritualism** to **transport creatures** in and out of the soul network, and to **gain information** and track entities while inside the soul network.
it: Puoi comunicare telepaticamente con ciascun alleato non privo di sensi entro **1 giorno di viaggio** da te; siete **reciprocamente in grado di sentirvi** ai fini di Abilità ed effetti. Puoi eseguire Rituali i cui effetti rientrino nella disciplina di **Ritualismo; in più**, puoi usare il Ritualismo per **trasportare creature** dentro e fuori dalla rete spirituale, nonché per **ottenere informazioni** e seguire le tracce di entità all’interno della rete spirituale.
de: You can communicate telepathically with any conscious ally within 1 travel day of you; you are able to hear each other for the sake of Skills and effects. You gain the ability to perform Rituals of the Ritualism discipline. Additionally, you may use Ritualism to transport creatures in and out of the soul network, and to gain information and track entities while inside the soul network.
pl: You can communicate telepathically with any conscious ally within 1 travel day of you; you are able to hear each other for the sake of Skills and effects. You gain the ability to perform Rituals of the Ritualism discipline. Additionally, you may use Ritualism to transport creatures in and out of the soul network, and to gain information and track entities while inside the soul network.
fr: Vous pouvez communiquer télépathiquement avec tout allié conscient **situé dans un rayon d’un jour de voyage** autour de vous. On considère que vous êtes **capables de vous entendre l’un l’autre** dans le cadre des compétences et des autres effets.
