Vous recevez le pouvoir de réaliser des rituels de **Ritualisme**. **En outre**, vous pouvez vous servir du **Ritualisme** pour **transporter des créatures** à l’intérieur du réseau des âmes et les en faire sortir, ainsi que pour **recevoir des informations** sur des entités et les traquer lorsqu’elles sont dans le réseau en question.
es: You can communicate telepathically with any conscious ally within 1 travel day of you; you are able to hear each other for the sake of Skills and effects. You gain the ability to perform Rituals of the Ritualism discipline. Additionally, you may use Ritualism to transport creatures in and out of the soul network, and to gain information and track entities while inside the soul network.
pt-BR: Você pode se comunicar telepaticamente com qualquer aliado consciente dentro de 1 dia de viagem; vocês são capazes de ouvir uns aos outros por causa de poderes e efeitos. Você ganha o Poder de realizar Rituais da disciplina Ritualismo. Além disso, você pode usar o Ritualismo para transportar criaturas para dentro e para fora da rede da alma e para obter informações e rastrear entidades enquanto estiver dentro da rede da alma.

en: Each time you take this Skill, you gain a **gift**.
it: Ogni volta che acquisisci questa Abilità, ottieni un **dono**.
de: Each time you take this Skill, you gain a gift.
pl: Each time you take this Skill, you gain a gift.
fr: Chaque fois que vous prenez cette compétence, vous recevez un **don**. Les règles des dons et du **Cadran cérébral** figurent page suivante.
es: Each time you take this Skill, you gain a gift.
pt-BR: Cada vez que você adquire esse Poder, você ganha um dom.

en: When you perform an Accuracy Check, you may replace one of the Attribute dice with **Willpower** (such as【**DEX + WLP**】for a **shortbow**). Additionally, your **melee** attacks with weapons belonging to the **arcane** or **sword** Categories may target **ﬂying** creatures.
it: Quando effettui un Test di Precisione, puoi sostituire **uno** dei dadi di Caratteristica con **Volontà** (ad esempio 【**DES + VOL**】 per un **arco corto**). Inoltre, i tuoi attacchi in **mischia** con armi appartenenti alle Categorie **arcana** o **spada** possono bersagliare le creature **volanti**.
de: When you perform an Accuracy Check, you may replace one of the Attribute dice with Willpower (such as 【DEX + WLP】 for a shortbow). Additionally, your melee attacks with weapons belonging to the arcane or sword Categories may target ﬂying creatures.
pl: When you perform an Accuracy Check, you may replace one of the Attribute dice with Willpower (such as 【DEX + WLP】 for a shortbow). Additionally, your melee attacks with weapons belonging to the arcane or sword Categories may target ﬂying creatures.
fr: Quand vous effectuez un test de précision, vous pouvez remplacer un des dés d’attribut par **Volonté** (par exemple **【DEX + VOL】** pour un **arc court**). En outre, les attaques de **corps à corps** que vous portez avec des armes de catégorie **arcanique** ou **épée** peuvent viser des créatures **volantes**.
es: When you perform an Accuracy Check, you may replace one of the Attribute dice with Willpower (such as 【DEX + WLP】 for a shortbow). Additionally, your melee attacks with weapons belonging to the arcane or sword Categories may target ﬂying creatures.
pt-BR: Ao realizar uma Verificação de Precisão, você pode substituir um dos dados de Atributo por Força de Vontade (como 【DES + VON】 para um arco curto). Além disso, seus ataques corpo a corpo com armas pertencentes às categorias arcano ou espada podem ter como alvo criaturas voadoras.

en: Your **unarmed strikes** deal【**6 + (SL × 2)**】extra damage, and you gain a bonus equal to【**SL**】to your Accuracy Checks with them. At the start of your turn during a conflict, you may choose a weapon Category other than **brawling**. If you do, your **unarmed strikes** now belong to the chosen Category; if you choose **bow**, **firearm** or **thrown**, they become **ranged** weapons instead of **melee**; if you choose **dagger** or **sword**, they cannot be used with **Triple Slash** (see **High Fantasy** Atlas, page **161**). These changes last until the start of your next turn.
it: I tuoi **colpi senz’armi** infliggono 【**6 + (LA × 2)**】 danni extra e ottieni un bonus pari a 【**LA**】 ai tuoi Test di Precisione con essi. All’inizio del tuo turno durante un conflitto, puoi scegliere una Categoria di arma diversa da **rissa**. Se lo fai, i tuoi **colpi senz’armi** appartengono ora a quella Categoria; se scegli **arco, da fuoco** o **da lancio**, diventano armi a **distanza** anziché da **mischia**; se scegli pugnale o spada, non possono essere usati con **Triplo Fendente**. Questi cambiamenti terminano all’inizio del tuo prossimo turno.
de: Your unarmed strikes deal 【6 + (SL × 2)】 extra damage, and you gain a bonus equal to 【SL】 to your Accuracy Checks with them. At the start of your turn during a conflict, you may choose a weapon Category other than brawling. If you do, your unarmed strikes now belong to the chosen Category; if you choose bow, firearm or thrown, they become ranged weapons instead of melee; if you choose dagger or sword, they cannot be used with Triple Slash (see High Fantasy Atlas, page 161). These changes last until the start of your next turn.
pl: Your unarmed strikes deal 【6 + (SL × 2)】 extra damage, and you gain a bonus equal to 【SL】 to your Accuracy Checks with them. At the start of your turn during a conflict, you may choose a weapon Category other than brawling. If you do, your unarmed strikes now belong to the chosen Category; if you choose bow, firearm or thrown, they become ranged weapons instead of melee; if you choose dagger or sword, they cannot be used with Triple Slash (see High Fantasy Atlas, page 161). These changes last until the start of your next turn.
fr: Vos **attaques à mains nues** infligent **【6 + 【NC × 2】】** dégâts supplémentaires et vous bénéficiez d’un bonus égal à **【NC】** à leurs tests de précision. Au début de votre tour pendant un conflit, vous pouvez choisir une catégorie d’armes en dehors de lutte. Vos **attaques à mains nues** appartiennent désormais à la catégorie en question. Si vous choisissez **arc**, **arme à feu** ou **jet**, elles deviennent des armes **à distance** au lieu d’armes de **corps à corps**. Si vous choisissez **dague** ou **épée**, elles ne peuvent pas servir en conjonction avec **Triple entaille** (cf. **Atlas de high fantasy** page **161**). Ces changements durent jusqu’au début de votre prochain tour.
es: Your unarmed strikes deal 【6 + (SL × 2)】 extra damage, and you gain a bonus equal to 【SL】 to your Accuracy Checks with them. At the start of your turn during a conflict, you may choose a weapon Category other than brawling. If you do, your unarmed strikes now belong to the chosen Category; if you choose bow, firearm or thrown, they become ranged weapons instead of melee; if you choose dagger or sword, they cannot be used with Triple Slash (see High Fantasy Atlas, page 161). These changes last until the start of your next turn.
pt-BR: Seus ataques desarmados causam 【6 + (NH × 2)】 de dano extra, e você ganha um bônus igual a 【NH】 em suas verificações de precisão com eles. No início do seu turno durante um conflito, você pode escolher uma categoria de arma diferente de briga. Se fizer isso, seus ataques desarmados agora pertencem à categoria escolhida; se você escolher arco, arma de fogo ou arremesso, eles se tornam armas de longo alcance em vez de corpo a corpo; se você escolher adaga ou espada, elas não poderão ser usadas com Corte Triplo (veja Atlas de Alta Fantasia, página 161). Essas mudanças duram até o início do seu próximo turno.

en: After one of your attacks or offensive spells (⚡) causes one or more enemies to lose Hit Points, if you are in **Crisis**, you may recover【**SL × 5**】Hit Points.
it: Dopo che un tuo attacco o incantesimo offensivo (⚡) fa sì che uno o più nemici perdano Punti Vita, se sei in **Crisi**, puoi recuperare 【**LA × 5**】 Punti Vita.
de: After one of your attacks or offensive spells (⚡) causes one or more enemies to lose Hit Points, if you are in Crisis, you may recover 【SL × 5】 Hit Points.
pl: After one of your attacks or offensive spells (⚡) causes one or more enemies to lose Hit Points, if you are in Crisis, you may recover 【SL × 5】 Hit Points.
fr: Après qu’une de vos attaques ou qu’un de vos sorts offensifs (⚡) fait perdre des Points de Vie à un ou plusieurs ennemis, si vous êtes en **Crise**, vous pouvez récupérer **【NC × 5】** Points de Vie.
es: After one of your attacks or offensive spells (⚡) causes one or more enemies to lose Hit Points, if you are in Crisis, you may recover 【SL × 5】 Hit Points.
pt-BR: Após um de seus ataques ou feitiços ofensivos (⚡) fazer com que um ou mais inimigos percam Pontos de Vida, se você estiver em Crise, você poderá recuperar 【NH × 5】 Pontos de Vida.

en: After you lose Hit Points due to damage, if that damage had a type **other than physical**, you may spend 10 hp]to gain Resistance to that damage type until you use this Skill again. You cannot use this Skill if doing so would reduce you to 0 HP.
it: Dopo che una fonte di danno ti fa perdere Punti Vita, se quel danno aveva un tipo **diverso da fisico**, puoi spendere 10 PV per ottenere Resistenza a quel tipo di danno finché non usi di nuovo questa Abilità. Non puoi usare questa Abilità se farlo ridurrebbe a 0 i tuoi PV.
de: After you lose Hit Points due to damage, if that damage had a type other than physical, you may spend 10 hp]to gain Resistance to that damage type until you use this Skill again. You cannot use this Skill if doing so would reduce you to 0 HP.
pl: After you lose Hit Points due to damage, if that damage had a type other than physical, you may spend 10 hp]to gain Resistance to that damage type until you use this Skill again. You cannot use this Skill if doing so would reduce you to 0 HP.
fr: Après avoir perdu des Points de Vie à cause de dégâts, si ceux-ci étaient d’un **autre type que physiques**, vous pouvez dépenser 10 Points de Vie pour résister à ce type de dégâts jusqu’à ce que vous utilisiez de nouveau cette compétence.
es: After you lose Hit Points due to damage, if that damage had a type other than physical, you may spend 10 hp]to gain Resistance to that damage type until you use this Skill again. You cannot use this Skill if doing so would reduce you to 0 HP.
pt-BR: Depois de perder Pontos de Vida devido a dano, se esse dano tiver um tipo diferente de físico, você poderá gastar 10 PV para ganhar Resistência a esse tipo de dano até usar esse Poder novamente. Você não pode usar esse Poder se isso reduziria seu PV a 0.

en: When you deal damage to one or more NPCs, you learn their **Species and the GM chooses**【**SL**】**therioforms** appropriate to those NPCs: if you have acquired the **Theriomorphosis** Skill, you may immediately pay its HP cost and use it to manifest those **therioforms** (even if they are not among those you have learned).
it: Quando infliggi danno a uno o più PNG, scopri la loro **Specie** e il GM sceglie 【**LA**】 **terioforme** che ritiene tematiche per quei PNG: se possiedi l’Abilità **Teriomorfosi**, puoi immediatamente usarla, pagando il relativo costo in PV per manifestarle (anche se non sono tra quelle che hai imparato).
de: When you deal damage to one or more NPCs, you learn their Species and the GM chooses 【SL】 therioforms appropriate to those NPCs (see next page): if you have acquired the Theriomorphosis Skill, you may immediately pay its HP cost and use it to manifest those therioforms (even if they are not among those you have learned).
pl: When you deal damage to one or more NPCs, you learn their Species and the GM chooses 【SL】 therioforms appropriate to those NPCs (see next page): if you have acquired the Theriomorphosis Skill, you may immediately pay its HP cost and use it to manifest those therioforms (even if they are not among those you have learned).
fr: Quand vous infligez des dégâts à un ou plusieurs PNJ, vous apprenez leur **espèce et le MJ choisit 【NC】 thérioformes** adaptées à ces PNJ (cf. page suivante). Si vous avez acquis la compétence **Thériomorphose**, vous pouvez immédiatement en payer le coût en PV et l’utiliser pour manifester ces **thérioformes** (même si elles ne font pas partie de celles que vous avez apprises).
es: When you deal damage to one or more NPCs, you learn their Species and the GM chooses 【SL】 therioforms appropriate to those NPCs (see next page): if you have acquired the Theriomorphosis Skill, you may immediately pay its HP cost and use it to manifest those therioforms (even if they are not among those you have learned).
pt-BR: Quando você causa dano a um ou mais PNJs, você aprende suas Espécies e o Mestre escolhe 【NP】 as terioformas apropriadas para esses PNJs (veja a próxima página): se você adquiriu o Poder Teriomorfose, você pode pagar imediatamente seu custo de PV e usá-la para manifestar essas terioformas (mesmo que não estejam entre aquelas que você aprendeu).

en: Each time you acquire this Skill, you learn a **therioform**. You may use an action and spend **one third of your current Hit Points** (rounded down) to manifest the effects of **up to two therioforms** you have learned.
it: Ogni volta che acquisici questa Abilità, impari una **terioforma**. Puoi usare un’azione e spendere **un terzo dei tuoi Punti Vita attuali** (arrotondato per difetto) per manifestare gli effetti di **fino a due terioforme** tra quelle che hai imparato.
de: Each time you acquire this Skill, you learn a therioform. You may use an action and spend one third of your current Hit Points (rounded down) to manifest the effects of up to two therioforms you have learned. The details of this transformation are explained on the next page.
pl: Each time you acquire this Skill, you learn a therioform. You may use an action and spend one third of your current Hit Points (rounded down) to manifest the effects of up to two therioforms you have learned. The details of this transformation are explained on the next page.
fr: Chaque fois que vous acquérez cette compétence, vous apprenez une **thérioforme**. Vous pouvez utiliser une action et dépenser **un tiers de vos Points de Vie actuels** (arrondi à l’entier inférieur) pour manifester les effets d’au **maximum deux thérioformes** parmi celles que vous avez apprises. Les détails de cette transformation figurent page suivante.
es: Each time you acquire this Skill, you learn a therioform. You may use an action and spend one third of your current Hit Points (rounded down) to manifest the effects of up to two therioforms you have learned. The details of this transformation are explained on the next page.
pt-BR: Cada vez que você adquire esse Poder, você aprende uma terioforma. Você pode usar uma ação e gastar um terço de seus Pontos de Vida atuais (arredondados para baixo) para manifestar os efeitos de até duas terioformas que você aprendeu. Os detalhes dessa transformação são explicados na próxima página.

en: As long as there is no one aboard your **personal vehicle**, you may have it safely disappear from the game world at any time. What magic or technology allows it?If your **personal vehicle** is not present in the game world and you are in a space big enough to contain it, you may perform the **Inventory** action and spend 2 Inventory Points to have the vehicle appear near you and **enter** it for free.
it: Se non c’è nessuno a bordo del tuo **veicolo personale**, puoi farlo svanire in sicurezza dal mondo di gioco in qualsiasi momento. Quale magia o scienza lo permette? Se il tuo **veicolo personale** è assente dal mondo di gioco e sei in un’area grande abbastanza da contenerlo, puoi eseguire l’azione di **Inventario** e spendere 2 Punti Inventario per farlo apparire a pochi passi da te e **salirvi** gratuitamente.
de: As long as there is no one aboard your personal vehicle, you may have it safely disappear from the game world at any time. What magic or technology allows it?If your personal vehicle is not present in the game world and you are in a space big enough to contain it, you may perform the Inventory action and spend 2 ip to have the vehicle appear near you and enter it for free.
pl: As long as there is no one aboard your personal vehicle, you may have it safely disappear from the game world at any time. What magic or technology allows it?If your personal vehicle is not present in the game world and you are in a space big enough to contain it, you may perform the Inventory action and spend 2 ip to have the vehicle appear near you and enter it for free.
fr: Tant qu’il n’y a personne à bord de votre **véhicule personnel**, vous pouvez le faire disparaître sans danger du monde de jeu à tout moment. Par quelle magie ou technologie cela est-il possible ? Si votre **véhicule personnel** n’est pas présent dans le monde de jeu et que vous occupez un espace assez vaste pour le contenir, vous pouvez réaliser l’action **Inventaire** et dépenser 2 points d’Inventaire pour qu’il apparaisse près de vous et y **entrer** gratuitement.
es: As long as there is no one aboard your personal vehicle, you may have it safely disappear from the game world at any time. What magic or technology allows it?If your personal vehicle is not present in the game world and you are in a space big enough to contain it, you may perform the Inventory action and spend 2 ip to have the vehicle appear near you and enter it for free.
pt-BR: Contanto que não haja ninguém a bordo do seu veículo pessoal, você poderá fazer com que ele desapareça com segurança do mundo do jogo a qualquer momento. Que magia ou tecnologia permite isso? Se o seu veículo pessoal não estiver presente no mundo do jogo e você estiver em um espaço grande o suficiente para contê-lo, você pode realizar a ação de Inventário e gastar 2 PI para que o veículo apareça perto de você e entre nele de graça.

en: When you perform the **Equipment** or **Guard** action while driving your **personal vehicle**, you may choose up to【**SL**】of its enabled modules and **disable** them. If you do, choose up to an equal amount of its disabled modules and **enable** them.
it: Quando esegui l’azione di **Equipaggiamento** o di **Guardia**, se sei alla guida del tuo **veicolo personale**, puoi scegliere fino a 【**LA**】 tra i suoi moduli abilitati e **disabilitarli**; se lo fai, scegli altrettanti tra i suoi moduli disabilitati e **abilitali**.
de: When you perform the Equipment or Guard action while driving your personal vehicle, you may choose up to 【SL】 of its enabled modules and disable them. If you do, choose up to an equal amount of its disabled modules and enable them.
pl: When you perform the Equipment or Guard action while driving your personal vehicle, you may choose up to 【SL】 of its enabled modules and disable them. If you do, choose up to an equal amount of its disabled modules and enable them.
fr: Quand vous réalisez l’action **Équipement** ou **Garde** aux commandes de votre **véhicule personnel**, vous pouvez désigner jusqu’à **【NC】** modules activés à bord et les **désactiver**. Ensuite, vous pouvez choisir une quantité inférieure ou égale de modules désactivés pour les **activer**.
es: When you perform the Equipment or Guard action while driving your personal vehicle, you may choose up to 【SL】 of its enabled modules and disable them. If you do, choose up to an equal amount of its disabled modules and enable them.
pt-BR: Ao realizar a ação de Equipamento ou Guarda enquanto dirige seu veículo pessoal, você pode escolher até 【NH】 de seus módulos habilitados e desativá-los. Se você fizer isso, escolha uma quantidade igual de módulos desabilitados e ative-os.

en: At the start of your turn during a conflict, if you are driving your **personal vehicle**, you may spend 10 Mind Points. If you do, choose one option: the next time you deal damage during this turn, deal【**SL × 2**】extra damage; **or** the next time you suffer damage before the start of your next turn, that damage is reduced by【**SL × 2**】(applied **before** damage Affinities); **or** you recover from a status effect of your choice among **slow** and **weak**.
it: All’inizio del tuo turno durante un conflitto, se sei alla guida del tuo **veicolo personale**, puoi spendere 10 PM. Se lo fai, scegli un’opzione: la prossima volta che infliggi danno durante questo turno, infliggi 【**LA × 2**】 danni extra; **oppure**, la prossima volta che subisci danno prima dell’inizio del tuo prossimo turno, quel danno è ridotto di 【**LA × 2**】 (**prima** di applicare le Affinità); **oppure**, guarisci da uno status a scelta tra **debole** e **lento**.
de: At the start of your turn during a conflict, if you are driving your personal vehicle, you may spend 10 mp. If you do, choose one option: the next time you deal damage during this turn, deal 【SL × 2】 extra damage; or, the next time you suffer damage before the start of your next turn, that damage is reduced by 【SL × 2】(applied before damage Affinities); or, you recover from a status effect of your choice among slow and weak.
pl: At the start of your turn during a conflict, if you are driving your personal vehicle, you may spend 10 mp. If you do, choose one option: the next time you deal damage during this turn, deal 【SL × 2】 extra damage; or, the next time you suffer damage before the start of your next turn, that damage is reduced by 【SL × 2】(applied before damage Affinities); or, you recover from a status effect of your choice among slow and weak.
fr: Au début de votre tour pendant un conflit, si vous pilotez votre **véhicule personnel**, vous pouvez dépenser 10 Points de Magie et choisir une option : la prochaine fois que vous infligez des dégâts durant ce tour, vous en infligez **【NC × 2】** de plus ; **OU** la prochaine fois que vous subissez des dégâts avant le début de votre prochain tour, ils diminuent de **【NC × 2】** (à appliquer **avant** les affinités aux dégâts) ; **OU** vous vous remettez de l’état **ralenti** ou **affaibli** (à vous de choisir).
es: At the start of your turn during a conflict, if you are driving your personal vehicle, you may spend 10 mp. If you do, choose one option: the next time you deal damage during this turn, deal 【SL × 2】 extra damage; or, the next time you suffer damage before the start of your next turn, that damage is reduced by 【SL × 2】(applied before damage Affinities); or, you recover from a status effect of your choice among slow and weak.
pt-BR: No início do seu turno durante um conflito, se você estiver dirigindo seu veículo pessoal, você poderá gastar 10 PM. Se fizer isso, escolha uma opção: na próxima vez que você causar dano durante este turno, cause 【NH × 2】 dano extra; ou, na próxima vez que você sofrer dano antes do início do seu próximo turno, esse dano será reduzido em 【NH × 2】 (aplicado antes das Afinidades de dano); ou você se recupera de um efeito de status de sua escolha entre lento e fraco.

en: When you acquire this Skill, you gain a **personal vehicle** with a **frame** of your choice and **three different modules** of your choice. Whenever you acquire this Skill again, you acquire **two additional modules** of your choice.
it: Quando acquisisci questa Abilità, ottieni un **veicolo personale** con una **struttura** a tua scelta e **tre moduli differenti** a tua scelta. Ogni volta che acquisisci nuovamente questa Abilità, ottieni **due moduli** a tua scelta.
de: When you acquire this Skill, you gain a personal vehicle with a frame of your choice and three different modules of your choice. Whenever you acquire this Skill again, you acquire two additional modules of your choice.
pl: When you acquire this Skill, you gain a personal vehicle with a frame of your choice and three different modules of your choice. Whenever you acquire this Skill again, you acquire two additional modules of your choice.
fr: Quand vous acquérez cette compétence, vous recevez un **véhicule personnel** de l’**ossature** de votre choix accompagné de **trois modules** différents, de votre choix. Chaque fois que vous obtenez de nouveau cette compétence, vous recevez **deux modules supplémentaires** de votre choix.
es: When you acquire this Skill, you gain a personal vehicle with a frame of your choice and three different modules of your choice. Whenever you acquire this Skill again, you acquire two additional modules of your choice.
pt-BR: Ao adquirir esse Poder, você ganha um veículo pessoal com quadro à sua escolha e três módulos diferentes à sua escolha. Sempre que adquirir esse Poder novamente, você adquire dois módulos adicionais à sua escolha.

en: When you perform an Accuracy Check with a **weapon module**, you may replace **one** of the Attributes with **Might** (such as【**MIG + WLP**】for an **arcane module**).
it: Quando effettui un Test di Precisione con un **modulo arma**, puoi sostituire **uno** dei dadi di Caratteristica con **Vigore** (ad esempio 【**VIG + VOL**】 per un **modulo arcano**).
de: When you perform an Accuracy Check with a weapon module, you may replace one of the Attributes with Might (such as 【MIG + WLP】 for an Arcane module).
pl: When you perform an Accuracy Check with a weapon module, you may replace one of the Attributes with Might (such as 【MIG + WLP】 for an Arcane module).
fr: Quand vous réalisez un test de précision avec un **module d’arme**, vous pouvez remplacer **un** des attributs par **Puissance** (par exemple **【PUI + VOL】** pour un **module arcanique**).
es: When you perform an Accuracy Check with a weapon module, you may replace one of the Attributes with Might (such as 【MIG + WLP】 for an Arcane module).
pt-BR: Ao realizar uma Verificação de Precisão com um módulo de arma, você pode substituir um dos Atributos por Vigor (como 【VIG + VON】 para um módulo Arcano).

en: You weave magical energy and protect the targets from the fury of the elements. Choose a damage type: **air**, **bolt**, **earth**, **fire**, or **ice**. Until this spell ends, each target gains Resistance against the chosen damage type.
it: Plasmi l’energia magica e proteggi i bersagli dalla furia degli elementi. Scegli un tipo di danno: aria, fulmine, fuoco, ghiaccio o terra. Finché questo incantesimo è attivo, ciascun bersaglio ottiene Resistenza al tipo di danno scelto.
de: You weave magical energy and protect the targets from the fury of the elements. Choose a damage type: air, bolt, earth, fire, or ice. Until this spell ends, each target gains Resistance against the chosen damage type.
pl: You weave magical energy and protect the targets from the fury of the elements. Choose a damage type: air, bolt, earth, fire, or ice. Until this spell ends, each target gains Resistance against the chosen damage type.
fr: Vous tissez un voile d’énergie magique qui protège les cibles des éléments déchaînés. Choisissez un type de magie : **air**, **foudre**, **terre**, **feu** ou **glace**. Tant que ce sort fait effet, chaque cible bénéficie d’une résistance face au type de dégâts choisi.
es: You weave magical energy and protect the targets from the fury of the elements. Choose a damage type: air, bolt, earth, fire, or ice. Until this spell ends, each target gains Resistance against the chosen damage type.
pt-BR: Você tece energia mágica e protege os alvos da fúria dos elementos. Escolha um tipo de dano: ar, raio, terra, fogo ou gelo. Até que este feitiço termine, cada alvo ganha Resistência contra o tipo de dano escolhido.

en: You imbue a weapon with elemental energy. Choose a damage type: **air**, **bolt**, **earth**, **fire**, or **ice**. Until this spell ends, all damage dealt by the weapon becomes of the chosen damage type. If you have that weapon equipped while you cast this spell, you may perform a **free attack** with it as part of the same action. This spell can only be cast on a weapon equipped by a willing creature.
it:
Infondi energia elementale in un’arma. Scegli un tipo di danno: aria, fulmine, fuoco, ghiaccio o terra. Fino al termine di questo incantesimo, il danno inflitto dall’arma diventa del tipo scelto. Se hai quell’arma equipaggiata mentre lanci questo incantesimo, puoi eseguire un attacco gratuito con essa come parte della stessa azione.
Puoi lanciare questo incantesimo solo su armi equipaggiate da creature consenzienti.
de: You imbue a weapon with elemental energy. Choose a damage type: air, bolt, earth, fire, or ice. Until this spell ends, all damage dealt by the weapon becomes of the chosen damage type. If you have that weapon equipped while you cast this spell, you may perform a free attack with it as part of the same action. This spell can only be cast on a weapon equipped by a willing creature.
pl: You imbue a weapon with elemental energy. Choose a damage type: air, bolt, earth, fire, or ice. Until this spell ends, all damage dealt by the weapon becomes of the chosen damage type. If you have that weapon equipped while you cast this spell, you may perform a free attack with it as part of the same action. This spell can only be cast on a weapon equipped by a willing creature.
fr: Vous imprégnez une arme d’énergie magique. Choisissez un type de dégâts : **air**, **foudre**, **terre**, **feu** ou **glace**. Tant que ce sort fait effet, tous les dégâts infligés par l’arme sont du type choisi. Si vous êtes équipé de l’arme lorsque vous lancez ce sort, vous pouvez l’utiliser pour réaliser une **attaque gratuite** dans la même action. Ce sort ne peut être lancé que sur l’arme d’une créature volontaire.
es: You imbue a weapon with elemental energy. Choose a damage type: air, bolt, earth, fire, or ice. Until this spell ends, all damage dealt by the weapon becomes of the chosen damage type. If you have that weapon equipped while you cast this spell, you may perform a free attack with it as part of the same action. This spell can only be cast on a weapon equipped by a willing creature.
pt-BR: Você imbui uma arma com energia elementar. Escolha um tipo de dano: ar, raio, terra, fogo ou gelo. Até que este feitiço termine, todo dano causado pela arma passa a ser do tipo de dano escolhido. Se você tiver aquela arma equipada enquanto lança esta magia, você pode realizar um ataque livre com ela como parte da mesma ação. Este feitiço só pode ser lançado em uma arma equipada por uma criatura voluntária.

en: You channel a single ray of fire towards your foe, its temperature so high that it will pierce through most defenses. The target suffers【**HR + 25**】**fire** damage. Damage dealt by this spell ignores Resistances.
it:
Scagli un singolo raggio di fuoco verso il nemico, così rovente da penetrare quasi ogni difesa. Il bersaglio subisce【TM + 25】 danni da fuoco.
I danni inflitti da questo incantesimo ignorano le Resistenze.
de: You channel a single ray of fire towards your foe, its temperature so high that it will pierce through most defenses. The target suffers 【HR + 25】 fire damage. Damage dealt by this spell ignores Resistances.
pl: You channel a single ray of fire towards your foe, its temperature so high that it will pierce through most defenses. The target suffers 【HR + 25】 fire damage. Damage dealt by this spell ignores Resistances.
fr: Vous faites jaillir vers votre adversaire un trait de feu d’une température si élevée qu’il perce la plupart des défenses. La cible subit **【VH + 25】** dégâts de **feu**. Les dégâts infligés par ce sort ignorent les résistances.
es: You channel a single ray of fire towards your foe, its temperature so high that it will pierce through most defenses. The target suffers 【HR + 25】 fire damage. Damage dealt by this spell ignores Resistances.
pt-BR: Você canaliza um único raio de fogo em direção ao seu inimigo, sua temperatura é tão alta que perfura a maioria das defesas. O alvo sofre 【RA + 25】 dano de fogo. O dano causado por este feitiço ignora as Resistências.

en: You weave electricity into a wave of crackling bolts. Each target hit by this spell suffers【**HR + 15**】**bolt** damage. **Opportunity:** Each target hit by this spell suffers **dazed**.
it:
Plasmi l’elettricità in un’onda di energia crepitante. Ciascun bersaglio colpito subisce 【TM + 15】 danni da fulmine.
Opportunità: ciascun bersaglio colpito subisce lo status confuso.
de: You weave electricity into a wave of crackling bolts. Each target hit by this spell suffers 【HR + 15】 bolt damage. Opportunity: Each target hit by this spell suffers dazed.
pl: You weave electricity into a wave of crackling bolts. Each target hit by this spell suffers 【HR + 15】 bolt damage. Opportunity: Each target hit by this spell suffers dazed.
fr: Vous agencez l’électricité en une vague d’éclairs qui crépitent. Chaque cible touchée subit aussitôt **【VH + 15】** dégâts de **foudre**. **Aubaine** : chaque cible touchée par le sort subit l’état **étourdi**.
es: You weave electricity into a wave of crackling bolts. Each target hit by this spell suffers 【HR + 15】 bolt damage. Opportunity: Each target hit by this spell suffers dazed.
pt-BR: Você transforma eletricidade em uma onda de raios crepitantes. Cada alvo atingido por este feitiço sofre 【RA + 15】 dano de raio. Oportunidade: Cada alvo atingido por este feitiço fica atordoado.

en: You coat your foes under a thick layer of frost. Each target hit by this spell suffers【**HR+ 15**】**ice** damage. **Opportunity:** Each target hit by this spell suffers **slow**.
it:
Ricopri i nemici con uno spesso strato di ghiaccio. Ciascun bersaglio colpito subisce 【TM + 15】 danni da ghiaccio.
Opportunità: ciascun bersaglio colpito subisce lo status lento.
de: You coat your foes under a thick layer of frost. Each target hit by this spell suffers 【HR+ 15】 ice damage. Opportunity: Each target hit by this spell suffers slow.
pl: You coat your foes under a thick layer of frost. Each target hit by this spell suffers 【HR+ 15】 ice damage. Opportunity: Each target hit by this spell suffers slow.
fr: Vous couvrez vos adversaires d’une épaisse couche de givre. Chaque cible touchée subit aussitôt **【VH + 15】** dégâts de **glace**. **Aubaine** : chaque cible touchée par le sort subit l’état **ralenti**.
es: You coat your foes under a thick layer of frost. Each target hit by this spell suffers 【HR+ 15】 ice damage. Opportunity: Each target hit by this spell suffers slow.
pt-BR: Você cobre seus inimigos com uma espessa camada de gelo. Cada alvo atingido por este feitiço sofre 【RA + 15】 dano de gelo. Oportunidade: Cada alvo atingido por este feitiço sofre lentidão.

en: A pillar of ice magic envelops your foe, suddenly dropping their body temperature to a critical level. The target suffer【**HR + 25**】**ice** damage. Damage dealt by this spell ignores Resistances.
it:
Una colonna di ghiaccio avvolge il nemico, abbassandone la temperatura corporea a livelli critici. Il bersaglio subisce【TM + 25】 danni da ghiaccio.
I danni inflitti da questo incantesimo ignorano le Resistenze.
de: A pillar of ice magic envelops your foe, suddenly dropping their body temperature to a critical level. The target suffers【HR + 25】ice damage. Damage dealt by this spell ignores Resistances.
pl: A pillar of ice magic envelops your foe, suddenly dropping their body temperature to a critical level. The target suffers【HR + 25】ice damage. Damage dealt by this spell ignores Resistances.
fr: Un pilier de magie de glace enveloppe votre adversaire, dont la température tombe à un seuil critique. La cible subit **【VH + 25】** dégâts de **glace**. Les dégâts infligés par ce sort ignorent les résistances.
es: A pillar of ice magic envelops your foe, suddenly dropping their body temperature to a critical level. The target suffers【HR + 25】ice damage. Damage dealt by this spell ignores Resistances.
pt-BR: Um pilar de magia de gelo envolve seu inimigo, diminuindo repentinamente a temperatura corporal dele a um nível crítico. O alvo sofre 【RA + 25】 dano de gelo. O dano causado por este feitiço ignora as Resistências.

en: You unleash a searing barrage against your foes, conjuring flames out of thin air. Each target hit by this spell suffers【**HR + 15**】**fire** damage. **Opportunity:** Each target hit by this spell suffers **shaken**.
it:
Evochi una pioggia di fiamme e la scateni sui tuoi nemici. Ciascun bersaglio colpito subisce【TM + 15】 danni da fuoco.
Opportunità: ciascun bersaglio colpito subisce lo status scosso.
de: You unleash a searing barrage against your foes, conjuring flames out of thin air. Each target hit by this spell suffers 【HR + 15】 fire damage. Opportunity: Each target hit by this spell suffers shaken.
pl: You unleash a searing barrage against your foes, conjuring flames out of thin air. Each target hit by this spell suffers 【HR + 15】 fire damage. Opportunity: Each target hit by this spell suffers shaken.
fr: Vous lâchez un déluge ardent sur vos adversaires en faisant apparaître spontanément des flammes. Chaque cible touchée subit **【VH + 15】** dégâts de **feu**. **Aubaine** : chaque cible touchée par le sort subit l’état **traumatisé**.
es: You unleash a searing barrage against your foes, conjuring flames out of thin air. Each target hit by this spell suffers 【HR + 15】 fire damage. Opportunity: Each target hit by this spell suffers shaken.
pt-BR: Você lança uma barragem devastadora contra seus inimigos, conjurando chamas do nada. Cada alvo atingido por este feitiço sofre 【RA + 15】 dano de fogo. Oportunidade: Cada alvo atingido por este feitiço fica abalado.

en: The wind carries your strikes across the battlefield. You may immediately perform a **free attack** with a **melee** weapon you have equipped. This attack may target creatures that can only be targeted by **ranged** attacks. If you used a weapon belonging to the **brawling** or **spear** Category for this attack, it deals 5 extra damage. If you hit a flying target with this attack, you may force them to land immediately.
it:
Il vento trasposta i tuoi colpi attraverso il campo di battaglia. Puoi immediatamente esguire un attacco gratuito con un’arma da mischia equipaggiata. Questo attacco può
bersagliare creature che possono essere bersagliate solo da attacchi a distanza.
Se hai usato un’arma della Categoria lancia o da rissa per questo attacco, infligge 5 danni extra.
Se colpisci un bersaglio volante con questo attacco, puoi obbligarlo ad atterrare.
de: The wind carries your strikes across the battlefield. You may immediately perform a free attack with a melee weapon you have equipped. This attack may target creatures that can only be targeted by ranged attacks. If you used a weapon belonging to the brawling or spear Category for this attack, it deals 5 extra damage. If you hit a flying target with this attack, you may force them to land immediately.
pl: The wind carries your strikes across the battlefield. You may immediately perform a free attack with a melee weapon you have equipped. This attack may target creatures that can only be targeted by ranged attacks. If you used a weapon belonging to the brawling or spear Category for this attack, it deals 5 extra damage. If you hit a flying target with this attack, you may force them to land immediately.
fr: Le vent porte vos attaques à l’autre bout du champ de bataille. Vous pouvez immédiatement réaliser une **attaque gratuite** avec une arme de **corps à corps** dont vous êtes équipé. Cette attaque peut prendre pour cible des créatures qu’on ne peut viser qu’avec des attaques **à distance**. Si vous utilisez une arme de catégorie **lutte** ou **lance**, l’attaque inflige 5 dégâts de plus. Si vous touchez une cible volante à l’aide de cette attaque, vous pouvez la forcer à atterrir immédiatement.
es: The wind carries your strikes across the battlefield. You may immediately perform a free attack with a melee weapon you have equipped. This attack may target creatures that can only be targeted by ranged attacks. If you used a weapon belonging to the brawling or spear Category for this attack, it deals 5 extra damage. If you hit a flying target with this attack, you may force them to land immediately.
pt-BR: O vento carrega seus ataques pelo campo de batalha. Você pode realizar imediatamente um ataque livre com uma arma corpo a corpo que tenha equipado. Este ataque pode ter como alvo criaturas que só podem ser alvo de ataques à distância. Se você usou uma arma pertencente à categoria Luta ou Lança para este ataque, ela causa 5 de dano extra. Se você atingir um alvo voador com este ataque, poderá forçá-lo a pousar imediatamente.

en: Spires of jagged rock erupt from the ground beneath your foes, closing around them. Each target hit by this spell suffers【**HR + 15**】**earth** damage. This spell cannot target creatures who are flying, floating, falling, or otherwise in mid-air. **Opportunity:** Each target hit by this spell performs one fewer action on their next turn (to a minimum of 0 actions).
it:
Guglie di pietra affilata sorgono dal terreno sotto i nemici, avvolgendoli. Ciascun bersaglio colpito subisce【TM + 15】 danni da terra. Questo incantesimo non può
bersagliare creature che stanno volando, fluttuando, cadendo o che si trovano a mezz’aria.
Opportunità: ciascun bersaglio colpito esegue un’azione in meno durante il suo prossimo turno (fino a un minimo di zero azioni).
de: Spires of jagged rock erupt from the ground beneath your foes, closing around them. Each target hit by this spell suffers【HR + 15】earth damage. This spell cannot target creatures who are flying, floating, falling, or otherwise in mid-air. Opportunity: Each target hit by this spell performs one fewer action on their next turn (to a minimum of 0 actions).
pl: Spires of jagged rock erupt from the ground beneath your foes, closing around them. Each target hit by this spell suffers【HR + 15】earth damage. This spell cannot target creatures who are flying, floating, falling, or otherwise in mid-air. Opportunity: Each target hit by this spell performs one fewer action on their next turn (to a minimum of 0 actions).
fr: Des spires de roche pointues jaillissent du sol sous vos adversaires et se referment sur eux. Chaque cible touchée par ce sort subit **【VH + 15】** dégâts de **terre**. Ce sort ne peut pas viser des créatures qui volent, lévitent, tombent ou se trouvent dans les airs pour quelque raison que ce soit. **Aubaine** : chaque cible touchée par ce sort effectue une action de moins à son prochain tour (pour un minimum de 0 action).
es: Spires of jagged rock erupt from the ground beneath your foes, closing around them. Each target hit by this spell suffers【HR + 15】earth damage. This spell cannot target creatures who are flying, floating, falling, or otherwise in mid-air. Opportunity: Each target hit by this spell performs one fewer action on their next turn (to a minimum of 0 actions).
pt-BR: Pináculos de rocha irregular irrompem do chão sob seus inimigos, fechando-se em torno deles. Cada alvo atingido por este feitiço sofre 【RA + 15】 dano de terra. Este feitiço não pode ter como alvo criaturas que estejam voando, flutuando, caindo ou de outra forma no ar. Oportunidade: Cada alvo atingido por este feitiço realiza uma ação a menos em seu próximo turno (até um mínimo de 0 ações).

en: You send lightning striking at your foe. The target suffers【**HR + 25**】**bolt** damage. Damage dealt by this spell ignores Resistances.
it:
Scagli una saetta sfolgorante verso il nemico. Il bersaglio subisce【TM + 25】 danni da fulmine.
I danni inflitti da questo incantesimo ignorano le Resistenze.
de: You send lightning striking at your foe. The target suffers【HR + 25】bolt damage. Damage dealt by this spell ignores Resistances.
pl: You send lightning striking at your foe. The target suffers【HR + 25】bolt damage. Damage dealt by this spell ignores Resistances.
fr: Vous lancez un éclair sur votre adversaire. La cible subit **【VH + 25】** dégâts de **foudre**. Les dégâts infligés par ce sort ignorent les résistances.
es: You send lightning striking at your foe. The target suffers【HR + 25】bolt damage. Damage dealt by this spell ignores Resistances.
pt-BR: Você envia um raio atingindo seu inimigo. O alvo sofre dano de raio 【RA + 25】. O dano causado por este feitiço ignora as Resistências.

en: You summon the power of winds against your enemy. Each target hit by this spell suffers【**HR + 15**】**air** damage. **Opportunity:** Each **flying** target hit by this spell is forced to land immediately.
it:
Evochi il potere dei venti contro i tuoi nemici. Ciascun bersaglio colpito subisce【TM + 15】 danni da aria.
Opportunità: ciascun bersaglio volante colpito deve atterrare immediatamente.
de: You summon the power of winds against your enemy. Each target hit by this spell suffers【HR + 15】air damage. Opportunity: Each flying target hit by this spell is forced to land immediately.
pl: You summon the power of winds against your enemy. Each target hit by this spell suffers【HR + 15】air damage. Opportunity: Each flying target hit by this spell is forced to land immediately.
fr: Vous invoquez la puissance des vents contre votre ennemi. Chaque cible touchée par ce sort subit **【VH + 15】** dégâts d’**air**. **Aubaine** : chaque cible **volante** touchée par ce sort est immédiatement forcée d’atterrir.
es: You summon the power of winds against your enemy. Each target hit by this spell suffers【HR + 15】air damage. Opportunity: Each flying target hit by this spell is forced to land immediately.
pt-BR: Você invoca o poder dos ventos contra seu inimigo. Cada alvo atingido por este feitiço sofre 【RA + 15】 dano aéreo. Oportunidade: Cada alvo voador atingido por este feitiço é forçado a pousar imediatamente.

en: A roaring gale surrounds you, blowing away arrows and bullets. Until this spell ends, you gain a +2 bonus to your Defense against **ranged** attacks.
it: Un vento feroce ti circonda, deviando frecce e proiettili. Fino al termine di questo incantesimo, ottieni un bonus di +2 alla tua Difesa contro gli attacchi a distanza.
de: A roaring gale surrounds you, blowing away arrows and bullets. Until this spell ends, you gain a +2 bonus to your Defense against ranged attacks.
pl: A roaring gale surrounds you, blowing away arrows and bullets. Until this spell ends, you gain a +2 bonus to your Defense against ranged attacks.
fr: Un véritable ouragan vous entoure, déviant flèches et balles. Jusqu’à ce que les effets de ce sort s’achèvent, vous bénéficiez d’un bonus de +2 à la Défense contre les attaques **à distance**.
es: A roaring gale surrounds you, blowing away arrows and bullets. Until this spell ends, you gain a +2 bonus to your Defense against ranged attacks.
pt-BR: Um vendaval forte envolve você, soprando flechas e balas. Até que esta magia termine, você ganha +2 de bônus em sua Defesa contra ataques à distância.

en: You bend the fabric of time. Until this spell ends, the target gains the ability to perform a single additional action during each of their turns. Once the target has performed a total of two additional actions granted by this spell, this spell ends.
it: Pieghi il tessuto del tempo. Fino al termine di questo incantesimo, il bersaglio può eseguire un’azione aggiuntiva durante ciascuno dei suoi turni. Dopo che il bersaglio ha eseguito due azioni aggiuntive in questo modo, questo incantesimo termina.
de: You bend the fabric of time. Until this spell ends, the target gains the ability to perform a single additional action during each of their turns. Once the target has performed a total of two additional actions granted by this spell, this spell ends.
pl: You bend the fabric of time. Until this spell ends, the target gains the ability to perform a single additional action during each of their turns. Once the target has performed a total of two additional actions granted by this spell, this spell ends.
fr: Vous altérez la trame du temps. Jusqu’à ce que cesse l’effet de ce sort, la cible a le pouvoir d’effectuer une action de plus à chacun de ses tours. Une fois qu’elle a réalisé un total de deux actions supplémentaires permises par ce sort, les effets de celui-ci s’achèvent.
es: You bend the fabric of time. Until this spell ends, the target gains the ability to perform a single additional action during each of their turns. Once the target has performed a total of two additional actions granted by this spell, this spell ends.
pt-BR: Você dobra a estrutura do tempo. Até que esta magia termine, o alvo ganha a habilidade de realizar uma única ação adicional durante cada um de seus turnos. Uma vez que o alvo tenha realizado um total de duas ações adicionais concedidas por esta magia, esta magia termina.

en: You alter the very nature of your target. Until this spell ends, if the target would suffer damage of a type they Absorb or are Immune to, they are instead treated as if they were Vulnerable to that damage type. Once that happens, this spell ends.
it: Alteri la natura stessa del bersaglio. Fino al termine di questo incantesimo, se il bersaglio subisce danni di un tipo che Assorbe o a cui è Immune, viene invece considerato Vulnerabile a essi. Quando ciò accade, questo incantesimo termina.
de: You alter the very nature of your target. Until this spell ends, if the target would suffer damage of a type they Absorb or are Immune to, they are instead treated as if they were Vulnerable to that damage type. Once that happens, this spell ends.
pl: You alter the very nature of your target. Until this spell ends, if the target would suffer damage of a type they Absorb or are Immune to, they are instead treated as if they were Vulnerable to that damage type. Once that happens, this spell ends.
fr: Vous altérez la nature de votre cible. Jusqu’à ce que l’effet de ce sort cesse, lorsqu’elle subit des dégâts d’un type qu’elle absorbe ou contre lesquels elle est immunisée, ils sont traités comme si elle y était vulnérable au contraire. Une fois que cela s’est produit, l’effet du sort s’achève.
es: You alter the very nature of your target. Until this spell ends, if the target would suffer damage of a type they Absorb or are Immune to, they are instead treated as if they were Vulnerable to that damage type. Once that happens, this spell ends.
pt-BR: Você altera a própria natureza do seu alvo. Até que este feitiço termine, se o alvo sofrer dano de um tipo que ele Absorve ou ao qual é Imune, ele será tratado como se fosse Vulnerável a esse tipo de dano. Quando isso acontecer, o feitiço termina.

en: You imbue a weapon with dark energy. Until this spell ends, all damage dealt by the weapon becomes of the **dark** type. If you have that weapon equipped while you cast this spell, you may perform a **free attack** with it as part of the same action. This spell can only be cast on a weapon equipped by a willing creature.
it:
Avvolgi un’arma nelle tenebre. Fino al termine di questo incantesimo, tutto il danno inflitto dall’arma diventa ombra. Se hai quell’arma equipaggiata mentre lanci questo incantesimo,puoi eseguire un attacco gratuito con essa come parte della stessa azione.
Puoi lanciare questo incantesimo solo su armi equipaggiate da creature consenzienti.
de: You imbue a weapon with dark energy. Until this spell ends, all damage dealt by the weapon becomes of the dark type. If you have that weapon equipped while you cast this spell, you may perform a free attack with it as part of the same action. This spell can only be cast on a weapon equipped by a willing creature.
pl: You imbue a weapon with dark energy. Until this spell ends, all damage dealt by the weapon becomes of the dark type. If you have that weapon equipped while you cast this spell, you may perform a free attack with it as part of the same action. This spell can only be cast on a weapon equipped by a willing creature.
fr: Vous imprégnez une arme d’énergie ténébreuse. Tant que ce sort fait effet, tous les dégâts infligés par l’arme sont de type **ténèbres**. Si vous êtes équipé de l’arme lorsque vous lancez ce sort, vous pouvez l’utiliser pour réaliser une **attaque gratuite** dans la même action. Ce sort ne peut être lancé que sur l’arme d’une créature volontaire.
es: You imbue a weapon with dark energy. Until this spell ends, all damage dealt by the weapon becomes of the dark type. If you have that weapon equipped while you cast this spell, you may perform a free attack with it as part of the same action. This spell can only be cast on a weapon equipped by a willing creature.
pt-BR: Você imbui uma arma com energia sombria. Até que este feitiço termine, todo dano causado pela arma se torna do tipo trevas. Se você tiver aquela arma equipada enquanto lança esta magia, você pode realizar um ataque livre com ela como parte da mesma ação. Este feitiço só pode ser lançado em uma arma equipada por uma criatura voluntária.

en: You release a wave of negative energy and cleanse all magic from a creature. If the target is affected by one or more spells with a **duration** of Scene, they are no longer affected by any of those spells instead.
it: Un’onda di energia negativa spezza gli incantesimi presenti su una creatura. Se il bersaglio è sotto l’effetto di uno o più incantesimi con durata “Scena”, invece non è più sotto l’effetto di quegli incantesimi.
de: You release a wave of negative energy and cleanse all magic from a creature. If the target is affected by one or more spells with a duration of Scene, they are no longer affected by any of those spells instead.
pl: You release a wave of negative energy and cleanse all magic from a creature. If the target is affected by one or more spells with a duration of Scene, they are no longer affected by any of those spells instead.
fr: Vous libérez une vague d’énergie négative qui dissipe toute magie d’une créature. Si la cible était sous l’effet d’un ou plusieurs sorts dont la **durée** est d’une scène, leur effet sur elle s’arrête immédiatement.
es: You release a wave of negative energy and cleanse all magic from a creature. If the target is affected by one or more spells with a duration of Scene, they are no longer affected by any of those spells instead.
pt-BR: Você libera uma onda de energia negativa e limpa toda a magia de uma criatura. Se o alvo for afetado por um ou mais feitiços com duração de Cena, ele não será mais afetado por nenhum desses feitiços.

en: You glimpse briefly into the future. Until this spell ends, after a creature you can see performs a Check, if it was not a **fumble** nor a **critical success**, you may force that creature to reroll **both** dice. Once you have forced **two** rerolls this way, this spell ends.
it: Hai una premonizione. Fino al termine di questo incantesimo, dopo che una creatura a te visibile effettua un Test, se non è un fallimento critico o successo critico, puoi farle ritirare entrambi i dadi. Dopo aver causato due ritiri in questo modo, questo incantesimo termina.
de: You glimpse briefly into the future. Until this spell ends, after a creature you can see performs a Check, if it was not a fumble nor a critical success, you may force that creature to reroll both dice. Once you have forced two rerolls this way, this spell ends.
pl: You glimpse briefly into the future. Until this spell ends, after a creature you can see performs a Check, if it was not a fumble nor a critical success, you may force that creature to reroll both dice. Once you have forced two rerolls this way, this spell ends.
fr: Vous avez un bref aperçu de l’avenir. Jusqu’à la fin de l’effet de ce sort, lorsqu’une créature que vous voyez effectue un test, s’il ne s’agit ni d’un **échec critique** ni d’une **réussite critique**, vous pouvez la forcer à relancer **les deux** dés. Une fois que vous avez forcé **deux** relances de la sorte, l’effet de ce sort s’achève.
es: You glimpse briefly into the future. Until this spell ends, after a creature you can see performs a Check, if it was not a fumble nor a critical success, you may force that creature to reroll both dice. Once you have forced two rerolls this way, this spell ends.
pt-BR: Você vislumbra brevemente o futuro. Até que esta magia termine, depois que uma criatura que você pode ver realizar um Teste, se não foi um desastre nem um sucesso crítico, você pode forçar aquela criatura a rolar novamente ambos os dados. Depois de forçar duas novas jogadas desta forma, este feitiço termina.

en: You consume a creature's psyche. The target loses【**HR + 15**】Mind Points. Then, you recover an amount of Mind Points equal to half the Mind Points loss they suffered (if the loss was reduced to 0 in some way, you recover none).
it: Consumi la psiche di una creatura. Il bersaglio perde【TM + 15】 Punti Mente, e recuperi un ammontare di Punti Mente pari a metà dei Punti Mente persi dal bersaglio (se la perdita è stata ridotta a 0 in qualche modo, non recuperi Punti Mente).
de: You consume a creature's psyche. The target loses 【HR + 15】 Mind Points. Then, you recover an amount of Mind Points equal to half the Mind Points loss they suffered (if the loss was reduced to 0 in some way, you recover none).
pl: You consume a creature's psyche. The target loses 【HR + 15】 Mind Points. Then, you recover an amount of Mind Points equal to half the Mind Points loss they suffered (if the loss was reduced to 0 in some way, you recover none).
fr: Vous absorbez l’énergie psychique d’une créature. La cible perd **【VH + 15】** Points de Magie. Ensuite, vous récupérez un nombre de Points de Magie égal à la moitié des points perdus (si la perte en question a été réduite à 0 d’une façon ou d’une autre, vous ne gagnez rien).
es: You consume a creature's psyche. The target loses 【HR + 15】 Mind Points. Then, you recover an amount of Mind Points equal to half the Mind Points loss they suffered (if the loss was reduced to 0 in some way, you recover none).
pt-BR: Você consome a psique de uma criatura. O alvo perde 【RA + 15】 Pontos Mentais. Então, você recupera uma quantidade de Pontos Mentais igual à metade da perda de Pontos Mentais que eles sofreram (se a perda foi reduzida a 0 de alguma forma, você não recupera nenhum).

en: You steal another creature's life force. The target suffers【**HR + 15**】**dark** damage. Then, you recover an amount of Hit Points equal to half the Hit Points loss they suffered (if the loss was reduced to 0 in some way, you recover none).
it: Assorbi la vitalità altrui. Il bersaglio subisce【TM + 15】 danni da ombra, e recuperi un ammontare di Punti Vita pari a metà dei Punti Vita persi dal bersaglio (se la perdita è stata ridotta a 0 in qualche modo, non recuperi Punti Vita).
de: You steal another creature's life force. The target suffers 【HR + 15】 dark damage. Then, you recover an amount of Hit Points equal to half the Hit Points loss they suffered (if the loss was reduced to 0 in some way, you recover none).
pl: You steal another creature's life force. The target suffers 【HR + 15】 dark damage. Then, you recover an amount of Hit Points equal to half the Hit Points loss they suffered (if the loss was reduced to 0 in some way, you recover none).
fr: Vous volez l’énergie vitale d’une créature. La cible subit **【VH + 15】** dégâts de **ténèbres**. Ensuite, vous récupérez un nombre de Points de Vie égal à la moitié des points perdus (si la perte en question a été réduite à 0 d’une façon ou d’une autre, vous ne gagnez rien).
es: You steal another creature's life force. The target suffers 【HR + 15】 dark damage. Then, you recover an amount of Hit Points equal to half the Hit Points loss they suffered (if the loss was reduced to 0 in some way, you recover none).
pt-BR: Você rouba a força vital de outra criatura. O alvo sofre 【RA + 15】de dano trevas . Então, você recupera uma quantidade de Pontos de Vida igual à metade da perda de Pontos de Vida que eles sofreram (se a perda foi reduzida a 0 de alguma forma, você não recupera nenhum).

en: You twist the laws of magic. Until this spell ends, if an offensive (⚡) spell is cast on the target, the creature who cast that offensive spell will be targeted in their stead (any other targets of the offensive spell will be targeted as normal). Once that happens, this spell ends.
it: Pieghi le leggi della magia. Fino al termine di questo incantesimo, se un incantesimo offensivo (⚡) viene lanciato sul bersaglio, la creatura che ha lanciato l’incantesimo offensivo in questione viene bersagliata al suo posto (eventuali altri bersagli vengono bersagliati normalmente). Dopo che ciò accade, questo incantesimo termina.
de: You twist the laws of magic. Until this spell ends, if an offensive (⚡) spell is cast on the target, the creature who cast that offensive spell will be targeted in their stead (any other targets of the offensive spell will be targeted as normal). Once that happens, this spell ends.
pl: You twist the laws of magic. Until this spell ends, if an offensive (⚡) spell is cast on the target, the creature who cast that offensive spell will be targeted in their stead (any other targets of the offensive spell will be targeted as normal). Once that happens, this spell ends.
fr: Vous déformez les lois de la magie. Jusqu’à ce que l’effet de ce sort s’achève, si un sort offensif (⚡) est lancé sur votre sujet, la créature qui l’a lancé est prise pour cible à sa place par le sort en question (toutes les autres cibles de ce dernier sont visées normalement). Une fois que cela s’est produit, l’effet du sort s’achève.
es: You twist the laws of magic. Until this spell ends, if an offensive (⚡) spell is cast on the target, the creature who cast that offensive spell will be targeted in their stead (any other targets of the offensive spell will be targeted as normal). Once that happens, this spell ends.
pt-BR: Você distorce as leis da magia. Até que este feitiço termine, se um feitiço ofensivo (⚡) for lançado no alvo, a criatura que lançou aquele feitiço ofensivo será o alvo em seu lugar (quaisquer outros alvos do feitiço ofensivo serão alvo normalmente). Quando isso acontecer, o feitiço termina.

en: You invoke doom on your foe, turning strength into frailty. The target loses an amount of Hit Points equal to【**20 + half the target's level**】.
it: Condanni un nemico alla rovina, trasformandone la forza in debolezza. Il bersaglio perde un ammontare di Punti Vita pari a【20 + metà del livello del bersaglio】.
de: You invoke doom on your foe, turning strength into frailty. The target loses an amount of Hit Points equal to【20 + half the target's level】.
pl: You invoke doom on your foe, turning strength into frailty. The target loses an amount of Hit Points equal to【20 + half the target's level】.
fr: Vous invoquez le mauvais sort contre votre adversaire pour transformer sa force en fragilité. La cible perd un nombre de Points de Vie égal à **【20 + la moitié de son niveau】** .
es: You invoke doom on your foe, turning strength into frailty. The target loses an amount of Hit Points equal to【20 + half the target's level】.
pt-BR: Você invoca a destruição de seu inimigo, transformando força em fragilidade. O alvo perde uma quantidade de Pontos de Vida igual a 【20 + metade do nível do alvo】.

en: You trap a foe inside a circle of altered time and space. The target will perform one fewer action on their next turn (to a minimum of 0 actions).
it: Intrappoli il nemico in una bolla di tempo e spazio alterati. Il bersaglio esegue un’azione in meno durante il suo prossimo turno (fino a un minimo di zero azioni).
de: You trap a foe inside a circle of altered time and space. The target will perform one fewer action on their next turn (to a minimum of 0 actions).
pl: You trap a foe inside a circle of altered time and space. The target will perform one fewer action on their next turn (to a minimum of 0 actions).
fr: Vous enfermez un adversaire dans un cercle de temps et d’espace altérés. La cible effectue une action de moins à son prochain tour (pour un minimum de 0 action).
es: You trap a foe inside a circle of altered time and space. The target will perform one fewer action on their next turn (to a minimum of 0 actions).
pt-BR: Você prende um inimigo dentro de um círculo de tempo e espaço alterados. O alvo realizará uma ação a menos no próximo turno (até um mínimo de 0 ações).

en: A storm of dark energy turns matter into ash. Each target hit by this spell suffers【**HR + 15**】**dark** damage. **Opportunity:** Each target hit by this spell suffers **weak**.
it:
Una tempesta di energie oscure sbriciola la materia. Ciascun bersaglio colpito subisce 【TM + 15】 danni da ombra.
Opportunità: Ciascun bersaglio colpito subisce lo status debole.
de: A storm of dark energy turns matter into ash. Each target hit by this spell suffers 【HR + 15】 dark damage. Opportunity: Each target hit by this spell suffers weak.
pl: A storm of dark energy turns matter into ash. Each target hit by this spell suffers 【HR + 15】 dark damage. Opportunity: Each target hit by this spell suffers weak.
fr: Une tempête d’énergie noire transforme la matière en cendres. Chaque cible touchée par ce sort subit **【VH + 15】** dégâts de **ténèbres**. **Aubaine** : chaque cible touchée par ce sort subit l’état **affaibli**.
es: A storm of dark energy turns matter into ash. Each target hit by this spell suffers 【HR + 15】 dark damage. Opportunity: Each target hit by this spell suffers weak.
pt-BR: Uma tempestade de energia escura transforma matéria em cinzas. Cada alvo atingido por este feitiço sofre 【RA + 15】de dano trevas. Oportunidade: Cada alvo atingido por este feitiço sofre fraqueza.

en: You project your soul outside your body and direct it to surround the targets, shielding them from dangerous magic. Until this spell ends, each target may treat their Magic Defense as being equal to 12 against any effects that target it (they are still free to use their normal Defense score if higher than 12).
it: Proietti il tuo spirito fuori dal corpo e lo usi per avvolgere i bersagli, proteggendoli dai pericoli della magia. Fino al termine di questo incantesimo, ciascun bersaglio può considerare la sua Difesa Magica pari a 12 contro qualsiasi effetto (può comunque utilizzare il suo normale valore di Difesa Magica nel caso sia maggiore di 12).
de: You project your soul outside your body and direct it to surround the targets, shielding them from dangerous magic. Until this spell ends, each target may treat their Magic Defense as being equal to 12 against any effects that target it (they are still free to use their normal Defense score if higher than 12).
pl: You project your soul outside your body and direct it to surround the targets, shielding them from dangerous magic. Until this spell ends, each target may treat their Magic Defense as being equal to 12 against any effects that target it (they are still free to use their normal Defense score if higher than 12).
fr: Vous projetez votre âme hors de votre corps afin qu’elle entoure les cibles et les protège contre la magie néfaste. Jusqu’à la fin des effets de ce sort, chaque cible fait comme si sa Défense magique était de 12 contre tout effet qui la prend pour cible (mais peut utiliser sa valeur normale si elle est supérieure à 12).
es: You project your soul outside your body and direct it to surround the targets, shielding them from dangerous magic. Until this spell ends, each target may treat their Magic Defense as being equal to 12 against any effects that target it (they are still free to use their normal Defense score if higher than 12).
pt-BR: Você projeta sua alma fora do corpo e a direciona para cercar os alvos, protegendo-os de magia perigosa. Até que esta magia termine, cada alvo pode tratar sua Defesa Mágica como sendo igual a 12 contra quaisquer efeitos que o tenham como alvo (eles ainda estão livres para usar seu valor de Defesa normal se for maior que 12).

en: You allow a creature to focus their vital energy into accomplishing what they previously could not. Choose one Attribute: **Dexterity**, **Insight**, **Might**, or **Willpower**. Until this spell ends, the target treats the chosen Attribute as if it were one die size higher (up to a maximum of **d12**).
it: Consenti a una creatura di concentrare la sua energia vitale perché sia in grado di superare i propri limiti. Scegli Destrezza, Intuito, Vigore o Volontà: fino al termine di questo incantesimo, il bersaglio considera la Caratteristica scelta incrementata di una taglia di dado (massimo d12).
de: You allow a creature to focus their vital energy into accomplishing what they previously could not. Choose one Attribute: Dexterity, Insight, Might, or Willpower. Until this spell ends, the target treats the chosen Attribute as if it were one die size higher (up to a maximum of d12).
pl: You allow a creature to focus their vital energy into accomplishing what they previously could not. Choose one Attribute: Dexterity, Insight, Might, or Willpower. Until this spell ends, the target treats the chosen Attribute as if it were one die size higher (up to a maximum of d12).
fr: Vous permettez à une créature de concentrer son énergie vitale pour accomplir ce qui lui était impossible jusqu’alors. Choisissez un attribut : **Dextérité**, **Intuition**, **Puissance** ou **Volonté**. Jusqu’à ce que l’effet du sort s’achève, la cible fait comme si la taille de dé de cet attribut était supérieure d’un cran (jusqu’à un maximum de **d12**).
es: You allow a creature to focus their vital energy into accomplishing what they previously could not. Choose one Attribute: Dexterity, Insight, Might, or Willpower. Until this spell ends, the target treats the chosen Attribute as if it were one die size higher (up to a maximum of d12).
pt-BR: Você permite que uma criatura concentre sua energia vital em realizar o que antes não conseguia. Escolha um Atributo: Destreza, Astúcia, Vigor ou Vontade. Até que esta magia termine, o alvo trata o Atributo escolhido como se fosse um tamanho de dado maior (até um máximo de d12).

en: You project your soul outside your body and weave it into a barrier to protect the targets from attacks. Until this spell ends, each target may treat their Defense as being equal to 12 against any effects that target it (they are still free to use their normal Defense score if higher than 12).
it: Proietti il tuo spirito fuori dal corpo e lo intrecci in una barriera che protegge i bersagli dagli attacchi. Fino al termine di questo incantesimo, ciascun bersaglio può considerare la sua Difesa come pari a 12 contro qualsiasi effetto (può comunque utilizzare il suo normale valore di Difesa nel caso sia maggiore di 12).
de: You project your soul outside your body and weave it into a barrier to protect the targets from attacks. Until this spell ends, each target may treat their Defense as being equal to 12 against any effects that target it (they are still free to use their normal Defense score if higher than 12).
pl: You project your soul outside your body and weave it into a barrier to protect the targets from attacks. Until this spell ends, each target may treat their Defense as being equal to 12 against any effects that target it (they are still free to use their normal Defense score if higher than 12).
fr: Vous projetez votre âme hors de votre corps afin d’en faire une barrière protégeant les cibles contre les attaques. Jusqu’à la fin des effets de ce sort, chaque cible fait comme si sa Défense était de 12 contre tout effet qui la prend pour cible (mais peut utiliser sa valeur normale si elle est supérieure à 12).
es: You project your soul outside your body and weave it into a barrier to protect the targets from attacks. Until this spell ends, each target may treat their Defense as being equal to 12 against any effects that target it (they are still free to use their normal Defense score if higher than 12).
pt-BR: Você projeta sua alma fora do corpo e a transforma em uma barreira para proteger os alvos de ataques. Até que este feitiço termine, cada alvo pode tratar sua Defesa como sendo igual a 12 contra quaisquer efeitos que o tenham como alvo (eles ainda estão livres para usar seu valor de Defesa normal se for maior que 12).

en: You strengthen and purify the soul energy coursing through your companions. Each target recovers from all status effects.
it: Rafforzi e purifichi l’energia spirituale che scorre nei tuoi alleati. Ciascun bersaglio guarisce da tutti gli status.
de: You strengthen and purify the soul energy coursing through your companions. Each target recovers from all status effects.
pl: You strengthen and purify the soul energy coursing through your companions. Each target recovers from all status effects.
fr: Vous renforcez et purifiez l’énergie spirituelle qui parcourt vos compagnons. Chaque cible se débarrasse de tous les états qui l’affectent.
es: You strengthen and purify the soul energy coursing through your companions. Each target recovers from all status effects.
pt-BR: Você fortalece e purifica a energia da alma que flui através de seus companheiros. Cada alvo se recupera de todos os efeitos de status.

en: You cause a creature to lose any semblance of temper and act brazenly. The target suffers **enraged** and cannot perform the **Guard** or **Spell** actions during their next turn.
it: Spingi una creatura a perdere qualsiasi contegno e agire in maniera avventata. Il bersaglio subisce lo status furente e non può eseguire le azioni di Guardia e Incantesimo nel suo prossimo turno.
de: You cause a creature to lose any semblance of temper and act brazenly. The target suffers enraged and cannot perform the Guard or Spell actions during their next turn.
pl: You cause a creature to lose any semblance of temper and act brazenly. The target suffers enraged and cannot perform the Guard or Spell actions during their next turn.
fr: Vous faites perdre son sang-froid à une créature, qui abandonne toute prudence. La cible subit l’état **enragé** et ne peut plus réaliser les actions **Garde** ou **Sort** à son prochain tour.
es: You cause a creature to lose any semblance of temper and act brazenly. The target suffers enraged and cannot perform the Guard or Spell actions during their next turn.
pt-BR: Você faz com que uma criatura perca qualquer aparência de temperança e aja descaradamente. O alvo fica enfurecido e não pode realizar as ações de Guarda ou Feitiço durante seu próximo turno.

en: You alter the senses of your enemies, causing them to experience bizarre or frightening hallucinations. Choose **dazed** or **shaken**: you inflict the chosen status effect on each target hit by this spell.
it: Alteri la percezione dei tuoi nemici, insinuandovi allucinazioni bizzare o terrificanti. Scegli uno status tra confuso e scosso: ciascun bersaglio colpito subisce lo status scelto.
de: You alter the senses of your enemies, causing them to experience bizarre or frightening hallucinations. Choose dazed or shaken: you inflict the chosen status effect on each target hit by this spell.
pl: You alter the senses of your enemies, causing them to experience bizarre or frightening hallucinations. Choose dazed or shaken: you inflict the chosen status effect on each target hit by this spell.
fr: You alter the senses of your enemies, causing them to experience bizarre or frightening hallucinations. Choose dazed or shaken: you inflict the chosen status effect on each target hit by this spell.
es: You alter the senses of your enemies, causing them to experience bizarre or frightening hallucinations. Choose dazed or shaken: you inflict the chosen status effect on each target hit by this spell.
pt-BR: Você altera os sentidos de seus inimigos, fazendo-os experimentar alucinações bizarras ou assustadoras. Escolha atordoado ou abalado: você inflige o efeito de status escolhido em cada alvo atingido por este feitiço.

en: You invigorate your companions, soothing their pain and healing their fatigue. Each target recovers 40 Hit Points. This amount increases to 50 Hit Points if you are **level 20 or higher**, or to 60 Hit Points if you are **level 40 or higher**.
it: Infondi vigore nei tuoi compagni, lenendone il dolore e la stanchezza. Ciascun bersaglio recupera 40 Punti Vita. Questo ammontare aumenta a 50 Punti Vita se sei di livello 20 o superiore, oppure a 60 Punti Vita se sei di livello 40 o superiore.
de: You invigorate your companions, soothing their pain and healing their fatigue. Each target recovers 40 hp. This amount increases to 50 hp if you are level 20 or higher, or to 60 hp if you are level 40 or higher.
pl: You invigorate your companions, soothing their pain and healing their fatigue. Each target recovers 40 hp. This amount increases to 50 hp if you are level 20 or higher, or to 60 hp if you are level 40 or higher.
fr: You invigorate your companions, soothing their pain and healing their fatigue. Each target recovers 40 hp. This amount increases to 50 hp if you are level 20 or higher, or to 60 hp if you are level 40 or higher.
es: You invigorate your companions, soothing their pain and healing their fatigue. Each target recovers 40 hp. This amount increases to 50 hp if you are level 20 or higher, or to 60 hp if you are level 40 or higher.
pt-BR: Você revigora seus companheiros, acalmando suas dores e curando seu cansaço. Cada alvo recupera 40 PV. Essa quantidade aumenta para 50 PV se você estiver no nível 20 ou superior, ou para 60 PV se você estiver no nível 40 ou superior.

en: You focus your inner energy into a barrage of blinding soul rays. Each target hit by this spell suffers【**HR + 15**】**light** damage. **Opportunity:** Each target hit by this spell suffers **dazed**.
it:
Concentri la tua forza interiore in una salva di raggi accecanti. Ciascun bersaglio colpito subisce【TM + 15】 danni da luce.
Opportunità: Ciascun bersaglio colpito subisce lo status confuso.
de: You focus your inner energy into a barrage of blinding soul rays. Each target hit by this spell suffers 【HR + 15】light damage. Opportunity: Each target hit by this spell suffers dazed.
pl: You focus your inner energy into a barrage of blinding soul rays. Each target hit by this spell suffers 【HR + 15】light damage. Opportunity: Each target hit by this spell suffers dazed.
fr: You focus your inner energy into a barrage of blinding soul rays. Each target hit by this spell suffers 【HR + 15】light damage. Opportunity: Each target hit by this spell suffers dazed.
es: You focus your inner energy into a barrage of blinding soul rays. Each target hit by this spell suffers 【HR + 15】light damage. Opportunity: Each target hit by this spell suffers dazed.
pt-BR: Você concentra sua energia interior em uma barragem de raios ofuscantes da alma. Cada alvo atingido por este feitiço sofre 【RA + 15】de dano de luz. Oportunidade: Cada alvo atingido por este feitiço fica atordoado.

en: You strengthen the heart of a creature against suffering and despair. Until this spell ends, if the target would be reduced to 0 Hit Points, they are instead left standing with exactly 1 Hit Point. Once that happens, this spell ends.
it: Infondi coraggio nel cuore di una creatura affinché resista alla sofferenza e alla disperazione. Fino al termine di questo incantesimo, se il bersaglio sta per essere ridotto a 0 Punti Vita, rimane invece con esattamente 1 Punto Vita. Quando ciò accade, questo incantesimo termina.
de: You strengthen the heart of a creature against suffering and despair. Until this spell ends, if the target would be reduced to 0 Hit Points, they are instead left standing with exactly 1 Hit Point. Once that happens, this spell ends.
pl: You strengthen the heart of a creature against suffering and despair. Until this spell ends, if the target would be reduced to 0 Hit Points, they are instead left standing with exactly 1 Hit Point. Once that happens, this spell ends.
fr: You strengthen the heart of a creature against suffering and despair. Until this spell ends, if the target would be reduced to 0 Hit Points, they are instead left standing with exactly 1 Hit Point. Once that happens, this spell ends.
es: You strengthen the heart of a creature against suffering and despair. Until this spell ends, if the target would be reduced to 0 Hit Points, they are instead left standing with exactly 1 Hit Point. Once that happens, this spell ends.
