pt-BR: Você fortalece o coração de uma criatura contra o sofrimento e o desespero. Até que este feitiço termine, se o alvo for reduzido a 0 Pontos de Vida, ele permanecerá com exatamente 1 Ponto de Vida. Quando isso acontecer, o feitiço termina.

en: You protect the targets from attacks that would corrupt their body and spirit. Choose **dazed**, **enraged**, **poisoned**, **shaken**, **slow**, or **weak**. Until this spell ends, each target becomes immune to the chosen status effect.
it: Proteggi i bersagli dai pericoli che ne corromperebbero l’animo e lo spirito. Scegli uno status tra avvelenato, confuso, debole, furente, lento e scosso: fino al termine di questo incantesimo, ciascun bersaglio diventa immune allo status scelto.
de: You protect the targets from attacks that would corrupt their body and spirit. Choose dazed, enraged, poisoned, shaken, slow, or weak. Until this spell ends, each target becomes immune to the chosen status effect.
pl: You protect the targets from attacks that would corrupt their body and spirit. Choose dazed, enraged, poisoned, shaken, slow, or weak. Until this spell ends, each target becomes immune to the chosen status effect.
fr: You protect the targets from attacks that would corrupt their body and spirit. Choose dazed, enraged, poisoned, shaken, slow, or weak. Until this spell ends, each target becomes immune to the chosen status effect.
es: You protect the targets from attacks that would corrupt their body and spirit. Choose dazed, enraged, poisoned, shaken, slow, or weak. Until this spell ends, each target becomes immune to the chosen status effect.
pt-BR: Você protege os alvos de ataques que corromperiam seu corpo e espírito. Escolha atordoado, enfurecido, envenenado, abalado, lento ou fraco. Até que este feitiço termine, cada alvo se torna imune ao efeito de status escolhido.

en: You imbue a weapon with the cleansing energy of your spirit. Until this spell ends, all damage dealt by the weapon becomes of the **light** type. If you have that weapon equipped while you cast this spell, you may perform a **free attack** with it as part of the same action. This spell can only be cast on a weapon equipped by a willing creature.
it: Avvolgi un’arma con l’energia purificatrice del tuo spirito. Fino al termine di questo incantesimo, tutto il danno inflitto dall’arma diventa luce. Se hai quell’arma equipaggiata mentre lanci questo incantesimo, puoi eseguire un attacco gratuito con essa come parte della stessa azione. Puoi lanciare questo incantesimo solo su armi equipaggiate da creature consenzienti.
de: You imbue a weapon with the cleansing energy of your spirit. Until this spell ends, all damage dealt by the weapon becomes of the light type. If you have that weapon equipped while you cast this spell, you may perform a free attack with it as part of the same action. This spell can only be cast on a weapon equipped by a willing creature.
pl: You imbue a weapon with the cleansing energy of your spirit. Until this spell ends, all damage dealt by the weapon becomes of the light type. If you have that weapon equipped while you cast this spell, you may perform a free attack with it as part of the same action. This spell can only be cast on a weapon equipped by a willing creature.
fr: You imbue a weapon with the cleansing energy of your spirit. Until this spell ends, all damage dealt by the weapon becomes of the light type. If you have that weapon equipped while you cast this spell, you may perform a free attack with it as part of the same action. This spell can only be cast on a weapon equipped by a willing creature.
es: You imbue a weapon with the cleansing energy of your spirit. Until this spell ends, all damage dealt by the weapon becomes of the light type. If you have that weapon equipped while you cast this spell, you may perform a free attack with it as part of the same action. This spell can only be cast on a weapon equipped by a willing creature.
pt-BR: Você imbui uma arma com a energia purificadora do seu espírito. Até que este feitiço termine, todo dano causado pela arma se torna do tipo leve. Se você tiver aquela arma equipada enquanto lança esta magia, você pode realizar um ataque livre com ela como parte da mesma ação. Este feitiço só pode ser lançado em uma arma equipada por uma criatura voluntária.

en: You smother the soul energy coursing through the bodies of your foes, hindering their movements. Choose **slow** or **weak**: you inflict the chosen status effect on each target hit by this spell.
it: Soffochi l’energia spirituale che attraversa i corpi dei tuoi nemici, ostacolandone i movimenti. Scegli uno status tra debole e lento: ciascun bersaglio colpito subisce lo status scelto.
de: You smother the soul energy coursing through the bodies of your foes, hindering their movements. Choose Verlangsamt or Geschwächt: you inflict the chosen status effect on each target hit by this spell.
pl: You smother the soul energy coursing through the bodies of your foes, hindering their movements. Choose slow or weak: you inflict the chosen status effect on each target hit by this spell.
fr: You smother the soul energy coursing through the bodies of your foes, hindering their movements. Choose slow or weak: you inflict the chosen status effect on each target hit by this spell.
es: You smother the soul energy coursing through the bodies of your foes, hindering their movements. Choose slow or weak: you inflict the chosen status effect on each target hit by this spell.
pt-BR: Você sufoca a energia da alma que percorre os corpos de seus inimigos, dificultando seus movimentos. Escolha lento ou fraco: você inflige o efeito de status escolhido em cada alvo atingido por este feitiço.

en: You lose half of your current Hit Points and half of your current Mind Points.
it: Perdi metà dei tuoi Punti Vita attuali e metà dei tuoi Punti Mente attuali.
de: You lose half of your current Hit Points and half of your current Mind Points.
pl: You lose half of your current Hit Points and half of your current Mind Points.
fr: Vous perdez la moitié de vos Points de Vie actuels et de vos Points de Magie actuels.
es: You lose half of your current Hit Points and half of your current Mind Points.
pt-BR: Você perde metade dos seus Pontos de Vida atuais e metade dos seus Pontos Mentais atuais.

en: Each creature present on the scene, including yourself, suffers **poisoned**.
it: Ciascuna creatura presente in scena (te incluso) subisce lo status avvelenato.
de: Each creature present on the scene, including yourself, suffers poisoned.
pl: Each creature present on the scene, including yourself, suffers poisoned.
fr: Chaque créature présente lors de la scène, vous y compris, subit l’état **empoisonné**.
es: Each creature present on the scene, including yourself, suffers poisoned.
pt-BR: Cada criatura presente na cena, inclusive você, sofre envenenamento.

en: Each creature present on the scene, including yourself, suffers **slow**.
it: Ciascuna creatura presente in scena (te incluso) subisce lo status lento.
de: Each creature present on the scene, including yourself, suffers slow.
pl: Each creature present on the scene, including yourself, suffers slow.
fr: Chaque créature présente lors de la scène, vous y compris, subit l’état **ralenti**.
es: Each creature present on the scene, including yourself, suffers slow.
pt-BR: Cada criatura presente na cena, inclusive você, sofre lentidão.

en: Choose up to three creatures you can see: each of them recovers 50 Hit Points and also recovers from all status effects.
it: Scegli fino a tre creature a te visibili: ciascuna di esse recupera 50 Punti Vita e guarisce da tutti gli status.
de: Choose up to three creatures you can see: each of them recovers 50 Hit Points and also recovers from all status effects.
pl: Choose up to three creatures you can see: each of them recovers 50 Hit Points and also recovers from all status effects.
fr: Choisissez jusqu’à trois créatures que vous pouvez voir : chacune récupère 50 Points de Vie et se débarrasse de tous les états qu’elle a subis.
es: Choose up to three creatures you can see: each of them recovers 50 Hit Points and also recovers from all status effects.
pt-BR: Escolha até três criaturas que você possa ver: cada uma delas recupera 50 Pontos de Vida e também recupera todos os efeitos de status.

en: Choose any number of creatures you can see: each of them suffers 30 damage. The damage type is determined randomly by rolling a **d6**:
it: Scegli un qualsiasi numero di creature a te visibili: ciascuna di esse subisce 30 danni. Il tipo di danno viene determinato casualmente tirando un d6:
de: Choose any number of creatures you can see: each of them suffers 30 damage. The damage type is determined randomly by rolling a d6:
pl: Choose any number of creatures you can see: each of them suffers 30 damage. The damage type is determined randomly by rolling a d6:
fr: Choisissez autant de créatures que vous voulez parmi celles que vous voyez. Chacune subit 30 dégâts. Le type des dégâts est déterminé au hasard en lançant un *d6* :
es: Choose any number of creatures you can see: each of them suffers 30 damage. The damage type is determined randomly by rolling a d6:
pt-BR: Escolha qualquer número de criaturas que você puder ver: cada uma delas sofre 30 de dano. O tipo de dano é determinado aleatoriamente rolando um d6:

en: After you plant a magiseed through the Chloromancy Skill (not when using Graft), you may choose one option: perform a free attack with an equipped weapon; or perform the Spell action for free, casting a spell with a total Mind Point cost equal to or lower than【 5 + (SL × 5)】 (you must still pay its MP cost). Treat the High Roll (HR) of your Accuracy Check or Magic Check as being equal to 0 when determining damage dealt by this attack or spell.
it: Dopo aver **piantato un magiseme** tramite l’Abilità **Cloromanzia** (non usando **Innesto**), puoi scegliere un’opzione: esegui un **attacco gratuito** con un’arma equipaggiata; **oppure** esegui immediatamente e gratuitamente l’azione di Incantesimo, lanciando un incantesimo dal **costo totale in Punti Mente pari o inferiore a【5 + (LA × 5)】** (devi pagarne il costo in PM). Considera il **Tiro Maggiore** del Test di Precisione o Magia pari a 0 quando calcoli il danno inflitto da questo attacco o incantesimo.
de: After you plant a magiseed through the Chloromancy Skill (not when using Graft), you may choose one option: perform a free attack with an equipped weapon; or perform the Spell action for free, casting a spell with a total Mind Point cost equal to or lower than【 5 + (SL × 5)】 (you must still pay its MP cost). Treat the High Roll (HR) of your Accuracy Check or Magic Check as being equal to 0 when determining damage dealt by this attack or spell.
pl: After you plant a magiseed through the Chloromancy Skill (not when using Graft), you may choose one option: perform a free attack with an equipped weapon; or perform the Spell action for free, casting a spell with a total Mind Point cost equal to or lower than【 5 + (SL × 5)】 (you must still pay its MP cost). Treat the High Roll (HR) of your Accuracy Check or Magic Check as being equal to 0 when determining damage dealt by this attack or spell.
fr: After you plant a magiseed through the Chloromancy Skill (not when using Graft), you may choose one option: perform a free attack with an equipped weapon; or perform the Spell action for free, casting a spell with a total Mind Point cost equal to or lower than【 5 + (SL × 5)】 (you must still pay its MP cost). Treat the High Roll (HR) of your Accuracy Check or Magic Check as being equal to 0 when determining damage dealt by this attack or spell.
es: After you plant a magiseed through the Chloromancy Skill (not when using Graft), you may choose one option: perform a free attack with an equipped weapon; or perform the Spell action for free, casting a spell with a total Mind Point cost equal to or lower than【 5 + (SL × 5)】 (you must still pay its MP cost). Treat the High Roll (HR) of your Accuracy Check or Magic Check as being equal to 0 when determining damage dealt by this attack or spell.
pt-BR: Depois de plantar um magigrão através da perícia Cloromancia (não ao usar Enxerto), você pode escolher uma das opções: realizar um ataque gratuito com uma arma equipada; ou realizar a ação Feitiço gratuitamente, conjurando um feitiço com um custo total de Pontos de Mente igual ou inferior a【5 + (NH × 5)】(ainda é  necessário pagar seu custo em PM). Considere que a Rolagem Alta do seu Teste de Precisão ou Teste de Magia é igual a 0 ao determinar o dano causado por esse ataque ou feitiço.

en: Each time you acquire this Skill, you discover a new type of magiseed. During a conflict, if there are no magiseeds in your garden, you may use an action and spend 20 Mind Points to plant a magiseed of a type you have  discovered.
it: Ogni volta che acquisisci questa Abilità, scopri **un nuovo tipo di magiseme**. Durante un conflitto, se non ci sono **magisemi** nel tuo **giardino**, puoi usare un’azione e spendere 20 Punti Mente per **piantare un magiseme** di un tipo che hai scoperto.
de: Each time you acquire this Skill, you discover a new type of magiseed. During a conflict, if there are no magiseeds in your garden, you may use an action and spend 20 Mind Points to plant a magiseed of a type you have  discovered.
pl: Each time you acquire this Skill, you discover a new type of magiseed. During a conflict, if there are no magiseeds in your garden, you may use an action and spend 20 Mind Points to plant a magiseed of a type you have  discovered.
fr: Each time you acquire this Skill, you discover a new type of magiseed. During a conflict, if there are no magiseeds in your garden, you may use an action and spend 20 Mind Points to plant a magiseed of a type you have  discovered.
es: Each time you acquire this Skill, you discover a new type of magiseed. During a conflict, if there are no magiseeds in your garden, you may use an action and spend 20 Mind Points to plant a magiseed of a type you have  discovered.
pt-BR: Cada vez que você adquire esta perícia, descobre um novo tipo de magigrão da lista encontrada nas próximas páginas. Durante um conflito, se não houver magigrãos em seu jardim, você pode usar uma ação e gastar 20 Pontos de Mente para plantar um magigrão de um tipo que tenha descoberto. As regras para o jardim e para o crescimento dos magigrãos podem ser encontradas nas próximas páginas.

en: As long as there is a magiseed in your garden and 1 or more sections of your Growth Clock are filled, you may use an action to remove that magiseed from your garden: if you do, plant a different magiseed among those you have discovered (keep the current filled sections of your Growth Clock unchanged).
it: Finché c’è un **magiseme** nel tuo **giardino** e il tuo **Orologio di Crescita** ha **1 o più sezioni piene**, puoi usare un’azione per **rimuovere** quel **magiseme** dal tuo **giardino**: se lo fai, pianta immediatamente un **magiseme diverso** di un tipo che hai scoperto (mantenendo invariate le sezioni attuali del tuo Orologio di Crescita).
de: As long as there is a magiseed in your garden and 1 or more sections of your Growth Clock are filled, you may use an action to remove that magiseed from your garden: if you do, plant a different magiseed among those you have discovered (keep the current filled sections of your Growth Clock unchanged).
pl: As long as there is a magiseed in your garden and 1 or more sections of your Growth Clock are filled, you may use an action to remove that magiseed from your garden: if you do, plant a different magiseed among those you have discovered (keep the current filled sections of your Growth Clock unchanged).
fr: As long as there is a magiseed in your garden and 1 or more sections of your Growth Clock are filled, you may use an action to remove that magiseed from your garden: if you do, plant a different magiseed among those you have discovered (keep the current filled sections of your Growth Clock unchanged).
es: As long as there is a magiseed in your garden and 1 or more sections of your Growth Clock are filled, you may use an action to remove that magiseed from your garden: if you do, plant a different magiseed among those you have discovered (keep the current filled sections of your Growth Clock unchanged).
pt-BR: Enquanto houver um magigrão em seu jardim e pelo menos 1 seção do seu Relógio de Crescimento estiver preenchida, você pode usar uma ação para remover esse magigrão do jardim: se o fizer, plante um magigrão diferente entre aqueles que você já descobriu (mantendo as seções preenchidas do seu Relógio de Crescimento inalteradas).

en: When you remove a magiseed from your garden, you may choose one creature you can see: if that creature is in Crisis, they recover【5 + (SL × 5)】 Hit Points.
it: Quando **rimuovi** un **magiseme** dal tuo **giardino**, puoi scegliere una creatura a te visibile: se quella creatura è in **Crisi**, essa recupera **【5 + (LA × 5)】** Punti Vita.
de: When you remove a magiseed from your garden, you may choose one creature you can see: if that creature is in Crisis, they recover【5 + (SL × 5)】 Hit Points.
pl: When you remove a magiseed from your garden, you may choose one creature you can see: if that creature is in Crisis, they recover【5 + (SL × 5)】 Hit Points.
fr: When you remove a magiseed from your garden, you may choose one creature you can see: if that creature is in Crisis, they recover【5 + (SL × 5)】 Hit Points.
es: When you remove a magiseed from your garden, you may choose one creature you can see: if that creature is in Crisis, they recover【5 + (SL × 5)】 Hit Points.
pt-BR: Quando você remove um magigrão do seu jardim, pode escolher uma criatura que possa ver: se essa criatura estiver em Crise, ela recupera 【5 + (NH × 5)】 Pontos de Vida.

en: You gain the ability to perform Rituals of the Ritualism discipline; additionally, you may use Ritualism to create, animate, and/or control vegetation, pollen, spores, and toxins (but you cannot create nor control plant-Species NPCs this way).
it: Puoi eseguire Rituali i cui effetti rientrino nella disciplina di **Ritualismo; in più**, puoi usare il **Ritualismo** per **creare, animare e/o controllare vegetazione, pollini, spore e tossine** (ma non puoi creare né controllare PNG di Specie **pianta** in questo modo).
de: You gain the ability to perform Rituals of the Ritualism discipline; additionally, you may use Ritualism to create, animate, and/or control vegetation, pollen, spores, and toxins (but you cannot create nor control plant-Species NPCs this way).
pl: You gain the ability to perform Rituals of the Ritualism discipline; additionally, you may use Ritualism to create, animate, and/or control vegetation, pollen, spores, and toxins (but you cannot create nor control plant-Species NPCs this way).
fr: You gain the ability to perform Rituals of the Ritualism discipline; additionally, you may use Ritualism to create, animate, and/or control vegetation, pollen, spores, and toxins (but you cannot create nor control plant-Species NPCs this way).
es: You gain the ability to perform Rituals of the Ritualism discipline; additionally, you may use Ritualism to create, animate, and/or control vegetation, pollen, spores, and toxins (but you cannot create nor control plant-Species NPCs this way).
pt-BR: Você ganha o poder de realizar Rituais da disciplina de Ritualismo; além disso, pode usar Ritualismo para criar, animar e/ou controlar vegetação, pólen, esporos e toxinas (mas não pode criar nem controlar PNJs da espécie Planta dessa forma).

en: When you rest inside a settlement, you gain【 SL】 ingredients. You may use an action and combine 2 or 3 ingredients to prepare a delicacy and choose one option: you apply its effects to yourself or an ally you can see; or you perform a free attack with a weapon you have equipped. This attack deals no damage, but you apply the delicacy’s effects to each enemy hit by the attack. You may carry up to 10 +【 SL × 5】 ingredients, and they will never spoil until you use them; if you take this Skill during character creation, you begin play with ten ingredients with random tastes.
it: Quando riposi in un insediamento, ottieni **【LA】 ingredienti**. Puoi usare un’azione e combinare **2 o 3 ingredienti** per creare una **delizia** e scegliere un’opzione: applichi i suoi effetti a te stesso o un alleato a te visibile; **oppure** esegui un **attacco gratuito** con un’arma equipaggiata. Questo attacco non infligge danno, ma applichi gli effetti della **delizia** a ciascun nemico colpito. Puoi trasportare **fino a 10 +【LA × 5】 ingredienti** e gli ingredienti che trasporti si **conservano finché non vengono utilizzati**. Se acquisisci questa Abilità durante la creazione del personaggio, inizi il gioco con **dieci** ingredienti dal **sapore** casuale.
de: When you rest inside a settlement, you gain【 SL】 ingredients. You may use an action and combine 2 or 3 ingredients to prepare a delicacy and choose one option: you apply its effects to yourself or an ally you can see; or you perform a free attack with a weapon you have equipped. This attack deals no damage, but you apply the delicacy’s effects to each enemy hit by the attack. You may carry up to 10 +【 SL × 5】 ingredients, and they will never spoil until you use them; if you take this Skill during character creation, you begin play with ten ingredients with random tastes.
pl: When you rest inside a settlement, you gain【 SL】 ingredients. You may use an action and combine 2 or 3 ingredients to prepare a delicacy and choose one option: you apply its effects to yourself or an ally you can see; or you perform a free attack with a weapon you have equipped. This attack deals no damage, but you apply the delicacy’s effects to each enemy hit by the attack. You may carry up to 10 +【 SL × 5】 ingredients, and they will never spoil until you use them; if you take this Skill during character creation, you begin play with ten ingredients with random tastes.
fr: When you rest inside a settlement, you gain【 SL】 ingredients. You may use an action and combine 2 or 3 ingredients to prepare a delicacy and choose one option: you apply its effects to yourself or an ally you can see; or you perform a free attack with a weapon you have equipped. This attack deals no damage, but you apply the delicacy’s effects to each enemy hit by the attack. You may carry up to 10 +【 SL × 5】 ingredients, and they will never spoil until you use them; if you take this Skill during character creation, you begin play with ten ingredients with random tastes.
es: When you rest inside a settlement, you gain【 SL】 ingredients. You may use an action and combine 2 or 3 ingredients to prepare a delicacy and choose one option: you apply its effects to yourself or an ally you can see; or you perform a free attack with a weapon you have equipped. This attack deals no damage, but you apply the delicacy’s effects to each enemy hit by the attack. You may carry up to 10 +【 SL × 5】 ingredients, and they will never spoil until you use them; if you take this Skill during character creation, you begin play with ten ingredients with random tastes.
pt-BR: Quando você descansa dentro de um assentamento, recebe 【NH】 ingredientes (veja a próxima página). Você pode usar uma ação e combinar 2 ou 3 ingredientes para preparar uma iguaria (veja a próxima página) e escolher uma opção: aplicar seus efeitos em si mesmo ou em um aliado que possa ver; ou realizar um ataque gratuito com uma arma equipada. Esse ataque não causa dano, mas aplica os efeitos da iguaria a cada inimigo atingido. Você pode carregar até 10 + 【NH × 5】 ingredientes, e eles nunca estragam até serem usados; se adquirir esta perícia durante a criação de personagem, começa o jogo com dez ingredientes de sabores aleatórios.

en: When you perform the free attack granted by the Cooking Skill, if you combined no more than 2 ingredients, you may have the attack deal damage as normal. If you do, you treat your High Roll (HR) as 0 when calculating damage dealt by this attack.
it: Quando esegui un **attacco gratuito** con l’Abilità **Cucina**, se hai combinato **soltanto 2 ingredienti**, puoi decidere che l’attacco infligga danno normalmente. Se lo fai, considera il tuo **Tiro Maggiore** pari a 0 quando calcoli il danno.
de: When you perform the free attack granted by the Cooking Skill, if you combined no more than 2 ingredients, you may have the attack deal damage as normal. If you do, you treat your High Roll (HR) as 0 when calculating damage dealt by this attack.
pl: When you perform the free attack granted by the Cooking Skill, if you combined no more than 2 ingredients, you may have the attack deal damage as normal. If you do, you treat your High Roll (HR) as 0 when calculating damage dealt by this attack.
fr: When you perform the free attack granted by the Cooking Skill, if you combined no more than 2 ingredients, you may have the attack deal damage as normal. If you do, you treat your High Roll (HR) as 0 when calculating damage dealt by this attack.
es: When you perform the free attack granted by the Cooking Skill, if you combined no more than 2 ingredients, you may have the attack deal damage as normal. If you do, you treat your High Roll (HR) as 0 when calculating damage dealt by this attack.
pt-BR: Quando você realiza o ataque gratuito concedido pela perícia Culinária, se tiver combinado no máximo 2 ingredientes, pode fazer com que o ataque cause dano normalmente. Se o fizer, considere sua Rolagem Alta como 0 ao calcular o dano causado por esse ataque.

en: When you use the Cooking Skill and choose to apply the effects of the delicacy to yourself or an ally you can see, you may spend up to【 SL × 10】 MP. For every 10 MP you spend this way, apply the delicacy’s effects to an additional ally you can see.
it: Quando usi l’Abilità **Cucina** e scegli di applicare gli effetti della **delizia** a te stesso o un alleato a te visibile, puoi spendere fino a **【LA × 10】** Punti Mente. Per ogni 10 PM spesi in questo modo, applichi l’effetto della **delizia** a un alleato addizionale a te visibile.
de: When you use the Cooking Skill and choose to apply the effects of the delicacy to yourself or an ally you can see, you may spend up to【 SL × 10】 MP. For every 10 MP you spend this way, apply the delicacy’s effects to an additional ally you can see.
pl: When you use the Cooking Skill and choose to apply the effects of the delicacy to yourself or an ally you can see, you may spend up to【 SL × 10】 MP. For every 10 MP you spend this way, apply the delicacy’s effects to an additional ally you can see.
fr: When you use the Cooking Skill and choose to apply the effects of the delicacy to yourself or an ally you can see, you may spend up to【 SL × 10】 MP. For every 10 MP you spend this way, apply the delicacy’s effects to an additional ally you can see.
es: When you use the Cooking Skill and choose to apply the effects of the delicacy to yourself or an ally you can see, you may spend up to【 SL × 10】 MP. For every 10 MP you spend this way, apply the delicacy’s effects to an additional ally you can see.
pt-BR: Quando você usa a perícia Culinária e escolhe aplicar os efeitos da iguaria em si mesmo ou em um aliado que possa ver, pode gastar até 【NH × 10】 PM. Para cada 10 PM gastos dessa forma, aplique os efeitos da iguaria a um aliado adicional que possa ver.

en: When you prepare a delicacy, you may spend 2 Inventory Points: if you do, change the taste of one ingredient to a different taste of your choice.
it: Quando crei una **delizia**, puoi spendere 2 Punti Inventario: se lo fai, cambia il **sapore** di un ingrediente in un **sapore** diverso a tua scelta.
de: When you prepare a delicacy, you may spend 2 Inventory Points: if you do, change the taste of one ingredient to a different taste of your choice.
pl: When you prepare a delicacy, you may spend 2 Inventory Points: if you do, change the taste of one ingredient to a different taste of your choice.
fr: When you prepare a delicacy, you may spend 2 Inventory Points: if you do, change the taste of one ingredient to a different taste of your choice.
es: When you prepare a delicacy, you may spend 2 Inventory Points: if you do, change the taste of one ingredient to a different taste of your choice.
pt-BR: Quando você prepara uma iguaria, pode gastar 2 Pontos de Inventário: se o fizer, altere o sabor de um ingrediente para um sabor diferente à sua escolha.

en: After each travel roll, if you acquired the Cooking Skill, you gain【 SL × 2】 ingredients.
it: Dopo ciascun **tiro di viaggio**, se possiedi l’Abilità **Cucina**, ottieni **【LA × 2】 ingredienti**.
de: After each travel roll, if you acquired the Cooking Skill, you gain【 SL × 2】 ingredients.
pl: After each travel roll, if you acquired the Cooking Skill, you gain【 SL × 2】 ingredients.
fr: After each travel roll, if you acquired the Cooking Skill, you gain【 SL × 2】 ingredients.
es: After each travel roll, if you acquired the Cooking Skill, you gain【 SL × 2】 ingredients.
pt-BR: Após cada rolagem de viagem, se você adquiriu a perícia Culinária, recebe 【NH × 2】 ingredientes.

en: You may verbally communicate with creatures of the elemental Species. When you restore a creature’s Hit Points with an invocation or spell, if an elemental is present on the scene, the restored amount is increased by【 SL × 5】
it: Puoi comunicare verbalmente con creature della Specie **elementale**. Quando fai sì che una creatura recuperi Punti Vita con un incantesimo o **invocazione**, se un **elementale** è presente in scena, il recupero viene incrementato di **【LA × 5】**.
de: You may verbally communicate with creatures of the elemental Species. When you restore a creature’s Hit Points with an invocation or spell, if an elemental is present on the scene, the restored amount is increased by【 SL × 5】
pl: You may verbally communicate with creatures of the elemental Species. When you restore a creature’s Hit Points with an invocation or spell, if an elemental is present on the scene, the restored amount is increased by【 SL × 5】
fr: You may verbally communicate with creatures of the elemental Species. When you restore a creature’s Hit Points with an invocation or spell, if an elemental is present on the scene, the restored amount is increased by【 SL × 5】
es: You may verbally communicate with creatures of the elemental Species. When you restore a creature’s Hit Points with an invocation or spell, if an elemental is present on the scene, the restored amount is increased by【 SL × 5】
pt-BR: Você pode se comunicar verbalmente com criaturas da espécie Elemental. Quando você restaura os Pontos de Vida de uma criatura com uma invocação ou feitiço, se um elemental estiver presente na cena, a quantidade restaurada é aumentada em 【NH × 5】.

en: You may use an action and spend 5 Mind Points to perform an invocation, drawing energy from one of the wellsprings present on the scene. Your【SL】 in this Skill determines which invocations you have access to.
it: Puoi usare un’azione e spendere 5 Punti Mente per eseguire un’**invocazione** da una **sorgente** presente in scena. Il tuo **【LA】** in questa Abilità determina a quali **invocazioni** hai accesso.
de: You may use an action and spend 5 Mind Points to perform an invocation, drawing energy from one of the wellsprings present on the scene. Your【SL】 in this Skill determines which invocations you have access to.
pl: You may use an action and spend 5 Mind Points to perform an invocation, drawing energy from one of the wellsprings present on the scene. Your【SL】 in this Skill determines which invocations you have access to.
fr: You may use an action and spend 5 Mind Points to perform an invocation, drawing energy from one of the wellsprings present on the scene. Your【SL】 in this Skill determines which invocations you have access to.
es: You may use an action and spend 5 Mind Points to perform an invocation, drawing energy from one of the wellsprings present on the scene. Your【SL】 in this Skill determines which invocations you have access to.
pt-BR: Você pode usar uma ação e gastar 5 Pontos de Mente para realizar uma invocação, extraindo energia de uma das fontes presentes na cena (veja a próxima página). Seu 【NH】 nesta perícia determina quais invocações você tem acesso.

en: When you perform an invocation, you may spend up to【 SL × 10】 additional Mind Points. For every 10 Mind Points you spend this way, the invocation may target an additional creature you can see.
it: Quando esegui un’**invocazione**, puoi **spendere fino a 【LA × 10】 Punti Mente addizionali**. Per ogni 10 Punti Mente spesi in questo modo, l’**invocazione** può bersagliare una creatura addizionale a te visibile.
de: When you perform an invocation, you may spend up to【 SL × 10】 additional Mind Points. For every 10 Mind Points you spend this way, the invocation may target an additional creature you can see.
pl: When you perform an invocation, you may spend up to【 SL × 10】 additional Mind Points. For every 10 Mind Points you spend this way, the invocation may target an additional creature you can see.
fr: When you perform an invocation, you may spend up to【 SL × 10】 additional Mind Points. For every 10 Mind Points you spend this way, the invocation may target an additional creature you can see.
es: When you perform an invocation, you may spend up to【 SL × 10】 additional Mind Points. For every 10 Mind Points you spend this way, the invocation may target an additional creature you can see.
pt-BR: Quando você realiza uma invocação, pode gastar até 【NH × 10】 Pontos de Mente adicionais. Para cada 10 Pontos de Mente gastos dessa forma, a invocação pode ter como alvo uma criatura adicional que você possa ver.

en: After an enemy you can see loses Hit Points due to damage dealt by one of your allies, if that damage was increased by one or more of your “hex” invocations, you may perform a free attack with a weapon you have equipped. This attack may only target that enemy, and receives a bonus equal to【 SL】 to its Accuracy Check; if it is successful, all its damage becomes of the same type dealt by your ally, and all “hex” invocations present on its target end immediately after the attack has been resolved. If two or more enemies trigger this Skill at the same time, you can perform a free attack against each of them, in whatever order you prefer.
it: Dopo che un nemico a te visibile perde Punti Vita a causa di un danno inflitto da un tuo alleato, se quel danno è stato incrementato da una o più tue **invocazioni “marchio”**, puoi eseguire un **attacco gratuito** con un’arma equipaggiata. L’attacco può bersagliare **soltanto** quel nemico e riceve un bonus pari a **【LA】** al Test di Precisione; se ha successo, tutto il suo danno diventa dello stesso tipo inflitto dal tuo alleato e **tutte le invocazioni “marchio”** presenti sul suo bersaglio terminano dopo aver risolto l’attacco. Se due o più nemici innescano questa Abilità contemporaneamente, puoi eseguire un **attacco gratuito** separato contro **ciascuno** di essi, nell’ordine che preferisci.
de: After an enemy you can see loses Hit Points due to damage dealt by one of your allies, if that damage was increased by one or more of your “hex” invocations, you may perform a free attack with a weapon you have equipped. This attack may only target that enemy, and receives a bonus equal to【 SL】 to its Accuracy Check; if it is successful, all its damage becomes of the same type dealt by your ally, and all “hex” invocations present on its target end immediately after the attack has been resolved. If two or more enemies trigger this Skill at the same time, you can perform a free attack against each of them, in whatever order you prefer.
pl: After an enemy you can see loses Hit Points due to damage dealt by one of your allies, if that damage was increased by one or more of your “hex” invocations, you may perform a free attack with a weapon you have equipped. This attack may only target that enemy, and receives a bonus equal to【 SL】 to its Accuracy Check; if it is successful, all its damage becomes of the same type dealt by your ally, and all “hex” invocations present on its target end immediately after the attack has been resolved. If two or more enemies trigger this Skill at the same time, you can perform a free attack against each of them, in whatever order you prefer.
fr: After an enemy you can see loses Hit Points due to damage dealt by one of your allies, if that damage was increased by one or more of your “hex” invocations, you may perform a free attack with a weapon you have equipped. This attack may only target that enemy, and receives a bonus equal to【 SL】 to its Accuracy Check; if it is successful, all its damage becomes of the same type dealt by your ally, and all “hex” invocations present on its target end immediately after the attack has been resolved. If two or more enemies trigger this Skill at the same time, you can perform a free attack against each of them, in whatever order you prefer.
es: After an enemy you can see loses Hit Points due to damage dealt by one of your allies, if that damage was increased by one or more of your “hex” invocations, you may perform a free attack with a weapon you have equipped. This attack may only target that enemy, and receives a bonus equal to【 SL】 to its Accuracy Check; if it is successful, all its damage becomes of the same type dealt by your ally, and all “hex” invocations present on its target end immediately after the attack has been resolved. If two or more enemies trigger this Skill at the same time, you can perform a free attack against each of them, in whatever order you prefer.
pt-BR: Depois que um inimigo que você pode ver perde Pontos de Vida devido a dano causado por um de seus aliados, se esse dano foi aumentado por uma ou mais de suas invocações de “maldição”, você pode realizar um ataque gratuito com uma arma equipada. Esse ataque só pode ter esse inimigo como alvo e recebe um bônus de 【NH】 no Teste de Precisão; se for bem-sucedido, todo o dano causado por ele se torna do mesmo tipo que o dano infligido pelo seu aliado, e todas as invocações de “maldição” presentes no alvo terminam imediatamente após a resolução do ataque. Se dois ou mais inimigos ativarem esta perícia ao mesmo tempo, você pode realizar um ataque gratuito contra cada um deles, na ordem que preferir.

en: As long as you have a weapon belonging to the arcane, bow, brawling, flail, sword, or thrown Category equipped, your “blast” invocations deal【SL】 extra damage, and the extra damage granted by your “hex” invocations is increased by【 SL】
it: Finché hai un’arma appartenente alla Categoria **arcana, arco, flagello, da lancio, da rissa** o **spada** equipaggiata, le tue **invocazioni “impatto”** infliggono **【LA】** danni extra e il danno extra conferito dalle tue **invocazioni “marchio”** aumenta di **【LA】**.
de: As long as you have a weapon belonging to the arcane, bow, brawling, flail, sword, or thrown Category equipped, your “blast” invocations dea【l SL】 extra damage, and the extra damage granted by your “hex” invocations is increased by【 SL】

pt-BR: Enquanto você tiver equipada uma arma pertencente às categorias Arcana, Arco, Briga, Mangual, Espada ou Arremesso, suas invocações de “explosão” causam 【NH】 de dano extra, e o dano adicional concedido por suas invocações de “maldição” é aumentado em 【NH】.

en: When a potion or delicacy you created that does not deal damage causes one or more creatures to recover Hit Points, you may instead have it deal poison damage equal to【 half your level + (SL × 10)】 to each of those creatures. This damage’s type cannot change, and it is halved if you are dealing damage to two or more creatures.
it: Quando una **pozione** o **delizia** da te creata che **non** infligge danno fa sì che una o più creature recuperino Punti Vita, puoi invece farle infliggere un ammontare di danni da **veleno** pari a **【metà del tuo livello + (LA × 10)】** a ciascuna di esse. Questo danno non può cambiare tipo e viene **dimezzato** se lo infliggi a **due o più creature**.
de: When a potion or delicacy you created that does not deal damage causes one or more creatures to recover Hit Points, you may instead have it deal poison damage equal to【 half your level + (SL × 10)】 to each of those creatures. This damage’s type cannot change, and it is halved if you are dealing damage to two or more creatures.

This damage’s type cannot change, and it is halved if you are dealing damage to two or more creatures.

es: When a potion or delicacy you created that does not deal damage causes one or more creatures to recover Hit Points, you may instead have it deal poison damage equal to【 half your level + (SL × 10)】 to each of those creatures. This damage’s type cannot change, and it is halved if you are dealing damage to two or more creatures.
pt-BR: Quando uma poção ou iguaria (veja a página 151) que você criou e que não causa dano faz com que uma ou mais criaturas recuperem Pontos de Vida, você pode, em vez disso, fazer com que ela cause dano de veneno igual a 【metade do seu nível + (NH × 10)】 a cada uma dessas criaturas. O tipo desse dano não pode ser alterado e é reduzido pela metade se você estiver causando dano a duas ou mais criaturas.

en: When you or an ally who is able to hear and understand you perform a Check to examine a creature, item, or location, you may spend 1 Trade Point to grant a bonus equal to【 SL × 2】 to the Result of that Check.
it: Dopo che tu o un alleato in grado di sentirti e comprenderti effettuate un Test per esaminare una creatura, un luogo o un oggetto, puoi spendere 1 Punto Commercio per conferire un bonus pari a **【 LA × 2】** al Risultato di quel Test.
de: When you or an ally who is able to hear and understand you perform a Check to examine a creature, item, or location, you may spend 1 Trade Point to grant a bonus equal to【 SL × 2】 to the Result of that Check.

en: When you or another Player Character spend【 SL + 2】 or fewer Inventory Points, you may spend 1 Trade Point to ignore that cost.
it: Quando tu o un altro Personaggio Giocante spendete **【LA + 2】** o meno Punti Inventario, puoi spendere 1 Punto Commercio per ignorare quel costo.
de: When you or another Player Character spend【 SL + 2】 or fewer Inventory Points, you may spend 1 Trade Point to ignore that cost.

es: When you or another Player Character spend【 SL + 2】 or fewer Inventory Points, you may spend 1 Trade Point to ignore that cost.
pt-BR: Quando você ou outro Personagem Jogador gastar 【NH + 2】 ou menos Pontos de Inventário, você pode gastar 1 Ponto de Comércio para ignorar esse custo.

en: Once per session, when you help an NPC or community defeat greed and corruption, improve their quality of life, or coexist with other creatures, if you have acquired the Winds of Trade Skill, you gain【 SL + 1】 Trade Points.
it: Una volta per sessione, quando aiuti un PNG o una comunità a **sconfiggere avidità e corruzione**, a **migliorare il proprio benessere** o a **coesistere con altre creature**, se hai acquisito l’Abilità **Arte del Commercio**, guadagni **【LA + 1】** Punti Commercio.
de: Once per session, when you help an NPC or community defeat greed and corruption, improve their quality of life, or coexist with other creatures, if you have acquired the Winds of Trade Skill, you gain【 SL + 1】 Trade Points.

es: Once per session, when you help an NPC or community defeat greed and corruption, improve their quality of life, or coexist with other creatures, if you have acquired the Winds of Trade Skill, you gain【 SL + 1】 Trade Points.
pt-BR: Uma vez por sessão, quando você ajudar um PNJ ou uma comunidade a derrotar a ganância e a corrupção, melhorar sua qualidade de vida ou coexistir com outras criaturas, se você tiver adquirido o Poder Ventos do Comércio, você ganha 【NH + 1】 Pontos de Comércio.

en: After you rest in an area where commerce is possible, you gain【 SL + 1】 Trade Points. You may never have more than【 SL + 3】 Trade Points; if you acquire this Skill during character creation, you begin play with 2 Trade Points. During a non-conflict scene, you may spend 2 Trade Points to choose one option: you create a material or rare item approved by the Game Master whose value in zenit is equal to or lower than【 your level, multiplied by 30】; or you create an NPC that lives nearby and explain their occupation as well as how you met them, then the Game Master tells you what they require in exchange for their services.
it: Quando **riposi** in una zona adatta al commercio, ottieni **【LA + 1】 Punti Commercio**. Non puoi mai avere più di **【LA + 3】** Punti Commercio; se acquisisci questa Abilità durante la creazione del personaggio, inizi il gioco con 2 Punti Commercio. Durante una **scena non di conflitto**, puoi spendere 2 Punti Commercio per scegliere un’opzione: crei un **oggetto raro** o un **materiale** concordato con il Game Master e dal valore in zenit **pari o inferiore a【il tuo livello moltiplicato per 30】; oppure** crei un PNG che vive nei dintorni e spieghi come lo hai conosciuto e quale mestiere svolge, dopodiché il Game Master ti dice cosa richiede in cambio dei propri servizi.

pt-BR: Depois de descansar em uma área onde o comércio é possível, você ganha 【NP + 1】 Pontos de Comércio. Você nunca pode ter mais do que 【NP + 3】 Pontos de Comércio; se adquirir esse Poder durante a criação de personagem, você começa o jogo com 2 Pontos de Comércio. Durante uma cena sem conflito, você pode gastar 2 Pontos de Comércio para escolher uma das seguintes opções: criar um material ou item raro aprovado pelo Narrador, cujo valor em zenit seja igual ou inferior a 【seu nível multiplicado por 30】; ou criar um PNJ que vive nas proximidades, explicando sua ocupação e como você o conheceu. Em seguida, o Narrador dirá o que ele exige em troca de seus serviços.

en:
**Gifts** can only be used when specific **events** take place. When this happens, you may spend an amount of Mind Points equal to **【the number of filled sections in your Brainwave Clock, multiplied by 5】** minimum 5 Mind Points) in order to apply the effects of that **gift** to the event.
You may only use a **single gift** per event.
If a gift causes **HP or MP recovery**, or if it causes **MP loss**, the amounts increase by 10
if you are **level 20 or higher**, or by 20 if you are **level 40 or higher**.

When you first acquire the **Psychic Gifts** Skill, you also receive a **Brainwave Clock**.
Your Brainwave Clock has **4 sections**, and it begins each scene **empty**.
After you resolve one of your **gifts, fill 1 section** of your Brainwave Clock (you do so **after** the effects of the **gift** have been calculated and applied).
Your Brainwave Clock determines your **gifts’ cost in Mind Points**, as well as their **effectiveness** (see above). You can still use your **gifts** when the Clock is full.
Sections of your Brainwave Clock may **not be filled** in any way other than described above, and they **may only be erased** through the **Brainwave Discharge** Heroic Skill (see page **171**) or through effects that **expressly** influence Brainwave Clocks.

pt-BR:
**Dons** só podem ser usados quando **eventos** específicos ocorrem. Quando isso acontece, você pode gastar uma quantidade de Pontos de Mente igual a **【o número de seções preenchidas em seu Relógio Mental, multiplicado por 5】** (mínimo de 5 Pontos de Mente) para aplicar os efeitos daquele dom ao evento.
Você só pode usar um **único dom** por evento.

Se um dom causar **recuperação de PV ou PM**, ou se causar **perda de PM**, os valores aumentam em 10 se você for **nível 20 ou superior**, ou em 20 se você for **nível 40 ou superior**.

Quando você adquire a Habilidade **Dons Psíquicos** pela primeira vez, você também recebe um **Relógio Mental**.
Seu Relógio Mental tem **4 seções**, e começa cada cena **vazio**.
Após você resolver um de seus **dons, preencha 1 seção** de seu Relógio Mental (isso é feito **após** os efeitos do **dom** terem sido calculados e aplicados).

Seu Relógio Mental determina o custo em PM de seus dons, assim como sua efetividade (veja acima). Você ainda pode usar seus dons mesmo quando o Relógio estiver cheio.

Seções do seu Relógio Mental **não podem ser preenchidas** de nenhuma outra forma além da descrita acima, e elas **só podem ser apagadas** por meio da Habilidade Heroica **Descarga Mental** (veja a página 171) ou por efeitos que explicitamente influenciem Relógios Mentais.

en: Ask the Game Master a single question about that NPC, which the Game Master must answer truthfully. Then, describe what sensation revealed this information to you. You may use this gift only once on each NPC.

es: Ask the Game Master a single question about that NPC, which the Game Master must answer truthfully. Then, describe what sensation revealed this information to you. You may use this gift only once on each NPC.
pt-BR: Faça ao Narrador uma única pergunta sobre esse PNJ, que ele deve responder com a verdade. Em seguida, descreva qual sensação revelou essa informação para você. Você pode usar este dom apenas uma vez em cada PNJ.

en: That damage becomes earth or physical, and its source deals extra damage equal to【2 + the number of filled sections in your Brainwave Clock】. If the source deals damage to one or more flying creatures, they are forced to land immediately.
it: Quel danno diventa **fisico** o da **terra** e la sua fonte infligge danni extra pari a【**2 + il numero di sezioni piene del tuo Orologio Cerebrale**】.
de: That damage becomes earth or physical, and its source deals extra damage equal to【2 + the number of filled sections in your Brainwave Clock】. If the source deals damage to one or more flying creatures, they are forced to land immediately.
pl: That damage becomes earth or physical, and its source deals extra damage equal to【2 + the number of filled sections in your Brainwave Clock】. If the source deals damage to one or more flying creatures, they are forced to land immediately.
fr: That damage becomes earth or physical, and its source deals extra damage equal to【2 + the number of filled sections in your Brainwave Clock】. If the source deals damage to one or more flying creatures, they are forced to land immediately.
es: That damage becomes earth or physical, and its source deals extra damage equal to【2 + the number of filled sections in your Brainwave Clock】. If the source deals damage to one or more flying creatures, they are forced to land immediately.
pt-BR: Esse dano se torna terra ou físico, e sua fonte causa dano extra igual a【2 + o número de seções preenchidas no seu Relógio Mental】. Se a fonte causar dano a uma ou mais criaturas voadoras, elas são forçadas a pousar imediatamente.

en: Choose yourself or an ally who is your focus: if the chosen creature is in Crisis, they recover an amount of Hit Points equal to【 5 + (the number of filled sections in your Brainwave Clock, multiplied by 5)】
it: Scegli te stesso **oppure** un alleato che sia il tuo **focus**: se la creatura scelta è in **Crisi**, essa recupera un ammontare di Punti Vita pari a【**5 + (il numero di sezioni piene del tuo Orologio Cerebrale moltiplicato per 5)**】.
de: Choose yourself or an ally who is your focus: if the chosen creature is in Crisis, they recover an amount of Hit Points equal to【 5 + (the number of filled sections in your Brainwave Clock, multiplied by 5)】

en: That damage becomes dark or light, and its source deals extra damage equal to【 2 + the number of filled sections in your Brainwave Clock】

en: That enemy loses an amount of Mind Points equal to【 5 + (the number of filled sections in your Brainwave Clock, multiplied by 5)】. Then, choose one option: that enemy suffers dazed, or that enemy suffers shaken.
it: Quel nemico perde un ammontare di Punti Mente pari a【**5 + (il numero di sezioni piene del tuo Orologio Cerebrale moltiplicato per 5)**】. Poi, scegli un'opzione: quel nemico subisce lo status **confuso**; oppure quel nemico subisce lo status **scosso**.
de: That enemy loses an amount of Mind Points equal to【 5 + (the number of filled sections in your Brainwave Clock, multiplied by 5)】. Then, choose one option: that enemy suffers dazed, or that enemy suffers shaken.
pl: That enemy loses an amount of Mind Points equal to【 5 + (the number of filled sections in your Brainwave Clock, multiplied by 5)】. Then, choose one option: that enemy suffers dazed, or that enemy suffers shaken.
fr: That enemy loses an amount of Mind Points equal to【 5 + (the number of filled sections in your Brainwave Clock, multiplied by 5)】. Then, choose one option: that enemy suffers dazed, or that enemy suffers shaken.
es: That enemy loses an amount of Mind Points equal to【 5 + (the number of filled sections in your Brainwave Clock, multiplied by 5)】. Then, choose one option: that enemy suffers dazed, or that enemy suffers shaken.
pt-BR: Esse inimigo perde uma quantidade de Pontos de Mente igual a【5 + (o número de seções preenchidas no seu Relógio Mental, multiplicado por 5)】. Em seguida, escolha uma opção: esse inimigo sofre atordoado ou sofre abalado.

en: For the purposes of that Check, you may treat your Defense and Magic Defense scores as being equal to【 your current Willpower die size + (the number of filled sections in your Brainwave Clock, multiplied by 2)】. You may still use your normal scores if better.
it: Puoi considerare i tuoi punteggi di Difesa e Difesa Magica come pari a【**la tua taglia di dado attuale di Volontà + (il numero di sezioni piene del tuo Orologio Cerebrale moltiplicato per 2)**】contro quel Test (puoi usare i tuoi punteggi normali se migliori).
de: For the purposes of that Check, you may treat your Defense and Magic Defense scores as being equal to【 your current Willpower die size + (the number of filled sections in your Brainwave Clock, multiplied by 2)】. You may still use your normal scores if better.
pl: For the purposes of that Check, you may treat your Defense and Magic Defense scores as being equal to【 your current Willpower die size + (the number of filled sections in your Brainwave Clock, multiplied by 2)】. You may still use your normal scores if better.

pt-BR: Para os propósitos desse Teste, você pode tratar seus valores de Defesa e Defesa Mágica como sendo iguais a【 o tamanho atual do seu dado de Vontade + (o número de seções preenchidas no seu Relógio Mental, multiplicado por 2)】. Você ainda pode usar seus valores normais se forem melhores.

en: That ally recovers an amount of Mind Points equal to【 10 + (the number of filled sections in your Brainwave Clock, multiplied by 5)】. If that ally is your focus, they heal from a single status effect of their choice out of dazed, enraged, and shaken.
it: Quell'alleato recupera un ammontare di Punti Mente pari a【**10 + (il numero di sezioni piene del tuo Orologio Cerebrale moltiplicato per 5)**】; se quell'alleato è il tuo **focus**, guarisce da un singolo status a sua scelta tra **confuso**, **furente** e **scosso**.
de: That ally recovers an amount of Mind Points equal to【 10 + (the number of filled sections in your Brainwave Clock, multiplied by 5)】. If that ally is your focus, they heal from a single status effect of their choice out of dazed, enraged, and shaken.

fr: That ally recovers an amount of Mind Points equal to【 10 + (the number of filled sections in your Brainwave Clock, multiplied by 5)】. If that ally is your focus, they heal from a single status effect of their choice out of dazed, enraged, and shaken.
es: That ally recovers an amount of Mind Points equal to【 10 + (the number of filled sections in your Brainwave Clock, multiplied by 5)】. If that ally is your focus, they heal from a single status effect of their choice out of dazed, enraged, and shaken.
pt-BR: Esse aliado recupera uma quantidade de Pontos de Mente igual a【 10 + (o número de seções preenchidas no seu Relógio Mental, multiplicado por 5)】. Se esse aliado for seu foco, ele se cura de um único efeito negativo à sua escolha entre atordoado, enfurecido e abalado.

en:
Once you use the Theriomorphosis Skill, the chosen therioforms last until the end of the scene. They also end if you die or fall unconscious, perform the Guard action, or use the Theriomorphosis Skill again (this includes using it through Genoclepsis).
You may end the effects of your Theriomorphosis at any time, but during a conflict you can only do so on your turn, before or after an action.
When a scene ends, if you are under the effects of Theriomorphosis, you may spend 10 Mind Points to extend your current therioforms to the next scene you will be in.

Once you use the Theriomorphosis Skill, the chosen therioforms last until the end of the scene. They also end if you die or fall unconscious, perform the Guard action, or use the Theriomorphosis Skill again (this includes using it through Genoclepsis).
You may end the effects of your Theriomorphosis at any time, but during a conflict you can only do so on your turn, before or after an action.
When a scene ends, if you are under the effects of Theriomorphosis, you may spend 10 Mind Points to extend your current therioforms to the next scene you will be in.

Once you use the Theriomorphosis Skill, the chosen therioforms last until the end of the scene. They also end if you die or fall unconscious, perform the Guard action, or use the Theriomorphosis Skill again (this includes using it through Genoclepsis).
You may end the effects of your Theriomorphosis at any time, but during a conflict you can only do so on your turn, before or after an action.
When a scene ends, if you are under the effects of Theriomorphosis, you may spend 10 Mind Points to extend your current therioforms to the next scene you will be in.
pt-BR:
Assim que você usar a Habilidade Teriomorfose, as formas teriomórficas escolhidas duram até o fim da cena. Elas também terminam se você morrer ou ficar inconsciente, realizar a ação Guarda ou usar a Habilidade Teriomorfose novamente (isso inclui usá-la por meio de Genoclepse).

Você pode encerrar os efeitos de sua Teriomorfose a qualquer momento, mas durante um conflito só pode fazê-lo no seu turno, antes ou depois de uma ação.

Quando uma cena termina, se você estiver sob os efeitos de Teriomorfose, você pode gastar 10 Pontos de Mente para estender suas formas teriomórficas atuais para a próxima cena em que estiver.

en: You may breathe underwater and your eyes can see perfectly in dim light. When you recover Hit Points, you recover 5 additional Hit Points and you may immediately recover from a single status effect of your choice.
it:
Puoi respirare sott'acqua e vedere perfettamente in condizioni di scarsa luminosità.
Quando recuperi Punti Vita, recuperi 5 Punti Vita addizionali e puoi immediatamente guarire da un singolo status a tua scelta.
de: You may breathe underwater and your eyes can see perfectly in dim light. When you recover Hit Points, you recover 5 additional Hit Points and you may immediately recover from a single status effect of your choice.

fr: You may breathe underwater and your eyes can see perfectly in dim light. When you recover Hit Points, you recover 5 additional Hit Points and you may immediately recover from a single status effect of your choice.
es: You may breathe underwater and your eyes can see perfectly in dim light. When you recover Hit Points, you recover 5 additional Hit Points and you may immediately recover from a single status effect of your choice.
pt-BR: Você pode respirar debaixo d'água e seus olhos enxergam perfeitamente em luz fraca. Quando você recupera Pontos de Vida, recupera 5 Pontos de Vida adicionais e pode se curar imediatamente de um único efeito de status à sua escolha.

en: You treat your Insight as if it were one die size higher (to a maximum of d12). When you deal damage to one or more creatures for the first time during your turn, if at least one of them is in Crisis, you deal 5 extra damage to each of those creatures.
it:
Consideri il tuo dado di **Intuito** incrementato di una taglia (massimo **d12**).
Quando infliggi danno a una o più creature per la prima volta durante il tuo turno, se almeno una di quelle creature è in **Crisi**, infliggi 5 danni extra a ciascuna di esse.
de: You treat your Insight as if it were one die size higher (to a maximum of d12). When you deal damage to one or more creatures for the first time during your turn, if at least one of them is in Crisis, you deal 5 extra damage to each of those creatures.
pl: You treat your Insight as if it were one die size higher (to a maximum of d12). When you deal damage to one or more creatures for the first time during your turn, if at least one of them is in Crisis, you deal 5 extra damage to each of those creatures.
fr: You treat your Insight as if it were one die size higher (to a maximum of d12). When you deal damage to one or more creatures for the first time during your turn, if at least one of them is in Crisis, you deal 5 extra damage to each of those creatures.
es: You treat your Insight as if it were one die size higher (to a maximum of d12). When you deal damage to one or more creatures for the first time during your turn, if at least one of them is in Crisis, you deal 5 extra damage to each of those creatures.
pt-BR: Você trata sua Inteligência como se fosse um dado um nível maior (até um máximo de d12). Quando você causa dano a uma ou mais criaturas pela primeira vez em seu turno, se pelo menos uma delas estiver em Crise, você causa 5 de dano adicional a cada uma dessas criaturas.

en: You treat your Might as if it were one die size higher (to a maximum of d12). When you succeed on a Check to advance or turn back a Clock, if that Check includes Might, you may fill or erase 1 additional section of that Clock.
it:
Consideri il tuo dado di **Vigore** incrementato di una taglia (massimo **d12**).
Quando hai successo in un Test che include **VIG** per riempire o svuotare un Orologio, puoi riempire o svuotare 1 sezione aggiuntiva.

pt-BR: Você trata sua Vigor como se fosse um dado um nível maior (até um máximo de d12). Quando você tem sucesso em um Teste para avançar ou retroceder um Relógio, se esse Teste incluir Vigor, você pode preencher ou apagar 1 seção adicional desse Relógio.

it: Creature elettrofore, elementali del fulmine, robot

en: When you deal damage with an attack or spell, you may have all that damage become bolt. While your unarmed strikes deal bolt damage, any enemy who loses 20 or more Hit Points due to one of your unarmed strikes also suffers slow.
it: Quando infliggi danno con un attacco o incantesimo, puoi far sì che tutto il danno inflitto diventi da **fulmine**. Finché i tuoi **colpi senz'armi** infliggono danno da **fulmine**, ciascun nemico che **perda 20 o più Punti Vita** a causa di essi subisce lo status **lento**.

fr: When you deal damage with an attack or spell, you may have all that damage become bolt. While your unarmed strikes deal bolt damage, any enemy who loses 20 or more Hit Points due to one of your unarmed strikes also suffers slow.
es: When you deal damage with an attack or spell, you may have all that damage become bolt. While your unarmed strikes deal bolt damage, any enemy who loses 20 or more Hit Points due to one of your unarmed strikes also suffers slow.
pt-BR: Quando você causa dano com um ataque ou feitiço, pode converter todo esse dano em elétrico. Enquanto seus golpes desarmados causarem dano elétrico, qualquer inimigo que perder 20 ou mais Pontos de Vida devido a um de seus golpes desarmados também sofrerá lento.

en: Bats, birds, winged insects, flying creatures.
it: Pipistrelli, uccelli, insetti alati, creature volanti
de: Bats, birds, winged insects, flying creatures.
pl: Bats, birds, winged insects, flying creatures.
fr: Bats, birds, winged insects, flying creatures.
es: Bats, birds, winged insects, flying creatures.
pt-BR: Morcegos, pássaros, insetos alados, criaturas voadoras.

en: You are able to fly. In addition to the obvious advantages in mobility, your melee attacks can target flying creatures and you cannot be targeted by melee attacks unless the attacker is flying or is somehow able to reach flying targets. These benefits do not apply if you are unable to fly freely (such as when inside a vehicle designed for human-sized creatures, or in a narrow corridor). Additionally, when you suffer air, bolt or ice damage during a conflict scene, you lose these benefits until the start of your next turn.
it:
Sei in grado di **volare**. In aggiunta ai vantaggi in termini di mobilità, i tuoi attacchi in **mischia** possono bersagliare le creature **volanti** e tu non puoi essere bersagliato da attacchi in **mischia** a meno che l'attaccante non voli o non sia in grado di raggiungere bersagli volanti.
Questi benefici non si applicano se non puoi volare liberamente (per esempio se ti trovi in un veicolo progettato per creature di proporzioni umane, oppure uno stretto corridoio). Inoltre, quando subisci danni da **aria**, **fulmine** o **ghiaccio** durante una scena di conflitto, perdi questi benefici fino all'inizio del tuo prossimo turno.
de: You are able to fly. In addition to the obvious advantages in mobility, your melee attacks can target flying creatures and you cannot be targeted by melee attacks unless the attacker is flying or is somehow able to reach flying targets. These benefits do not apply if you are unable to fly freely (such as when inside a vehicle designed for human-sized creatures, or in a narrow corridor). Additionally, when you suffer air, bolt or ice damage during a conflict scene, you lose these benefits until the start of your next turn.
pl: You are able to fly. In addition to the obvious advantages in mobility, your melee attacks can target flying creatures and you cannot be targeted by melee attacks unless the attacker is flying or is somehow able to reach flying targets. These benefits do not apply if you are unable to fly freely (such as when inside a vehicle designed for human-sized creatures, or in a narrow corridor). Additionally, when you suffer air, bolt or ice damage during a conflict scene, you lose these benefits until the start of your next turn.

These benefits do not apply if you are unable to fly freely (such as when inside a vehicle designed for human-sized creatures, or in a narrow corridor). Additionally, when you suffer air, bolt or ice damage during a conflict scene, you lose these benefits until the start of your next turn.
es: You are able to fly. In addition to the obvious advantages in mobility, your melee attacks can target flying creatures and you cannot be targeted by melee attacks unless the attacker is flying or is somehow able to reach flying targets. These benefits do not apply if you are unable to fly freely (such as when inside a vehicle designed for human-sized creatures, or in a narrow corridor). Additionally, when you suffer air, bolt or ice damage during a conflict scene, you lose these benefits until the start of your next turn.
pt-BR: Você é capaz de voar. Além das vantagens óbvias em mobilidade, seus ataques corpo a corpo podem atingir criaturas voadoras, e você não pode ser alvo de ataques corpo a corpo, a menos que o atacante também esteja voando ou tenha algum meio de alcançar alvos no ar. Esses benefícios não se aplicam se você estiver impossibilitado de voar livremente (como dentro de um veículo projetado para criaturas de tamanho humano ou em um corredor estreito). Além disso, ao sofrer dano de ar, raio ou gelo durante uma cena de conflito, você perde esses benefícios até o início do seu próximo turno.

en: When you deal damage with an attack or spell, you may have all that damage become fire. While your unarmed strikes deal fire damage, any enemy who loses 20 or more Hit Points due to one of your unarmed strikes also suffers dazed.
it: Quando infliggi danno con un attacco o incantesimo, puoi far sì che tutto il danno inflitto diventi da **fuoco**. Finché i tuoi **colpi senz'armi** infliggono danno da **fuoco**, ciascun nemico che **perda 20 o più Punti Vita** a causa di essi subisce lo status **confuso**.
de: When you deal damage with an attack or spell, you may have all that damage become fire. While your unarmed strikes deal fire damage, any enemy who loses 20 or more Hit Points due to one of your unarmed strikes also suffers dazed.

es: When you deal damage with an attack or spell, you may have all that damage become fire. While your unarmed strikes deal fire damage, any enemy who loses 20 or more Hit Points due to one of your unarmed strikes also suffers dazed.
pt-BR: Quando você causa dano com um ataque ou feitiço, pode fazer com que todo esse dano se torne fogo. Enquanto seus golpes desarmados causarem dano de fogo, qualquer inimigo que perder 20 ou mais Pontos de Vida devido a um de seus golpes desarmados também sofrerá atordoamento.

en: You treat your Dexterity as if it were one die size higher (to a maximum of d12). When you succeed on a Check to advance or turn back a Clock, if that Check includes Dexterity, you may fill or erase 1 additional section of that Clock.
it:
Consideri il tuo dado di **Destrezza** incrementato di una taglia (massimo **d12**).
Quando hai successo in un Test che include **DES** per riempire o svuotare un Orologio, puoi riempire o svuotare 1 sezione aggiuntiva.
de: You treat your Dexterity as if it were one die size higher (to a maximum of d12). When you succeed on a Check to advance or turn back a Clock, if that Check includes Dexterity, you may fill or erase 1 additional section of that Clock.

pt-BR: Você trata sua Destreza como se fosse um dado de um tamanho maior (até um máximo de d12). Quando você tem sucesso em um Teste para avançar ou retroceder um Relógio, se esse Teste incluir Destreza, você pode preencher ou apagar 1 seção adicional desse Relógio.

en:  **Entering** the **personal vehicle** during a conflict requires the **Objective** action. Normally there is no Check required, but the Game Master may introduce a **Clock** if there are serious dangers or obstacles. If the **personal vehicle** is accessible when the conflict begins, characters may **enter it immediately** before the Initiative Check (see **Core Rulebook**, page **59**).  **Leaving** the **personal vehicle** doesn’t require an action, but during a conflict it can only be done on your turn, **before or after** an action.  The **personal vehicle** can contain a variable number of human-sized creatures depending on its **frame** and **modules**, but **only its Pilot may drive it**. Additionally, the other passengers **cannot cover creatures** when they perform the **Guard** action.  The **maximum number of modules enabled at the same time** on a **personal vehicle** is equal to **【3 + its Pilot’s SL in Personal Vehicle】**. The Pilot may freely reassign their personal vehicle’s enabled and disabled modules outside conflicts.

The Pilot may freely reassign their personal vehicle’s enabled and disabled modules outside conflicts.

pt-BR:  **Entrar** no **veículo pessoal** num conflito requer a ação **Objetivo**. Normalmente, não é preciso um teste, mas o mestre pode introduzir um **Relógio** se houver perigos ou obstáculos complicados. Se o **veículo pessoal** estiver disponível quando o conflito começa, os PJs podem **entrar imediatamente** antes do teste de Iniciativa (**Livro Básico**, página **59**).  **Deixar** o **veículo pessoal** não requer uma ação, mas, durante um conflito, só pode ser feito no seu turno, **antes** ou **depois** de uma ação.  O **veículo pessoal** acomoda um número variável de criaturas de tamanho humano, dependendo da sua **estrutura** e **módulos**, mas **apenas seu respectivo piloto pode dirigi-lo**. Além disso, outros passageiros **não podem dar cobertura** a criaturas quando fizerem a ação **Guarda**.  O **número máximo de módulos disponíveis ao mesmo tempo** em um **veículo pessoal** é igual a **【 3 + o NP do piloto em Veículo Pessoal】】**. O piloto pode redistribuir os módulos ativos e inativos livremente fora de conflitos.

en: A **personal vehicle** with this module enabled cannot have any other **weapon modules** enabled. Additionally, when you perform the **Attack** action and attack with this weapon module, you may perform two separate attacks instead of one (against the same target or against different targets). If you do, both attacks follow the rules for **two-weapon** fighting: each attack loses the **multi** property and cannot gain it, and you treat the High Roll of each Accuracy Check as being equal to 0 when determining damage.

pt-BR: Um **veículo pessoal** com este módulo habilitado não pode ter **quaisquer outros módulos de arma** habilitados. Além disso, quando você realizar a ação **Ataque** e atacar com este módulo de arma, você pode realizar dois ataques separados em vez de um (contra o mesmo alvo ou contra alvos diferentes). Se você fizer isso, ambos os ataques seguem as regras de **duas armas**: cada ataque perde a propriedade multi e não pode recebê-la, e você trata a Rolagem Alta de cada Teste de Precisão como sendo igual a 0 ao determinar o dano.

en: While driving this **personal vehicle**, you gain a +2 bonus to Defense and a +2 bonus to Magic Defense. Additionally, this weapon module does not count as a “weapon”: instead, it counts as an equipped **shield**. This module **cannot** be equipped in your **main hand slot**, unless you have acquired the **Dual Shieldbearer** Skill (see **Core Rulebook**, page **197**). If you have, your **Twin Shields** deal 2 extra damage (this is cumulative if you have two **Shield modules** enabled at the same time).

pt-BR: Enquanto dirigir esse **veículo pessoal**, você ganha um bônus de +2 na Defesa e na Defesa Mágica. Além disso, esse módulo de arma não conta como uma "arma", mas como um **escudo** equipado. Esse módulo **não pode** ser equipado no seu espaço de **mão dominante** a não ser que você tenha **Duplo Escudeiro** (Livro Básico, página 197). Se tiver,  seus **Escudos Gêmeos** causam 2 de dano adicional (isso é cumulativo se  você tiver dois **módulos Escudo** ativos ao mesmo tempo)

en:
(counts as two enabled modules) This **personal vehicle** can fly, and its **distance** becomes ×3.

While you are driving this **personal vehicle**, your **melee** attacks can target **flying** creatures, and none of the creatures inside the **personal vehicle** can be targeted by **melee** attacks unless the attacker is flying or is somehow able to reach flying targets.

These benefits do not apply while the **personal vehicle** is inactive or grounded, while you are in **Crisis**, or while you are **covering** another creature with the **Guard** action. Additionally, if a creature aboard this **personal vehicle** suffers **air**, **bolt** or **ice** damageduring a conflict, the benefits of this module cease until the start of your next turn.

pt-BR: (Conta como dois módulos ativos) Esse **veículo pessoal** pode voar e sua **distância** se torna x3. Enquanto dirigir esse **veículo pessoal**, seus ataques **corpo a corpo** podem atingir criaturas **voadoras** e nenhuma das criaturas dentro do **veículo pessoal** pode ser atingida por ataques **corpo a corpo** a não ser que o atacante esteja voando ou seja capaz de atingir alvos voadores. Esses benefícios não se aplicam enquanto o **veículo pessoal** estiver desligado ou em terra, enquanto você estiver em **crise** ou enquanto estiver dando cobertura a outra criatura com a ação **Guarda**. Além disso, se uma criatura a bordo desse **veículo pessoal** sofrer dano de **ar**, **raio** ou **gelo** durante um conflito, os benefícios desse módulo cessam até o início do seu próximo turno.

en: Each time you enable this module on your **personal vehicle**, choose a damage type: **air**, **bolt**, **earth**, **fire** or **ice**. Creatures aboard this **personal vehicle** are treated as being Resistant to the chosen damage type as long as this module remains enabled.

pt-BR: Toda vez que você ativar esse módulo em seu **veículo pessoal**, escolha um tipo de dano: **ar, fogo, gelo, raio** ou **terra**. Criaturas a bordo desse **veículo pessoal** são Resistentes ao dano escolhido enquanto esse módulo permanecer ativo

Enquanto dirigir esse **veículo pessoal**, você ganha um bônus de +2 em seus
testes de Precisão e testes de Magia para feitiços (OO) ofensivos que você lançar.

en: After a creature aboard this **personal vehicle** is hit by a **ranged** attack, if you are driving this **vehicle**, you may spend 1 Inventory Point. If you do, the attacker suffers 10 **physical** damage (after their attack has been resolved). This amount increases by 5 damage if you are **level 20 or higher**, or by 10 damage if you are **level 40 or higher**.

This amount increases by 5 damage if you are **level 20 or higher**, or by 10 damage if you are **level 40 or higher**.

pt-BR:
Após uma criatura a bordo desse **veículo pessoal** ser atingida por um **ataque à
distância**, se você estiver dirigindo o veículo, pode gastar 1 Ponto de Inventário.
Se fizer isso, você causa 10 de dano **físico** ao atacante (após o ataque dele ser resolvido). Esse número aumenta em 5 se você estiver no **nível 20 ou acima**,
ou em 10 se estiver no **nível 40 ou acima**.

en: (Mecha and Steed frames only) While you are driving this **personal vehicle**, if it has a **Heavy**, **Runic**, or **Standard Plating module** enabled, all passengers aboard may treat their Defense and Magic Defense scores as being equal to those provided by the **armor module** in question (they may still use their normal scores if those are better).

en:
After you pay the MP cost of an **Arcanum**, **spell**, or **verse** (see **High Fantasy Atlas**, page **138**), if you are driving this **personal vehicle** and have an **arcane** weapon equipped, you recover 5
Mind Points, or 10 Mind Points if the cost was **equal to or higher than 30 MP**.

pt-BR: Após pagar o custo em PM de um **arcano, feitiço** ou **verso** (**Atlas de Alta Fantasia**, página 138), se estiver dirigindo esse **veículo pessoal** e tiver uma arma arcana equipada, você recupera 5 Pontos de Mana, ou 10 Pontos de Mana se o custo for **igual ou maior que 30 PM**.

en: (Exoskeleton and Mecha frames only) Each time you enable this module on your **personal vehicle**, choose one of its **disabled weapon modules**. As long as the chosen module is disabled and this module is enabled, you may use an action to perform a **free attack** with that **weapon module**.

pt-BR: (apenas estruturas de Exoesqueleto e Mecha) Toda vez que você ativar esse módulo em seu **veículo pessoal**, escolha um módulo de arma inativo. Enquanto o módulo escolhido estiver inativo e este módulo estiver ativo, você pode usar uma ação para executar um **ataque livre** com o **módulo de arma escolhido**.

en: When you plant a **magiseed**, it takes root in your **garden** until removed. Your **Garden** is an **abstract** space whose appearance varies depending on your character’s look: it might be a pot on their back, a gap along their blade, or even the ground under their feet. Your **garden** can only contain **one magiseed at a time**, and any **magiseeds** in your garden are **automatically removed** at the end of each scene.

Your **garden** can only contain **one magiseed at a time**, and any **magiseeds** in your garden are **automatically removed** at the end of each scene.
